40016011	Sa´ase a´un na besa seinilimlom gom, Neri lemna yubu nong na roti gwaneng se lebna gom. Bog Neri a´un ag lebnange na: Farisi nimi ab Saduki nimi ab di bigna´ ununa´ ag weldalamlulum aboga.”
40016012	Wenegaga, besa sembibeg, di roti gwaneng bigna´ sirig se webdanggugong aboga lemo gom bog, alna Farisi nimi ab Saduki nimi ab di omoladsina´ yubu se lemog.
40016013	Yesus na Kaisarea Filipi sogo ag yayog wenena, Alna Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag isibesiog di: “Nimi di lena´ na Sogo Nimi di Me se na edne alamseng do?”
40016014	Sig di yubu degna´na: “Nen nimi dina Yohanes mag dolong sinne, ba nen nimi dina Elia bog, on dara nimi di lemeg dina Yeremia goma yog damen omoladsina´ne aga gom alamang.”
40016015	Ba Yesus na sig ag isibesiog di: “Bog a´undi Nase na edne alamnelom do?”
40016016	Simon Petrus di yubu degna´na: “Anna Kristus Eimayong Gamyagne di Me!”
40016017	Yesus di alag lebog dina: “Simon Yunus mamne lei, ngingyang eisa´ ulamlom, anese yubu nenena nimi di anag lag ombadgeang gom bog, Na´nayong eim asagne di.
40016018	Anda Neri babe anag lebnun: Anna Petrus anda gad girig eilib ane Neri jemaat mabo dirigoga solamnun, ba somagna´ne babe sig ag bo ulamsulul goma´.
40016019	Eimayong damag una´ se isigin goubna´ kunci na anag dodgunun, ba eindi sogo ag ane goubdobne na eim asag babe goubdob ulamlula´, eindi sogo ag lobdobne wenena, eim asag babe lobdob ulamlula´.”
40016020	Wenabog di Yesus na Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag Alna Kristus aboga yog nimi ag na leng gom aboga mem abog.
40016021	Wenegag eilnibonggia Yesus na Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag lag deibog di, Yerusalem bindoga igin-iginne weignang ab imam ousa´ nang ab, Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab di, oboga iginne deibneba´ ab li weneli sum na gamyag bugogneba´ se lag lebog.
40016022	Bog Petrus di Yesus al beram gliboga beyayog di Alag yubu migiba´ lebog: “Ayong Weigne lei, ununa´ nene na Eimayong di mog dora deible wenena, ununa´ nene na Anag na danggulul goma´.”
40016023	Wenena Yesus na a´osing samboga al Petrus ag lebog: “Iblis lei, anna lobulom, Nayag eindi girig igina´ gwareglamnelam, anese eindi seinilina´ nenena Eimayong di sembirub songe lemlam gom, bog nimi di seinilina´ aga lemlam.”
40016024	Wera Yesus di Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ag biabsiog di sig ag lebog: “Nimi na Nayag dirigoga bana´ yo wenena, alna eildinge lobogle di glabna gal sa´aboga Na eimig dobda yulul.
40016025	Anese nimi dogne na eildi gamyaga´ deiya´ blebdanggunun yo wenena, eildi gamyaga´ deiya´ na wanenggiblul, bog nimi dogne na Nase eildi gamyaga´ deiya´ wanenggible wenena alna doblula´.
40016026	Nimi dogne mog sogo nisin eilda´ danggaso bog eildi gange gamyaga´ deiya´ wanenggirub wenena nong ob na sa´a do? Eildi gamyaga´ deiya´ ouling ag na sa´a aga doboga lumbaso do?
40016027	Anese Sogo Nimi di Me na Alayong di bebnagne ab Eildi besarob eim nang nisin ab isiboga yulula´, anda sum nenegaga nimi nisin na Eildi sigdi ununa´ ag lebda degna´ degsulula´.
40016028	Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun: A´un ane umlom nimi dogne na Sogo Nimi di Me Eildi borobne damag una´ se yanggana´, signa aro eibnang gom bog na, somagdobgong goma´.”
40017001	Wera li na´ab bare sum gigib uboga wenena Yesus di Petrus ab, Yakobus ab, Yakobus alga Yohanes ab nason Alab weig mein dognag winggieg di, anege ag na sigog ulameg.
40017002	Sig a´osing ag Yesus di a´osing na yogne sambayog. Eildi a´osing na eseng oul songe warabayog. Eildi bagsum na geid danggoga diman meleg songe waralamog.
40017003	Wera sigdi gemelameg wenena, Musa ab Elia ab na Yesus ab nason yubu selelameg.
40017004	Ba Petrus di Yesus ag lebog: “Ayong Weigne lei, nunna ane ulamaba´ na yaga´ besarob nong. Anda An yo wenena, nana ee weneli sobnun, dogne na Anse dogne na Musa se, di on dogne na Elia se.”
40017005	Petrus di yubu leldogog sabseibi geis deb di sigag denelongol yunggisiog di, deb lomag anegab gegeldogeg ba yubu dogne leldogog di: “Anena Neri Me Neri wana´ sembirubne Eildi Neri gange ngingyang ubnel Alag besa gegbululum.”
40017006	Wera Yesus di dirigoga bana´ nang na, yubu nenege gegbayeg, di signa yaga´ log nong ubsiog, ba boblolonga sogo ag malyunggieg.
40017007	Bog Yesus yayog di sigag salbonggia lebog dina: “Segoglulum, log ung gom.”
40017008	Wenege signa ousa´ edbia gereg, ba nimi babe eibeg gom Alna Yesus og eibeg.
40017009	Signa mein ag uboga yunggieg sum nenege na, Yesus di sig ag molbesiog dina: “A´undi eiblomne na Sogo Nimi di Me na somagdob nimi gan-gan uboga gamyag buldogna´ aro bog na nimi ag nebnang gom mem.”
40017010	Ba Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi na Alag isibayeg: “Wera ane so bog sa´a se Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang dina, Elia damen yulula´ alameldong do?”
40017011	Yesus di sig ag lebog dina: “Odseig Elia yale, di yogne-yogne nisin na eildi besa bugiblula´.
40017012	Neri a´un ag lebna, Elia na gigib yayog, bog nimi na al eel ulameg gom, di sigdi yonge ag og lebda ulameg. Neigne na Sogo Nimi di Me ag babe sigdi iginne deibgonga´.”
40017013	Sum nenege ab na Yesus di dirigoga bana´ nimi na, besa sembibeg, di Eildi lemla yubu na Yohanes mag dolongsina´ne se aboga.
40017014	Wera Yesus ab eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi abna nimi dina´ longolamega´ ag yayeg wenena, nenge dognog yayog di, Yesus eiba´ag geimbonggia gibog.
40017015	Lebog di: “Ayong Weigne lei, neri me wana´ sembiblom. Alna somagaleilina´ neigna´ neiglamla di yaga´ neigeldomla. Alna li dogne-dogne mag ag malwa´lamla, di li dogne-dogne na ug lomag malwa´lamla.
40017016	Nana Eindi dirigoga bana´ nimi bobisi bog, signa wesibeg gom.”
40017017	Wera Yesus di lebog di: “Od seig seinilina´ gom nimi ab, mednena´ bisig balamlom nimi lei, Nana li salag edbare so a´un gan-gan ag ulamnuna´ do? Li salag edbare so Nana a´un ag na lignibonggia ulamnun do? Me na beyulom.”
40017018	Yesus di alag migiba´ delagoga lebog wenena, meili gange nang nenege na alag uboga langgiog, ba me nenegena wenege sabseibi egdangdobog.
40017019	Gigib wenena Yesus di dirigoga bana´ nimi na sigog Alag yayeg di, Alag isibayeg: “Sa´a di nun na meili gange nang anege yaglambayob gom do?”
40017020	Ba Eildi sig ag lebog dina: “A´undi odseig seinilina´ na moga´ se. Anese aboga Nana a´un ag lebnun: A´undi odseig seinilina´ na sawi do so od di wenena, a´undi mein ag ane lebselom di: ‘Ouling nenag uboga aned bulom’ abselom wenena, mein nenege na loboga biso. Anda a´undi unubanmen gomne dogne od gom.”
40017021	Bog aneso meili gange nang wenena gwaneng dena´ gom-gom doa yubu og lera ulamna di wenegaga yaglambanmen.
40017022	Yesus ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ab, Galilea longgayeg sum nenege na, Yesus di sig ag lebog di: “Sogo Nimi di Me na yog sum nimi di see ag widnebugonga´.
40017023	Anda Alna obig ba maboga li weneli sum na gamyag bugiblula´.” Ba Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi na ongei arob gange ubsiog.
40017024	Yesus ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ab na Kapernaum asag samo yayeg wenena, Eimayong di ee ag se wase moloboga donne dogne Petrus ag ya´ina lebog di: “A´undi omoladsina´ne na girig wase besene deglul goma´ de?”
40017025	Eildi yubu degna´ na: “Od seig degneba´.” Anda Petrus na ee ag wa´iyog wenege na, Yesus di damen alag isibayog: “Simon lei, anna sa´a sembiamlam do? Sogo ag borob nimi dane na, wase degna´ ag degna´ na edne di do? Eildi asag nimi di goma nimi asag nimi di deglameldong gom?”
40017026	Petrus di yubu degna´ na: “Nimi asag nimi di deglameldong.” Ba Yesus di, alag lebog di na: “Wera eildi asag nimi na degnemen gom.
40017027	Bog nun na sigdi gange ag girig igina´ gwaregesiyebag, ba mag sein ag wed dolongolbilim di oumunggun doblem ikan na si gwa´ salbalem di eildi si lomag na girig wase dombare eiblem wenena, doblem di Na se dogne a´un se dogne sig ag degsulom.”
40018001	Sum nenege na Yesus di dirigoga bana´ nimi na, Alag yayeg di isibayeg: “Eim asag Eimayong damag una´ se na edne aga weigne danggulula´ do?”
40018002	Ba Yesus na, mog me dogne biabog di sig gan-gan ag segibog.
40018003	Lebog dina: “Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun, a´un na noroldana´ gange di samboga, me ane songe dangana´ gom wenena eim asag Eimayong damag una´ se damag na wa´inmen gom.
40018004	Nimi na lambonggia me ane songe danggale nimi al aga, eim asag Eimayong damag una´ se weigne ulamlula´.
40018005	Nimi dogne di Neri si se aneso me dolamla wenena, alna Na dolamnel.”
40018006	“Bog edne na aneso mabo dogne ag, Nayag odseig seinilimang mabo ag mednena´ne ubgong aboga, meili ulimsiang nimi na eildi ngang ag girig igina´ gwaregia weig mag laut ag dalbululum, ba mag si dulula´ na od seleb.
40018007	Sogo agne ab mednena´ne ubgong arob una´ nisin ab na, ongei arob ulamlul. Mednena´ne ubgong arob una´ nenege na ora´ anda, bog unulamang nimi na ongei arob eisa´ ulamgong.
40018008	Wera eindi see di gom eindi yan di gom an ag mednena´ne ubgele wenena, anege gareboga boreblom! Anese a´undi see goma yan gom gumurub, bog gamyagne ag wa´na´ na od seleb, bog a´undi see besene ab yan besene ab besarob bog unum-unum ug ag dolongsina´ anda baba´.
40018009	Anda eindi ising di anag mednena´ne ubgele wenena, gwesebalem di boreblom. Anese eindi ising dara samo di og gamyagne ag wa´na´ na od seleb bog, ising besene gedman ug dan asag borebsina´ anda baba´.
40018010	Ane so mog mabo nene ag na sogo ag so seinilising gom, anese Nana a´un ag lebnun, sig se besarob eim nang na sob-sob Na´nayong eim asagne a´osing ag gemelamang.”
40018011	Anese Sogo Nimi di Me yayoga´ na, derong arob nimi blebsunun aboga yayog.
40018012	“A´undi seinilina´ na sa´a so do? Nimi dogne eildi domba deng weneli di ebna sugna dara bare, bog gan-gan anege ab dogne derong abso wenena, deng weneli di ebna sa´o dara bare abenege na mein ag loiya derong arobne nenege eilbiso gom de?
40018013	Anda Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun, eilda´ domba deng weneli di ebna sa´o dara bare od ngingyang bog, derong arob domba nenege eibso wenena on yaga´ ngingyang ulamso.
40018014	Neig songe na a´un Ayong eim asagne di, me dognog babe na derong aroblul aboga yo ulamla gom.”
40018015	“A´ungga meilinge uble wenena, a´un besene og wenena, wembulom. Alna eindi Damen Wenena´ Yubu gegbale wenena, eindi angga on samboga doblam.
40018016	Wera alna an ag gegbale gom wenena, on nimi dogne gom besene gom ag beyulom, nimi besene goma weneli gom a´osing ag lag leblul aboga, anda ununa´ nenege nisin gegban di lebnange ag lebda eel uboga garenne.
40018017	Alna sigag gegena´ yo gom wenena, ununa´ nenege na Eimayong mabo jemaat ag ombadsululum, ba alna Eimayong mabo di yubu gegbale gom wenena, Eimayong eel gomne songe goma wase moloboga donne songe gom ulamlul.
40018018	Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun, a´undi sogo ag ane goubdobne na eim asag babe goubdob ulamlula´, a´undi sogo ag lobdobne wenena eim asag babe lobdob ulamlula´.
40018019	On Neri a´un ag lebnun: Sogo ag ane ab nimi besene od yubu selboga yo abdang di sa´a songe molbaranne babe na sigdi molbarangne nenege na Na´nayong eim asagne di gegboga unibsulula´.
40018020	Anese nimi besene gom weneli gom Neri si ag leboga longolamig wenena, Nana sig gan-gan ulamna.”
40018021	Gigib wenena Petrus yayog di Yesus ag lebog: “Ayong Weigne lei, na´e di na ag meili ubnele wenena edbare salag lubibnun do? Li segbare de?”
40018022	Yesus di alag lebog dina: “Nana an ag lebnun, li segbare og gom, alna li deng besene di ebna besenaba´ dara bare, di li segbare ab.
40018023	Anese eim asag Eimayong damag una´ se sununa´ na borobne dogne di eildi ouragna´ nimi ab bugoga eildinge dolmamoglameldo songe ulamla.
40018024	Alna eildinge dobmamogog wilniban wenena, eildi sepuluh ribu talenta dorob nimi di damen al a´osing deilimeldo.
40018025	Bog nimi nenege di ubuma lumbanmen gom wenena, borobne dina, alab eildi me ab, eildi gel ab eildinge nisin ab na eildi deblorobne se degoga lumbugong aboga lebog.
40018026	Wenena ouragna´ nimi nenege na, geimbonggia alag gibog di lebog dina: Od lignibonggia umlem, ba neri dorobne nisin na lumbununa´.
40018027	Borobne benege dina, alag wana´ gange sembibog, di eildi deblorobne nisin na lubibog, di lobdoba´ danggibog.
40018028	Bog ouragna´ne benege na langgiog di, alna yog wee wena´ne dogne ab ebbisidanggareg, anda alna seratus dinar dorobne. Anda alna bayog di alga boga´ golasaleboga lebog dina: Eindi deblorobne na deglom!
40018029	Wenena alga na malongolbindoga gibog di alag molbayog: ‘Od lignibonggia umlem ba neri derobne na lumbununa´.’
40018030	Bog alna lobogog, di alga aga dolongsina´ ee ag dobonggibog, anegag ulamle di neringe lumbulul aboga.
40018031	Wera yog wee wenang na ununa´ nene eibeg, di ongei sembibiga´ anda, ununa´ nenege nisin na sigdi borobne ag ombareg.
40018032	Borobne benege di al biabog di lebog dina: Yoo ouragna´ne lei, nayag molbayoma´ se eindi deblorobne nisin neri gigib lubibgen bog di!
40018033	Neri anag gigib wana´ ubgisi songe? Eindi babe angga ag wana´ ubsum gom de?
40018034	Borobne benege na yaga´ yoo nong danggayog di, ouragna´ nimi nenege na dolongsina´ ee ag weboga osin nang ag dodsiog ba dolongsina´ ee ag anegag uboga eildi deblorobne nisin lumbulul aboga.
40018035	Wera Na´nayong eim asagne di babe neigne a´un ag unubusulula´. A´undi gange nisin di a´unggabo ag eleb-eleb lubilisina´ gom wenena.”
40019001	Yesus na yubu nenege nisin gigib lebog di, Alna Galilea loboga Yudea sogo ag mag Yordan gouboga dara samo biog.
40019002	Nimi dina´ Al eimig yalameg, ba Eildi babe sig na anege ab wesilimsiog.
40019003	Wenena Farisi nang na sumbugob aboga Alag yayeg, anda sigdi isibayeg dina: “Nimi dogne eildi gel loldogna´ na yubu dirimna´ ag lebda od seleb lobognemen de?”
40019004	Ba Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “A´un na eildina´ gom de? Eildi aga oumunggun nimi ulisiog wenena, sig na nenge ab gel ab ubsiog.
40019005	Eildi yubu lebog di, Anese nenge na alayong ab eilin ab loboga eildi gel ab dirigdub ulamdig di, sig besene na nong dognog danggurugonga´.
40019006	Aneso wenena sig na nong besene gom, bog nong dognog ulamdang. Anese aboga Eimayong di gigib dirigdubne na nimi di delegoga lobognemen gom.”
40019007	Ba sigdi alag lebeg dina: “Aneso wenena sa´a se Musa di lemog dina: Nimi dogne eildi gel loboglul wenena, gel loldogna´ se mome dodlul amog do?”
40019008	Yesus di sig ag lebog dina: “A´undi gange gad se Musa dina, yo od seleb unubululum amog, bog damen oumunggun uliyoga´ ag na aneso gom.
40019009	Bog Nana a´un ag lebnun, Nimi dogne eildi gel loldogna´ na, asoga´ yolsagna´ gom, bog loboga yog gel dolamla wenena, alna asoga´ yolsagna´ne ulamla.”
40019010	Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi di lebeg dina: “Ane so wenena, alegne ab algel ab dirigoga una´ se yubu na dobdanggasereng goma´ babe seleb.”
40019011	Ba Yesus di sig ag lebog dina: “Lebna yubu nene na nisin nimi dobgong gom bog, alna ane so ublul aboga doaddob nimi aga dobnemen.
40019012	Nimi dogne gel dona´ goma´ na eilin mon lomag ab lob doroba´ ane so ublul aboga mangarobne, di nimi dogne na gel doblul gom aboga yog nimi di lob dolamsildong, bog nimi dogne na eildi yonge di lob doroba´ songe ulamnun aboga ulameldo Eimayong damag una´ se aboga. Anda nimi na dobnun sembiblul wenena alna dobso.”
40019013	Nimi na mog mabo Yesus ag beyalameg, Eildi sig ag Eildi see deiya doa yubu lebsulul aboga. Bog Alag dirigoga bana´ nimi di nimi danege ag lemsieg.
40019014	Bog Yesus di lebog dina: “Mabo ane na loubsululum, sig na Nayag yalamanga´ agna gareseng gom, anese Eimayong damag una´ se na aneso nimi da´.”
40019015	Eildi see mabo ag deibsiog di gigib wenena, Alna anege uboga biog.
40019016	Nimi dogne Al Yesus ag ya´ina lebog dina: “Omoladsina´ne lei, unum gamyag ulamnun aboga besarob ununa´ na sa´ub nun do?”
40019017	Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “Sa´ase aboga eindi besarob ununa´ se, Nayag isibanelam do? Besarobne na dognog ulamla. Bog anna gamyag una´ yo sembiblem wenena, Eimayong di lerob yubu nisin sunum dagom alamlom.”
40019018	Nimi nenege di Alag lebog dina: “Lerob yubu nenege na nesa do?” Ba Yesus di lebog dina: “Nimi onggom, gelabo asoga´ yong gom, asoga´ dong gom, sonda´ yubu leng gom,
40019019	Eindi nong wana´ seinildalamlam songe, aneyong ab einin ab giblamsilim di, anggabo yog nimi ag babe wana´ ulamsulom.”
40019020	Goubininge benege di alag lebog dina: “Nenege nisin na nana gigib dagoma unulameldo, di nesa aga unulamneldo gom do?”
40019021	Ba Yesus di alag lebog dina: “Anna sunum urubub una´ yo wenena, eindinge nisin deglem di, sig see gom nimi ag dodsilim wenena, ansenge na eim asag dobloma´ anda gigib wenena Na eimig yulom.”
40019022	Goubini nimi nenege na yubu nene gegbayog wenena, anese alna damnang dina´nea´ anda, ongei arob gange di engena´ so ura biog.
40019023	Yesus di Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag lebog dina “Nana sirigne a´un ag lebnun, see yag nimi Eimayong damag una´ se wa´ na´ na gas.
40019024	Nana on dogne ab a´un ag lebnun, unta dogne na yarom lom bisig na od wa´inmen, bog see yag nimi aga Eimayong damag una´ se wa´na´ na sang-sanga´ wa´inmen gom.”
40019025	Wenege Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi na Yesus di yubu nene gegbayeg, di log ubsiog, ba lebeg di: “Aneso wenena edne aga blebnemen do?”
40019026	Yesus na sig ag gembara lebog dina: “Nimi di wenena unubanmen gom ununa´, bog Eimayong di wenena yogne-yogne nisin unubanmen.”
40019027	Petrus di yubu degna´ Yesus ag lebog dina: “Nun na yogne- yogne nisin gigib loboga An eimig dobda yalameldoba´ anda, nun na sa´a aga dobgoba´ do?”
40019028	Yesus di sigag lebog dina: “Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun, on uyag ulili sum nenege na, Sogo Nimi di Me na Eildi bebnag buna´ ag enigi, buglul sum nenege na a´un Nayag gigib dirigoga ulamlom nimi na oo bare bebnag buna´ ag buglulum di, Israel sisa´ oo bare nimi ag sunulamsululuma´.
40019029	Nimi nisin Neri si se sigdi ee ab, siggabo nengabo goma gelabo gom, alayong goma eilin gom, eildi mabo goma eildi wee gom, lobogle nimi na, deng weneli di ebna sa´o dara bare so doble di, alna unum gamyagne babe doblula´.
40019030	Bog nimi dina´ oumunggun nimi na eimig seig danggugong, bog eimig seig ulamang nimi na oumunggun ag seig danggugonga´.”
40020001	“Eimayong damag una´ se sununa´ na, ee deiya´ne di gwelegna´ lugun langgindoga anggur wee ag wen nimi eilbisiog, songe neigne ulamla.
40020002	Alna anggur wee webneb nimi ab li dognog sum degna´ deglamsiniba´ yubu neigdigum gigib gareboga lebeg wenena, sig na eildi anggur wee ag bululum aboga bogibsiog.
40020003	Alna gwelegnag jam sembilan so uldogog wenege langgiog, di gedsiog ba, pasar degna´ ag yog ulameg nimi edbare seglameg, ba eibsiog.
40020004	Eildi sigag lebog di: ‘A´un babe Neri anggur wee ag bululum, ba Nana a´un ag sunum degna´ degsununa´.’ Ba sig babe na bieg.
40020005	Alna jam dua belas ag babe sinag jam tiga babe langgiog, di neigne ura umog songe on ubog.
40020006	Alna on jam lima sinag langgiog, di yog nimi edbare babe eibsiog di sig ag lebog dina: ‘A´un na sa´a se nisin sum wee wena´ gom-gom ane ag segda ulamlom do?’
40020007	Sigdi alag lebeg dina, ‘Nun ag degsinib nimi od gom se’, ba eildi sig ag lebog dina: ‘A´un babe neri anggur wee ag bululum.’
40020008	Sinag sum nenege na anggur wee deiya´ne di wee wesinne ag wee nimi bialbisilim di degsulom, anda, ‘oumunggun wa´indub nimi ag uboga beilag wa´iyeg nimi sigdi degna´ eleb-eleb degsulom.’
40020009	Gigib jam lima sinag eilnibonggia welameg nimi yayeg di, sig eleb-eleb girig wase dinar dognog-dognog dobeg.
40020010	Gigib wenena gwelegna´ lugun eilnibonggia welameg nimi babe yayeg, di sigdi sembia nun na on degna´ weiga´ dobgoba´ sembibeg, bog sig babe na dognog girig wase dinar dodsiog.
40020011	Sig na dobeg di wenena, deiya´ne ag erigal yubu lemeg.
40020012	Sigdi lebeg di: ‘Sig eimig wa´iyang nimi nene na jam dognog webang, bog nun gwelegna´ lugun ya´indoga welamab nimi na, wee gas weboga eseng bobo gwesamab, bog anna neig degna´ danggibsilam.’
40020013	Bog wee deiya´ne benege di sig nimi dogne ag yubu degna´ lebog dina: ‘Na´e lei, neri anag sunum gomne ubgen gom. Alna nundi yubu neigdigum gareboga lemub, di dognog sum se degna´ na dognog girig wase dinar amub gom de?
40020014	Anese eindi wee degna´ doblem di bulom. Nana anag dodgen degna´ songe eimig wa´iyang nimi ag babe neig degna´ degsunun aboga yo ulamna.
40020015	Neringe di og neri gange di yonge ag lebda unubunun sembibsene gom de? Goma neri gange glagdob se, eindi gange na ongei neira´ danggaso sembiblam di de?’
40020016	Anda oumunggun nimi na eimig seig danggugong, bog eimig seig ulamang nimi na oumunggun ag seig danggugona´.”
40020017	Yesus na Yerusalem bunun aboga ubog wenena. Alna Eildi oo bare nang sig og biabsiog di, bisig urugag balameg di sigag lebog:
40020018	“Wene nunna Yerusalem biyeb di Sogo Nimi di Me na imam nang ab Damen Wenena´ yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab ag dodsiyig ba, Alna obgong aboga garerob yubu doblinggibgonga´.
40020019	Anda sigdi Alna Eimayong eel gom nimi ag dodsiyig, ba Alag dereboga olamig di galag glabgong aboga. Anda Alna li weneli sum na bugiblula´.”
40020020	Wera Zebedeus algel ab al mabo ab Yesus ag yayeg di, Al eiba´ ag gembonggia Alag yogne se molbayog.
40020021	Ba Yesus di lebog dina: “An na sa´a yo umgel do?” Eildi yubu degna´ na: “Neri mabo ane Eindi Borobne damag una´ se sum nenege na me dogne Eindi sirig see ag seig me dogne Eindi waneng see ag seig bugdugong aboga, yo sulom.”
40020022	Bog Yesus di yubu degna´ Eildi lebog dina: “Eindi molbalomne na a´un na eel gom. Neri dunun ma´i na a´un na denmen de?” Sigdi Alag lebeg dina: “Nun na unubanmen.”
40020023	Yesus di sigag lebog dina: “Neri mag ma´i na dululum bog, Neri sirig see ag seig goma Neri waneng see ag seig gom buna´ se ununa´ na, Neri miboga dodsinmen gom. Na´nayong di dodsunun sembia gedneboga deibog nimi aga dodsulula´.”
40020024	Sum nenege na yog sa´o bare dirigoga bana´ nang na ununa´ nenege gegbayeg wenena, siggabo besene abenege ag erigal ubsieg.
40020025	Anese Yesus na sig nisin biabsiog di lebog dina: “A´un eel, Eimayong eel gom nimi aga bo mengesina´ se ulamang nimi na, sigdi asag nimi na meili nenelamsiang, di sigdi weig nang migib gad deilimsiang.
40020026	Bog a´un na aneso ung gom, a´un gan-gan ag nimi weigne dangana´ yo wenena alna a´undi wee nimi danggaso.
40020027	Bog a´un gan-gan ag nimi dogne mengena´ yo wenena, alna a´undi ouragna´ne danggulul.
40020028	Neig songe na Sogo Nimi di Me yayoga´ babe na, nimi di arobunugong aboga gom bog, arolamsini di Neri gamyaga´ nimi nisin degsina´ se dodsunun aboga.”
40020029	Yesus ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ab na Yerikho, uboga langgieg wenege na, nimi dina´ Al eimig doblameg.
40020030	Ising lum nang besene bisig abom ag bulamdega´ anda Yesus yabayoga´ gegbareg wenena signa yubu migiba´ biaboga: “Ayong Weigne Daud Mamne, nun wana´ sembibsulom.”
40020031	Bog nimi dina´ anege di gelegurugong aboga lebsieg. Bog signa on migiba´ biaboga, lebdeg dina: “Ayong Weigne Daud Mamne nun wana´ sembibsulom.”
40020032	Wera Yesus na seglobonggayog di, sig biabsiog di Eildi lebog dina: “Neri a´un se sa´a aga unubusulul aboga yo sembiamdom do?”
40020033	Sigdi yubu degna´na: “Ayong Weigne lei, nunna ising gwelegesiso, ba eibsenem aboga.”
40020034	Yesus na sig ag wana´ sembibsiog, di sigdi ising ag salebonggibsiog, ba al wenege sabseibi sig na eibdeg di Al eimig dobda birig.
40021001	Yesus ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ab na gigib Yerusalem ad beram bieg wenena, signa Zaitun ounang ag Betfage sogo ag lanalbieg. Di Yesus na Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi besene bogdebsiog.
40021002	Lebog dina: “A´osing ag asag ane bururum, di anege ag na keledai gel dogne geregamig ba, eilda´ me na beram ulamle ba berera eibduruma´. Geledai nenege na soubu lobdurum di Nayag beyururum.
40021003	Nimi di a´un ag leldogsieg wenena, lebdurum dina: Ayong Weigne di yo ubla´ se, anda al wenege sabseibi bobururum aboga bogdebsulul.”
40021004	Ununa´ nene ubleba damen omoladsina´ nang dileblomegne sunum danggulul aboga:
40021005	“Al Sion gelme ag leblem dina: Gedlom eindi Borobne anag yalamla, Alna mesanga´ lambonggia geledai dogne ag bugamla di, anege na goubini geledai me dogne ag.”
40021006	Wenena dirigoga bana´ nimi abenege na birig, di Yesus di sig ag unubururum aboga ombadsiog songe ubdeg.
40021007	Signa geledai gel anege ab me ab isiboga beyareg, di sigdi bagsum yanggibdeg wenena, Yesus babe eilibag bulwinggiog.
40021008	Yaga´ nimi dina´ log sigdi bagsum na bisig ag yanggayeg, di nen nimi gal see ba´ gareboga bisig ag yangara bieg.
40021009	Nimi dina´ dara na menggoga balameg, ba dara nimi na Yesus weilagsig yalameg, di lemeg dina: “Hosana Daud Mamne, Ayong Weigne si ag yalamlange, Alna beisirub ulamla, Hosana eim bebnagne.”
40021010	Yesus na Yerusalem asag wa´ldogog wenege na as nenege nimi nisin na yubu oo aboga lemeg dina: “Nimi nene na edne do?”
40021011	Nimi dina´ danege di yubu degna´ lebeg dina: “Ane na damen omololadsina´ne Yesus, Nazaret uboga Galilea sogo ulamlange.”
40021012	Yesus na gigib Eimayong di ee ag wa´iyog wenena, Eimayong di ee eriga´ ag degna´ deiya deglameg nimi nisin yagsambesiog, di wase leleglameg gal yangana´ ab, winang yalma deiya deglameg nimi di buna´ ab, yamneglenggibsiog.
40021013	Di sigag lebog dina: “Mome dorob di Neri ee na doa yubu lena´ ee arob, bog a´undi na asoga´ eea´ sorob ee dangilimlom.”
40021014	Ising lum nimi ab yan gogdub nimi ab na Alag Eimayong di ee ag yalameg wenena, Eildi wesilimsiog.
40021015	Bog imam nang di ousa´ nang ab Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab, Eildi ubnemen gomne ulamoga´ anege eibig, di wenege na mog mabo di Eimayong di ee ag ab lemeg di: “Hosana Daud Mamne” alamega´ gegboga, sigdi gange yoo nong ubsiog.
40021016	Wenena sigdi Alag lebeg di: “Mog mabo di aneso lemangne na Anna gegelamlam de?” Abeg ba Yesus di sigag lebog di: “Nana gegelamna, Weig Yubu ag anena aro eildina´ gom de? ‘Moum den mabo ab mog mabo ab di, An gibgeneba se gigib gednerob,’ arob gom de?”
40021017	Alna sig loubsiog di Betania as weilag seig langgindoga, anege ag bindoga mabog.
40021018	Wera Alna gwelegna´ lugun abenege on somboga Yerusalem asag yalamog wenena Yesus na gwaneng yo ubog.
40021019	Alna bisig beram gal ara dogne eibog, di anege ag biog. Bog Alna do dognog babe eibog gom, ba´ og bolamog wenena, Eildi gal ag anege lebog dina: “An na soba´ mulamlom goma´”, ba gal nenege na wenege sabseibi elem danggayog.
40021020	Danggayogne nenege Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi eiya ngalagoga lebeg dina: “Sa´a ura gal ara nenena al wenab elem danggal do?”
40021021	Yesus di yubu degna´ sig ag lebog dina: Neri a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun: “A´un na gadgeira´ una´ gom gom odseig seinilina´ wenena, a´un na Neri gal ara ag ubna songe og ubselom gom bog, a´undi lebselom di mein nene na: ‘Loboga weig mag laut lomag naglom’ abseloma´ na ununa´ nenena od unubaso.
40021022	A´un na odseig seinilina´ di yogne se doa yubu mololamlulum wenena, a´un na sunum dobluluma´.”
40021023	Gigib wenena Yesus na Eimayong di ee ag wa´iog di Alna anege ag omoladlamsiog wenege na, imam ousa´ nang ab Yahudi nimi di bo mengesin nang ab Alag ya´ina isibayeg di: “Eindi unulamlamne nene na, asa bo una´ di unulamlam do? Goma edne di an ag ununa´ nene bo ulamlul aboga dodgeog do?”
40021024	Yesus di yubu degna´ sig ag lebog di: “Na babe a´un ag isina´ yubu dogne isibusunun, anda a´undi Nayag yubu degna´ ombadnululum wenena, Neri a´un ag sa´a ura bo una´ ulamnange babe a´un ag lebnuna´
40021025	Yohanes di mag dolonglamsiogne na asa uboga do?” Eim asag uboga di goma nimi di gom? Ba, sig moumun selelbindoga lebeg dina: “Nundi lebeb di, ‘eim asag uboga´ abeb wenena Eildi nun ag leble di, ‘Ane so wenena a´un na sa´a se alag odseig seinilimlom gom do?’ selag aboga.
40021026	Bog nun na ‘Nimi di’ abgob wenena, nunna log, sig nimi nisin dina´ Yohanes damen omoladsina´ne seinilimanga´ se.”
40021027	Wera sigdi yubu degna´ Yesus ag lebeg dina: “Nunna wangan” abeg, ba Yesus di babe sig ag lebog di: “Ane so wenena Neri bo ulamnange nisin babe a´un ag lebnun gom.”
40021028	“Bog ununa´ nene se a´undi sembia na sa´a so? Nimi dogne eildi mabo nengmabo besenenge, anda alna eildi me yandonge ag bindoga lebog di: ‘Neri me lei, sum nene anna anggur wee ag welbulom.’
40021029	Ba me nenege yubu degna´ na: ‘Nana yo gom’ seog dog, eildi gange samboga on anggur wee ag biog.
40021030	Gigib wenena sig eleyong na websange ag bindoga neigne lebog, ba nenege di yubu degna´ na: ‘Ayong od seleb’ abog dog, alna biog gom.
40021031	Sig besene mabo abenege na edne aga sigleyong di yonge ag dagoma unubayog do?” Ba sigdi yubu degna´: “Damenne”. Yesus di sig ag lebog di: “Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun, wase mologoga don nimi ab yolsagna´ gelabo ab na, Eimayong damag una´ se una´ ag na, a´un aro, bog sig damen wa´ugonga´.
40021032	Anese Yohanes na a´un ag bisig sirigne omoladyesiog, bog a´un na alag odseig sembiblum gom. Bog wase moloboga don nimi ab, yolsagna´ gelabo ab aga na alag odseig sembibeg. Anda a´un na al eiblum dog, a´un na noroldana´ gange una´ gom di, alag odseig sembiblum gom.”
40021033	“Yog sununa´ yubu dogne gegbululum: Wee deiya´ne dogne anggur wee webog di alna lega´ dobganegayog. Di anggur mag loldena´ se alna sogo logog, di wee anege wena´ se ee dogne bebnag moroboga sobog. Gigib wenena wee nenege na wee wen nimi ag se-se deibog, di yog mog sogo ag biog.”
40021034	Anggur do dagna´ beram li ubog wenege na, wee deiya´ne na wee wen nimi ag al se arob galdo dagoga deibnugong aboga eildi ouragna´ nimi bogoldogolyesiog.
40021035	Bog wee wen nimi danege di, eildi ouragna´ nimi abenege salbesieg, di nimi dogne na yaga´ obeg, ba nimi dogne na obeg ba somagdobog, on nimi dogne na girig di saboga obeg.
40021036	Gigib ba, wee deiya´ne benege na on yog ouragna´ nimi bogoldogolyesiog, sig na nimi dina´ log yayeg damen ya´ilameg nimi so gom, bog sig babe siggabo ag umsieg songe neigne ubsieg.
40021037	Goggobdagna´ na al eildi me sig ag bulom aboga bogdebelyayog di lebog dina: ‘Neri me wenena sig na giboga dobgonga´ aboga’ sembibog di.
40021038	Bog wee wen nimi danege na eildi me eibig wenege na sig moumun lebongdanggayeg di, ‘Alna meisa´ dobnebnea´ anda, eildi meisa´ na nun dinge danggulul aboga nunna al obgob’ seyeg.
40021039	Sig na al salbayeg, di anggur wee lega´ beiyag samo boblamboga yaga´ obeg, ba somagdobog.
40021040	“Wera wee anggur deiya´ne benege yaso wenena, wee wen nimi ag anege na sa´ubso do?”
40021041	Sigdi Alag lebeg dina: “Alna yoo gange nimi danege oboga gom ubsiso, di eildi anggur wee na on se-se yog nimi ag deibso, ba do dagna´ li na al damneng ag dodneb nimi ag dodsoa´.”
40021042	Yesus di sig ag lebog dina, “A´un na Eimayong di yubu lomag mome dorobne na eildina´ gom de? ‘Ee son nang di borebdob girig nenege na, gigib diga´ yangadanggayog. Ununa´ nenege na Ayong Weigne di ununa´, nundi ising ag budna´ ningginge.’
40021043	Anese, Neri a´un ag lemna, Eimayong damag una´ se na, a´un ag uboga doble di, do mulamgong aboga yog as nimi ag dodsulula´!
40021044	Nimi dogne girig nene ag malyunggili nimi alna soldebulula´, bog nimi dogne girig nenege di siglibal nimi alna ob werebulula´.”
40021045	Anese Eimayong di ee ag imam ousa´nang ab, Farisi nang ab na Yesus di sununa´ yubu leboga´ gegbayeg, di wenege na Eildi lemla yubu nong nene na nun se lemla aboga eel ubeg.
40021046	Anda signa Yesus salbugob aboga yo yabeg, bog signa nimi dina´ ag log ubeg, nimi nisin Yesus na damen omoladsina´ne seinilimega´ se.
40022001	Yesus na on nimi dina´ ag sununa´ yubu nene babe lebog:
40022002	“Eim asag Eimayong damag una´ se sununa´ na borobne dogne eildi me gelabo dona´ se seni yolameldo songe ulamla.
40022003	Eildi ouragna´ nimi ag gelabo dona´ ag eildi leibog nimi seni delyugong, ba bialbusululum aboga bogdebsiog, bog eildi leiyamog nimi danege na yayeg gom.
40022004	Ba on eildi yog ouragna´ nimi babe bogdebsiog di lebog dina: ‘Neri leiyamna nimi ag na leblulum di: Od seig gwaneng na gigib dengoga deibna, anda sapi yem ab neri wenilamnange ab gigib ora yumna, anda nisin gigib gedneban, ba gelabo dona´ se seni yumna ag ane yugong.’
40022005	Bog eildi leiyamog nimi danege na dolbalag ubeg, di nimi dara sigdi wee ag bindibeg, ba on dara nimi na sigdi unne ag bindibeg.
40022006	Yog nimi di na eildi ouragna´ nimi salerobsieg, di giliboga ulamsieg di yaga´ obsieg.
40022007	Wera borobne benege na yooberigayog, di eildi ouragna´ nimi omsieg nimi nenege obsieg, di sigdi as eyugu dabsugong aboga yin bon nang bogibsiog.
40022008	Gigib wenena eildi ouragna´ nimi ag eildi lebog dina: ‘Geldona´ se seni na gigib gedneban, bog ousa leiyamna nimi na sunum unubanmen gom.
40022009	Wera anese a´un na weig bisig gan-gan ag bululum, di seila´ nimi aga a´undi eiblulum nimi nenege gelabo dona´ seni ag leiya beyusululum.’
40022010	Wera eildi ouragna´ nimi na weig bisig ag bieg, di nimi nisin ebbisidanggayeg nimi na boloboga dobsieg, meili nimi babe besarob nimi babe, anda gel dona´ se seni yumeg ee nenegena nimi ba´ nimi di degnebayeg.
40022011	Borobne benege nimi ba´ nimi ab ebbisidanggugob aboga wa´iog wenege na, alna nimi dogne gelabo dona´ se seni deneb ongon bagsum onggamog gom nimi dogne eibog.
40022012	Eildi alag lebog dina. ‘Na´e lei, anna sa´ase gelabo dona´ se seni deneb ongon bagsum onggamlam gom do?’ Bog nimi nenege na yubu lena´ babe lebog gom.
40022013	Wera borobne benege na eildi ouragna´ nimi ag lebog di: ‘Eildi yan ab see ab soubu goublulum di nimi nenege na yaga´ gunu nong lomag dora naglulum, ba anege ag ab na engelamle di si glingdereb nororob ara ulamlula´!’
40022014	Anese nimi dina´ bialamsil, bog nimi moga´ og weblamsil.”
40022015	Gigib wenena Farisi nimi na bieg di, sa´a so yubu di Yesus na mednebal abgob aboga isilbiyeg.
40022016	Sigdi dirigoga bana´ nimi ab, Herodes nimi ab bogdebsieg, ba Alag isibayeg: “Omoladsina´ne lei, nunna eel Anna sirig urububne, anda Eimayong bisig sirig urububne omoladlamsilam, An babe na nimi ag log ulamsilam gom, anese Anna nimi a´osing ag mibsing gomne.
40022017	Eindi sembiamlamne nun ag leblom: Kaisar senge degna´ na od seleb degnemen gom gom gom?”
40022018	Bog Yesus na sigdi meili gange di lebega´ eel ubsiog di lebog dina: “Yal babna´ nimi lei, a´unna sa´ase Nayag sunulamnelom do?
40022019	A´undi degneb wase nenege a´osing Nayag ombadnululum.” Ba sig na girig wase dinar dogne Alag beyayeg.
40022020	Yesus di sigag isibesiog di: “Anena edne di sunuruba´ ab mome doroba´ ab do?”
40022021	Sigdi yubu degna´ na: “Kaisar di sunuruba´ ab mome doroba´ ab” abeg. Ba Yesus di sig ag lebog dina: “Kaisar ag dodgob arobne wenena Kaisar ag dodlulum, Eimayong ag dodgob arobne wenena Eimayong ag dodlulum.”
40022022	Nenege gegbayeg di signa budna´ lebla aboga Yesus ag loboga bindibeg.
40022023	Sum nenege na Saduki nimi edbare Yesus ag yayeg. Signa somagdob nimi na on gamyag bugogong goma´ arob nimia´ anda, sig na Alag isibayeg.
40022024	“Omoladsina´ne lei, Musa di lebog dina: Nenge dogne alna me gom, bog somagdoble wenena, eildi gel genegena alga di doble di, alga benege ouling ag al yena´ mangadangden bugong aboga amog.
40022025	Bog nun gan-gan ag nun nang nunggabo segbare od, anda yandonge na gel dobog di me gom, bog somagdobog, ba alna eildi yena´ mangadangden bana´ gom se eildi gel genege na alga se louya biog.
40022026	Besenenge babe neigne ubog di, wenelinge babe neigne ununu segag dageg.
40022027	Unulamog di goggobdagna´ na genege babe somagdobog.
40022028	Somagdob nimi gamyag bugilisili sum nenege, genege na sig segbare nang di doroba´ anda edne di gel danggulula´ do? Anese genege na nisin nang di gel umoga´ se.”
40022029	Wera sigag Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “A´un na mednena´ nang, anese a´un na Weig Yubu ab Eimayong di migib ab ag na besa eel ulamlom gom.
40022030	Anese sum nenege na, nimi na gelabo doboga on dobdangden balamgong gom, bog besarob eim nang songe ulamgonga´.
40022031	Bog somagdob nimi gamyag bugilisina´ se Eimayong di lerob yubu ag na eildina´ gom de?
40022032	‘Nana Abraham di Eimayong, Ishak di Eimayong, Yakub di Eimayong’? Alna somagdob nimi di Eimayong gom, bog gamyag nimi di Eimayong.”
40022033	Nimi dina´ na Eildi omoladsina´ yubu nenege gegbayeg wenena, budna´ aboga ngalaglameg.
40022034	Wera Farisi nimi na, Saduki nimi Yesus di yubu gom ubsil arob yubu gegbayeg wenena, signa mamogayeg.
40022035	Sig nang dogne na, Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ geremne di, Alag sumbugob aboga isibayog.
40022036	“Omoladsina´ne lei, Damen Wenena´ Yubu lomag ab yaga´ a´osing agne na nesa aga do?”
40022037	Alag Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “Ayong Weigne a´undi Eimayong ag wana´ ulamlulum, a´undi gange nisin ab, a´undi gange gamyaga´ nisin ab, a´undi besa seinilina´ nisin ab di.
40022038	Yubu nene aga oumunggun a´osing agne ulamla.
40022039	Yubu besenenge neig songe na: ‘A´undi nong wana´ uldalamlom songe a´unggabo yog nimi ag babe wana´ ulamsululum.’
40022040	Besene yubu abene di aga Damen Wenena´ Yubu nisin ab, damen omoladsina´ nang di lerob yubu nisin ab na, yubu abene nong ag ulamla.”
40022041	Farisi nimi na anege ag aro longolameg wenege na, Yesus di sigag isibesiog, di Eildi lebog dina:
40022042	“Kristus se na a´undi seinilina´ na sa´a do? Alna edne di Me do?” Ba sigdi Alag lebeg dina: “Daud di Me.”
40022043	Sig ag Eildi lebog dina: “Ane so wenena, sa´a ura Daud na Geid Gange di boboga alna ‘Ayong Weigne’ alamog? Eildi lemog wenege:
40022044	Ayong Weigne di yubu, Neri Ayong Weigne ag lebog di: ‘Neri sirig see ag seig buglom, ba Neri anag malborob nimi na, Eindi yan damag deibnun murub.’
40022045	Wera Daud di Alna neri ‘Ayong Weigne’ aboga sibog dog, alna eildi me wenena sa´a ura do?”
40022046	Nimi dognog babe Yesus ag yubu degna´ lebeg gom. Anda sum nenege ag uboga na Alag bosa´ goma´ nimi dognog di babe isilameg gom.
40023001	Wenena Yesus di sig nimi dina´ ag ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag ab Eildi lebog dina:
40023002	“Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab Farisi nimi ab na, gigib Musa di buna´ ag bugeg.
40023003	Anese sigdi a´un ag yogne-yogne ombadsiegne nenegena, unura balamlulum. Bog sig di ununa´ na ulmurung gom, aneso signa omoladlamsildong, bog unulameldong goma´ se.
40023004	Signa igina´ gouboga nimi di sa´o ag bolimsildong, bog sig nong di og na beldogna´ gom.
40023005	Sigdi unulameldong wee nisin na nimi di eibsugong arobne og ulameldong, di sig na weya´ bagsum onggoga doa yubu weya´ gili-gili balameldong.
40023006	Signa seni yomna´ ag na besarob ouling ag bugob yo ulamang, di weig yubu dona´ ee ag na a´osing ag nonogoga besarob buna´ ag buna´ yo ulameldong.
40023007	Signa nimi di pasar ag ab giboga dosina´ ab, omoladsina´ne aboga omoladsina´ne ana´ aga yo ulamang.
40023008	Bog a´un na ‘omoladsina´ne’ absinmen gom, anese a´undi Omoladsina´ne na dognog anda a´un nisin na algabo.
40023009	A´undi sogo ag ane ab nimi dognog babe ‘ayong’ aboga biang gom, anese a´undi Ayong na dognog nenege na a´undi Ayong alna eim asagne.
40023010	A´undi babe ‘bo mengesinne’ ang gom, anese a´undi Bo Mengesinne dognog benege na Kristus.
40023011	A´un gan-gan ag nimi dogne weigne danggana´ yo wenena, alna a´undi wee wenne danggulul.
40023012	Nimi dogne bebnag neneldalamla wenena, alna sogo ag danggulula´ bog, nimi dogne sogag neneldalamle wenena, alna bebnag danggulula´.”
40023013	“A´un Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab a´un Farisi nimi ab lei, a´un na ongei arob ulimsil, a´un yalbabna´ nimi lei, anese a´un na nimi a´osing ag eim asag Eimayong damag una´ se bisig isigin sereglamlom. Anese a´un na wa´inib gom nimi dog, sig wa´ugob aboga yo yablamang nimi se basa´ sereglamsilom.
40023014	[A´un Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab a´un Farisi nimi ab lei, a´un na ongei arob ulimsil, a´un yalbabna´ nimi lei, anese a´un na geiriya´ gelabo di ee dolda´ ulamlom di nimi a´osing ag meilinge gomne aboga a´a mere abna, di doa yubu weya´ leble balamlom. Anese a´un na yaga´ iginne weiga´ dobluluma´.]
40023015	A´un Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab a´un Farisi nimi ab lei, a´un na ongei arob ulimsil, a´un yalbabna´ nimi lei, anese a´un na weig mag laut goubgu balamlom, di mog sogo dongolgiriglamlom, di nundi gibna´ ag dirigoga ban nimi danggulul aboga ulamlom, ba noroldana´ gange di gigib danggan bog, a´undi alna ug dan asag nimi dangilimlom, anda a´un babe od bog, alna yaga´ eildi yoo na li salag besene dangalamla.
40023016	A´un na ongei arob ulimsil, ising lum nimi aga bo mengesin nimi lei, lemlom di na Eimayong di ee si ag uboga lelimlomne nenege na sunum urubub lelimlom gom. Bog Eimayong di ee ag ab emas si ag uboga leiya gublamlom.
40023017	A´un wou nimi ab ising lum nimi lei, sa´a aga bebnag emas aga goma Eimayong di ee di emas anege geis ulamla gom?
40023018	Deilina´ ouling si ag lebgong wenena nene na sunum gom. Bog oboga doladna´ si ag lebgongne na, lena´ nenege na gigib goubdob ulamla.
40023019	A´un ising lum nimi lei, sa´a aga bebnag, oboga doladna´ aga goma deilina´ ouling na oboga doladna´ di geis ulimeldo gom?
40023020	Anese nimi dogne di deilina´ ouling si ag lemla wenena alna deilina´ ouling si ag ab yogne-yogne anege eilib od ne si ag lemla.
40023021	Nimi dogne di Eimayong di ee si ag lemla wenena, alna Eimayong di ee si ag ab Al lomag ulamlange di si ag ab lemla.
40023022	Nimi dogne di eim asag si ag ab lemla wenena, alna Eimayong di buna´ si ag ab al buna´ eilib bulamlange si ag ab lemla.
40023023	A´un Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab a´un Farisi nimi ab lei, a´un na ongei arob ulimsil, a´un yalbabna´ nimi lei, anese a´undi Eimayong se sa´songe deilina´ na song ba´ ab, adas do soonge ab, jintan do ab aga doladlamlom bog, Damen Wenena´ Yubu lomag bebnagne na loldoglamlom: nenege na sunum urububne ab, wana´ usina´ ab, yeng gange una´ ab, anda nisin besene unulamlulum, dara louya dara og unung gom.
40023024	A´un ising lum nimi aga bo mengesin nimi lei, a´unda´ mag dena´ lomag esena´ wa´ilam nange na gyaboga dolamlom bog, unta´ umna´ na gona´alenglamlom.
40023025	A´un Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab a´un Farisi nimi ab lei, a´un na ongei arob ulimsil, a´un yalbabna´ nimi lei, anese a´undi dena´ yangana´ mag ma´i na eilibag seig og leglamlom di, lomag samo wenena alaboga ubna di neri og danggunun arob una´ aga degnewaboga ulamlom.
40023026	A´un Farisi ising lum nimi lei, a´undi ma´i yabna´ lomag seig damen besa leglulum, ba weilag seig babe besa legdoba´ ublul aboga.
40023027	A´un Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab a´un Farisi nimi ab lei, a´un na ongei arob ulimsil, a´un yalbabna´ nimi lei, anese a´un na nimi deilin ag geis na deiruba´, anda ising gemena´ eilibnag seig na besa legdoba´ bog, lomag samona´ youa´ neleng ab yog-yog meili sugurubne degnewaboga ulamlom.
40023028	A´un babe neigne ulamlom, eilibag seig nimi di ising gemesina´ na sirig nimi ulamlom bog lomag samo na yalbabna´ gange ab meili yoo gange ab aga degnewaboga ulamlom.”
40023029	“A´un Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab a´un Farisi nimi ab lei, a´un na ongei arob ulimsil, a´un yalbabna´ nimi lei, Anese a´un na damen omoladsina´ nang sogo wangasina´ soboga, sirig nimi sogo wangaroba´ ag ee soroba´ besarob memelamlom.
40023030	Anda lemlom dina: ‘Nun na nunisang yabo wilman ulamseb wenege na, damen omoladsina´ nang olamsiega´ ab anege na nun babe sig ab nason unubaseb goma´.’
40023031	Bog a´un dama´ di lag leldalamlom dina, nun na damen omoladsina´ nang obsieg nimi yena´ alamlom.
40023032	Aneso wenena a´un eisang yabo di sununa´ ag ura goggob dagluluma´.
40023033	A´un baga´ lei, a´un na baga´ gei yena´! A´un na sa´a ura ug dan asag igin-iginne blebdanggululuma´ do?
40023034	Gedsu anese aboga nana damen omoladsina´ nang ab, gerem deiya´ nimi ab Damen Wenena´ Yubu gerem nimi ab bogdebelyesene ba: sig dara nimi na a´undi oboga galag glabsululum di, yog nimi dara na dona´ ee ag ab a´undi giliboga olamsululum di, a´un na as dogne ag uboga on as dogne ag ora balamsululuma´.
40023035	A´un na mednena´ gom nimi di eneng see ag uruba´ anege na od a´un ag danggulula´, sirig nimi Habel ag eilniboga Berekhya mamne Zakharia na deilina´ ouling geis legdoba´ ag gan Eimayong di ee gan-gan ag ab obluma´ se.
40023036	Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun: Nene nisin na wene salag ulamang nimi nene di see ag danggulula´ anda.”
40023037	“Yerusalem, Yerusalem an damen omoladsina´ nang ab, Neri a´un ag bogdob nimi ab ag girig di nagoga obsulum, ba Nana a´undi mabo dolmamogsina´ yo ulamna, ayam eima´ di eilda´ me gol damag longelimsildo songe ulamsin, bog a´un na yo gom.
40023038	Gedlulum, a´undi ee nene na nimi di lobogeg ba, nimi yubu gom uboga deso aroblula´.
40023039	Neri a´un ag lebnun, a´un na wene ag uboga Nana eibnululum goma´, anda a´undi lemlulum dina, ‘Al Ayong Weigne si ag uboga yayogne na besirub,’ alamluluma´.”
40024001	Gigib wenena Yesus na Eimayong di ee ag uboga langgindoga biog, ba Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi na ya´indoga Eimayong di ee soroba´ danege omoladyayeg.
40024002	Eildi sig ag lebog dina: “A´un na nisin eiblom de? Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun, girig dane babe na dognog girig na yog degdob girig eilib ulamlul goma´. Bog nisin na doulubugonga´.”
40024003	Yesus na Zaitun mein ag bindoga bulamog wenege na Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi na Alab nun og yubu lenggob aboga Alag yayeg. Sigdi lebeg dina: “Nun ag leblom nenege nisin na ed sum aga danggulul di, An yanggana´ se gednebne ab sogo goggobdagna´ se gednebne babe leblom?”
40024004	Sig ag Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “Nimi di mednena´ yubu a´un ag lebsiyigag aboga weldalamlulum.
40024005	Anese nimi dina´ na Neri si ag leboga yugonga´ anda, sigdi lebeg dina: ‘Nana Kristus’ sugonga´ di nimi dina´ ag mednerobne ulimsugonga´.
40024006	A´un na mal lilim goma mal bana´ yubu gom, gegbululum di wenena, log ung gom, bog weldalamlulum. Anese nene nisin na unubulula´ bog, goggobdagna´ sum na aro.
40024007	Anese yog mog sogo nimi di on yog mog sogo nimi ag mal boldalamgonga´, anda yog weig borob as nimi ab on yog weig borob as nimi ab mal boldalamgonga´ bog, yog ag-yog ag nisin gwaneng yo babe sa´uma´ babe ulamlula´.
40024008	Bog nene nisin na wenogne wilman dangana´ se igin-iginne eilnildoglula´.
40024009	Sum nenege na, a´un na deboga obsugong aboga dodsieg ba, a´un na obsieg, di Neri si se aboga yog as nisin di goroglamsugonga´.
40024010	Sum nenege na nimi dina´ na losomboga on meilinge ag balameg, di weidnildana´ ab gorogoldana´ ab ulamgonga´.
40024011	Sonda´ yubu omoladsin nang dina´ langgiyig di, nimi dina´ ab mednena´ne ulimsugonga´.
40024012	Anese meili ununa´ weiga´ danggale wenena nimi dina´ di wana´ gange saregen danggulula´.
40024013	Bog lignibonggia ulamle murub goggobdagna´ sum nenege uble nimi na bleblula´.
40024014	Eimayong damag una´ se Besarob Yubu nenege na mog sogo nimi nisin ag omoladlamsieg ba yog as nisin se lag lena´ danggulula´ anda nenege gigib wenegaga goggobdagna´ danggulula´.”
40024015	“Damen omoladsina´ne Daniel di lemog yubu ag lebda a´un na ‘meili nemboga gom ubsinebne’ geis ouling ag segleba eibluluma´ anda (eildilamlulum nimi na besa eel ulamlulum).
40024016	Wenena Yudea nimi nisin na meinag seig bologa baldomgonga´.
40024017	Nimi dogne ee aroma´ eilib umle wenena alna damnang ee lomag dobnun aboga yonggang gom.
40024018	Nimi dogne wee ag ulamle dog, bagsum dobnun aboga losomboga yanggang gom.
40024019	Sum nenege na me borob gelabo goma, me moum dinilamle gel gom na ongei arob ulamgonga´.
40024020	A´un na muru sum goma, Besen Sum gom langgiyebag aboga doa yubu lemlulum.
40024021	Anese sum nenege na ingmunne nonggela´ danggulula´, oumunggun sogo uliog wenenge uboga wene babe urub gomne anda yogsum babe danggulul gomne.
40024022	Eimayong di unun salag na buruma´ ubso gom wenena nimi babe blebso gom. Bog Eildi webdob nimi se wenege salag na buruma´ ubog.
40024023	Sum nenege babe na, nimi di a´un ag lebig dina: ‘Kristus na ane ag od’ goma ‘Alna aneged od’ abig wenena a´un na odseig seiniling gom.
40024024	Anese yogsum na sonda´ Kristus ab, sonda´ omoladsina´ nimi ab yugonga´, anda signa gedneb-gednebne yaga´ weiga´ ab, budna´ ubnemen gomne ab ulamgonga´. Wera ane so una´ di Eildi webdob nimi ag mednena´ne ubsenmena´ anda.
40024025	Neri damen a´un ag lerob yubu nenege na besa seinimubiblulum.
40024026	Wera nimi di a´un ag lebig di: ‘Gere Alna bubsya´ ag aneged od ulamla’ abig wenena, a´un na anegag banggom; goma ‘Gere Alna ee lomag od’ abeg wenena, a´un na odseig seiniling gom.
40024027	Anese beba´ lesengom aldogna, di yale seig uboga gesengban samo waralamla songe, neigne na, yog sum Sogo Nimi di Me yanggala´ babe neigne unubulula´.
40024028	Somagdoba´ dogne blolamna´ ag na winang nazar ya´indoga oumulameldong.”
40024029	“Ingmun iginne gigib dangaldogle sabseibi wenege na, eseng na gunu danggulula´, wal na diman warabulul goma´, eim ag gura´ na daga-daga malyongalamgonga´, ba eim ag borobne nisin na warelamgonga´.
40024030	Sum nenegaga na Sogo Nimi di Me yanggana´ se eim ag geneb gednebne dangalamle, ba sogo nimi nisin na eibig di engelamgonga´ anda, Sogo Nimi di Me na deb gan-gan ag Eildi bebnagne nisin ab, migibne nisin ab yalamle ba signa ising eibgonga´.
40024031	Anda Eildi besarob eim nang bogibsili ba bu ana´ yubu nonggela´ bualameg, di Eildi webdob nimi dolmamoglamsugong wenena, mog sogo gwaga´ dombare ag uboga, anda eim mod-mod dognag uboga on eim mod-mod dognag ab.”
40024032	“Gal ara ag sununa´ yubu na doblulum: Wera gal go egag ubna di digoga mog wabna di ba´ salamla wenena, dou wal dobla aboga a´un na eel ulamlom.
40024033	A´un na ununa´ nene dangaldogle ba eiblulum wenena sum na gigib beram danggamla´ anda isigin nong ag umla.
40024034	Nana sirig yubu a´un ag lemna: ‘Ununa´ nene nisin na wene ane ulamang salag nimi nisin na somagna´ aro bog nene unubulula´.
40024035	Eim ab sogo ab na eimig gom urublula´ bog, Neri lerob yubu na gom urublul goma´.’
40024036	Bog li ab sum ab na nimi dognog babe eel gom, besarob eim nang babe, Eildi me babe eel gom, Alna Ayong og eel.”
40024037	“Anese Sogo Nimi di Me yanggale sum nenege na, Nuh wilnib umog ununa´ songe neigne ublula´.
40024038	Mag wenena´ aro wilman wenege na, nimi na mag ab gwaneng ab deroga gel dobdanggoga unura balameg murub, Nuh mag ee ag wa´iog sum nenege danggayog.
40024039	Mag wemba ya´indoga sig nisin obsineba´ anege aro wenege na, signa eimig yogne ubnebne na wangan umeg, anda Sogo Nimi di Me goggobdagna´ yanggala´ babe neigne unubulula´.
40024040	Sum nenege na nimi besene wee ag ulamdig bog, nimi dogne loboga nimi dogne na dobulula´.
40024041	Gelabo besene girig do olamdig bog, gel dogne dobili di gel dogne na loboglula´.
40024042	Anese a´un na weldalamlulum. Ayong Weigne yanggana´ sum nenege na a´un wangan se.
40024043	Bog nene na eel ulamlulum: Ee deiya´ nimi dogne enimnag na asoga´ donne yunubulamna´ eel ubna wenena, alna gigib welgweleglameldo eildi ee na goblul aboga diloblameldo gom.
40024044	Anese a´un na besa gednelamlulum. Sogo Nimi di Me na a´undi sum nen aga yulul seinirub gom bog yulula´ anda. ”
40024045	“Ouragna´ nimi nesa aga besa dagoma gerem ulameldo, al ayong salerobne di sig yog uragna´ nimi si ag gwaneng den jam nenege doladlamsulul aboga sigirub?
40024046	Al na alayong di uragdob wee welamle bog alayong ya´ina eiblul wenena, ouragna´ nimi nenege na ngingyang ulamlul.
40024047	Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun: Alayong di alna eildinge nisin welamlul aboga sigiblula´.
40024048	Bog ouragna´ne benege na meili yoo gangenge wenena, eildi gange lomag leble di na,
40024049	Na´nayong na salerobne na berera yalamla gomba aboga, alna yog ouragna´ nimi olamsil, di alna serem song mag deroga serem sebna nimi ab nason gwaneng mag dera ulamang.
40024050	Gigib wenena eildi ayong al salerobne na wene salag yulula´ arob gom sum ab jam nen ag yulula´ aboga eel umle gomne ag yulula´.
40024051	Anda alna olamle di yalbabna´ nimi ag ubneb songe neigne uble, ba anegag ab na engelamle di si glengdereb nororob alamlula´.”
40025001	“Eim ag Eimayong damag una´ se sum nenege sununa´ na: goubini gelabo sa´o bare di ug wesa´ dobeg, di gel dobnebne yalamog, ba bisig ag dilibil bieg.
40025002	Anda gelabo lambare na wou gelabo, bog on lambare gelabo na gerem gelabo.
40025003	Wou gelabo abenege na, ug wesa´ na bomeg bog ug mag na bomeg gom.
40025004	Bog gerem gelabo abenege na, ug wesa´ dinina´ babe ug mag babe sigda´ bona´ lomag gedneboga bomeg.
40025005	Bog gel dobnebne na yanggana´ gom-gom mandelamog wenena sig na wi dong-dang aboga a´osing manggunug mabeg.
40025006	Ee enimnag dug-dug anag abenege gegeldogeg ba, leldogeg di: ‘Geldobnebne yal! Bisig ag al dolbululum!’
40025007	Goubini gelabo danege babe na bugoga sigda´ ug wesa´ dinina´ memelameg.
40025008	Bog wou gelabo abenege, di gerem gelabo ag lebeg di: ‘A´undi ug mag moga´ dogne nun dodsululum, nundi wesa´ na sabdobneb uldogla abeg.’
40025009	Gerem gelabo abenege di yubu degna´ na: ‘Gom, nun ab a´un ab se na sunum gom ba, a´un na ug mag deglamang nimi ag bindoga anege ag a´un senge deglulum.’
40025010	Bog signa degelbilameg salag wenegaga, gelabo dobnebne benege na yayog, ba sig gigib gednameg nimi na al ab nason gel dobneb ee ag wa´indoga isigin seregayeg.
40025011	Gigib ba dara goubini gelabo babe ya´ina lebeg di: ‘Ayong, Ayong, nun ag isigin gubsulom!’
40025012	Bog eildi yubu degna´ na: ‘Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun, anda a´unna nana wangan!’
40025013	Anese aboga weldalamlulum, a´un na li ab jam ab wangan se.”
40025014	“Anese ununa´ nene na nimi dogne mog sogo ag bunun aboga ulameldo songe, anda eildi ouragna´ nimi biaboga eildi damnang na sigag deilimeldo.
40025015	Nimi dogne ag na lambare girig wase talenta doara, nimi dogne agna girig wase talenta besene dorog, di on nimi dogne ag na girig wase talenta dognog dorog, anda sigdi ubgong arobne ag lebda eleb-eleb dodsiog, di alna biog.
40025016	Lambare girig wase talenta dobog nimi nenegena, berera bindoga nimi ag obog, di on lambare dobog.
40025017	Besene girig wase talenta dobog nimi nenege babe na neigne unubayog, di on besene dobog.
40025018	Bog dognog girig wase talenta dobog nimi nenege na, biog di alayong di wase na sogo gurugoga dognobayog.
40025019	Uldablamoga´ anda ouragna´ nimi di ayong on gigib yayog wenena, sig ab eildilameg.
40025020	Lambare girig wase talenta domog nimi nenege na, on lambare oboga beyayog di, lebog dina: ‘Ayong lei, wase lambare dodnuluma´ anege na neri obnonge na on lambare wase dobno.’
40025021	Alayong di alag lebog dina: ‘Eindi unubayumne na yaga´ besarob ubom, ba anna neri ouragna´ne besa yengne! An mog ununa´ ab besa yeng ubum, ba nana weig ununa´ ublul aboga weig ununa´dodgunun. An ayong di ngingyangne ag wa´ilim di dirigoga unulamlom.’
40025022	Gigib wenena girig wase besene talenta domog nimi nenege ya´ina lebog dina: ‘Ayong lei, wase besene dodnuluma´ anege na, gedlom neri gigib obnonge na on besena´ ane.’
40025023	Alayong di alag lebog dina: ‘Eindi unubayumne na yaga´ besarob ubom ba, anna neri ouragna´ne besa yengne! An mog ununa´ ab besa yeng ubum ba nana weig ununa´ ublul aboga weig ununa´dodgunun. An ayong di ngingyangne ag wa´ilim di dirigoga unulamlom.’
40025024	Wene na dognog girig wase talenta domog nimi nenege ya´ina lebog di: ‘Ayong nana eel anna gange gas geseba´nea´, anda eindi yena´ dogamna goma´ ag babe do daglameldom, di eindi yena´ memna goma´ ag babe daglameldomne aboga.
40025025	Anese nana logba ayong eindi girig wase talenta anege na sogo lumag dognolbisi: anda ayong einda´ doroblom.’
40025026	Ba alayong di yubu degna´ na: ‘Yoonge aga mesangne lei, anna eel bog, asa digum aga neri yena´ dogdob gomne ag ab, neri yena´ merob gomne ag ab na daglamneldo dore?
40025027	Aneso wenena, neri girig wase talenta na yogne obolbulul nimi ag dodlem, ba obolbulul, anda na yanggane sum na yog ma´arobne ab dobnun aboga.
40025028	Anese aboga alag girig wase talenta nenege na doboga girig wase talenta sa´o bare od nimi ag dorog.
40025029	Anese sig dinge od nimi ag na on doladlamsildong ba, eildinge dina´ sunum dangalameldo. Bog nimi dogne yogne od gomne na, sa´a songe alag odne na alag uboga doroblula´.
40025030	Obbil arob gom ouragna´ nimi nene na, alna yaga´ gunu nong lomag dora naglulum ba, anege ag ab na engelamle, di si glingdereb nororob ara ulamlula´!’ ”
40025031	“Sogo Nimi di Me yalamle sum nenege na Eildi bebnagne ab, Eildi besarob eim nang nisin ab, isiboga yayeg, di Alna Eildi bebnagne ab buna´ag bulamlula´.
40025032	Yog-yog sogo nimi nisin Al eiba´ ag longgibsile, di Eildi nimi dognog-dognog weboga doreblamsulula´, domba wenne di domba yog, gambing yog, uraweblamsildo songe.
40025033	Domba nisin na Eildi sirig see ag seig doreblamsili, di gambing nisin na Eildi waneng see ag seig doreblamsulula´.
40025034	Borobne benege di Eildi sirig se ag seig nimi ag leble dina: ‘Yululum, a´un Na´nayong di besirub nimi anda, sogo ulina´ aro bog a´un se meisa´ gigib gedneboga deibsioga´ doblulum.
40025035	Anese Nana gwaneng yo ulamneog wenege na, Nana a´undi gwaneng doladlamnulum, ba delamsi, Nana mag yo unin wenege na a´undi mag doladlamnulum, ba Nana delamsi, Nana nimi asag nimi ulamsi wenege na a´undi ee ag doboga eibnulum.
40025036	Na nong baneng ulamsi wenege na, a´undi bagsum dodnulum. Nana neiglamsi wenege na a´undi Na wesibnulum, Na dolongsina´ lomag ulamsi wenege na, a´undi Na gemelbalamnulum.’
40025037	Sirig nimi danege di yubu degna´ Alag lebeg dina: ‘Ayong Weigne lei, edsum aga Anna gwaneng yo ulamgeog, ba nundi Anag gwaneng doladlamguyub goma Anna ed sum aga mag yo ulamgeog, ba nundi mag doladlamguyub do?
40025038	Ed sum na Anna nimi asag nang ulamlum, ba nundi ee ag doboga deibguyub goma edsum aga Anna nong baneng ulamlum ba nundi Anag bagsum dodguyub do?
40025039	Ed sum aga An na neiglamlum goma, dolongsina´ ag dobonggiyamgeyeg, ba nun di Anag gemelyagayub do?’
40025040	Borobne benege di sigag yubu degna´ na: ‘Nana sirig yubu a´un ag lebnun, a´un na yogne-yogne nisin na´e damag so nimi dogne ag ane unulamlomne nenege na Na se gigib unulamlom.’
40025041	Anda seig waneng see ag seig nimi ag Eildi leble dina: ‘A´un na Na a´osing ag uboga bululum! A´un na wiboga obdob nimi, Iblis ab eildi meili eim nang ab se gedneboga deirub ug unum unum sabneb gom ug ag bululum.’
40025042	Anese Na gwaneng yo ulamsi wenege na a´undi gwaneng na dodnulum gom. Nana mag yo ulamsi wenege na a´undi mag na dodnulum gom,
40025043	Na nimi asag nang ulamsi wenege na, a´undi ee ag dora deibnulum gom, Na nong baneng ulamsi wenege na, a´undi Na bagsum dodnulum gom, Na neigna´ ab dolongsina´ ag ulamsi wenege na a´undi Nana arolamnulum gom.
40025044	Sigdi babe Alag yubu degna´ lemeg dina: ‘Ayong Weigne lei, edsum aga gwaneng yo goma mag yo goma, nimi asag nang goma nong baneng goma neigna´ goma, dolongsina´ ag gom ulamlum, ba eibguyub dog arobagayub gom do?’
40025045	Ba Eildi yubu degna´ sigag leble dina: ‘Nana sirig yubu a´un ag lebnun, a´undi yogne-yogne damag so nimi ag ane arolamsulum goma´ anege na, Nase babe unulamlum gom.’
40025046	Anda sig na unum-unum se ingmun nonga´ ag wa´ugong, bog sirig nimi na unum-unum se gamyag una´ ag wa´ugonga´.”
40026001	Sum nenege Yesus na Eildi yubu nisin ombadsiog, di Alna Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag lebog.
40026002	“A´un na eel ulamlulum seni Paskah yona´ sumna li besene og ubla. Anda Sogo Nimi di Me na galag glabgonga´ se dodsulula´.”
40026003	Sum nenege na, imam ousa´ nang ab Yahudi sogo salerob nang ab Imam Weigne eildi si na Kayafas di asag longolameg.
40026004	Signa Al Yesus sonda´ yubu leboga saleboga obneba´ se yubu selelameg.
40026005	Bog sig di lebeg dina: “Seni sum na unubugob gom, nimi ulamanga´ seila´ dolbisiyebag aboga.”
40026006	Yesus na Betania asag umog wenege na, kusta susu neiglamogne Simon di ee ag umog,
40026007	ba gel dogne Alag yayog, di alna song besarob mag ma´i degna´ bebnagne dogne beyayog. Anda Yesus na bugoga delamog, bog mag nenege na Yesus di ousa´ yegonggibog.
40026008	Yesus ag dirigoga bana´ nimi na, ununa´ nenege eibeg di a´osing gorogoga lebeg di: “Sa´ase bololamla do?
40026009	Anese besarob song mag anena degna´ bebnag degoga wase na see gom nimi ag doladsina´ bog.”
40026010	Bog Yesus na sigdi seinilina´ eel ubsiog di lebog dina: “Sa´ase a´un na gene ag sagdob yubu lemlom do? Anena eildi besarob ununa´ dogne Nayag ubla.
40026011	See gom nimi na sob-sob a´un ab ulamluluma´, bog Nana a´un ab sob-sob ulamgob goma´.
40026012	Anese mag Neri nong ag yegonggibnela´ anena, Na sogo wangganeneba´ ag se gednamla, di gedneb eel una´ se ubla.
40026013	Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebnun: Besarob Yubu nene na mog sogo nisin ag ombadda yabalamsiyig, di eildi unubalne babe silameg, di al babe seinilimgonga´.”
40026014	Gigib wenena oo bare nang danegaga nimi dogne eildi si na Yudas Iskariot na imam ousa´ nang ag biog,
40026015	di eildi sigag lebog dina: “Neri Alna a´un ag dodsunun wenena, a´undi nayag na sa´a dodnululum do?” Ba signa, wase perak deng dogne di ebna weneli alag doreg.
40026016	Yudas na sum nenege ab eilnibonggia, Yesus na ed sum aga dodsunun aboga garen se elamog.
40026017	Oumunggun Roti Bigna´ Gom seni sum na, Yesus di dirigoga bana´ nimi Alag yayeg di lebig: “Nundi Anse gwaneng seni yoboga gednena´ na asa yag gednebugob do?”
40026018	Ba Yesus di yubu degna´ na weig asag nimi dogne ag bululum di, alag leblulum dina: “Nundi omoladsina´ne di lebla di na: ‘Neri sum na gigib beram ubla ba, Nana eindi ee ag Neri dirigoga bana´ nimi ab seni nason yobgob abla,’ sululum.”
40026019	Wera Eildi di dirigoga bana´ nimi na, Yesus di sigag uragebsiog songe ubeg di seni yoboga gednelbieg.
40026020	Ee gigib eimbayog wenena, Yesus na dirigoga bana´ nimi oo bare ab nason bugoga delameg.
40026021	Signa gwaneng deldogeg wenege na, Eildi lebog dina: “Nana a´un ag sirig lebnun: a´un gan-gan ag ane ab nimi dogne di Na widnibunulula´.”
40026022	Yubu nenege gegboga signa ongei arob eisa´ sig moumun lebongdanggoga Alag lebeg di: “Ayong Weigne lei, nana gom?”
40026023	Eildi yubu degna´ na: “Nayab nason bugoga mag ag soumbonggia dodne nimi nenege di, eildi aga Na widnibunulula´.
40026024	Sogo Nimi di Me na Al se mome ura dorobne ag sumboga danggale wenena bildiblula´, bog nimi na Sogo Nimi di Me widnibulul arob nimi nenege na ongei arob ulamlul. Anda al nimi nenege na mangana´ gom wenena od seleb bog.”
40026025	Yudas Al widnibanebne eildi yubu degna´ lebog dina: “Omoladsina´ne lei, nana gom.” Ba Yesus di alag lebog di: “Al an dama´ di gigib leblam.”
40026026	Signa gwaneng deldogeg wenege Yesus na gwaneng roti dobog di, gibna´ doa yubu leboga gesebseigibog. Di sig Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag dodsiog, di lebog dina: “Anena Neri nong doboga dululum.”
40026027	Nenege gigib ba Al na on girigna´ mag ma´i dobog, di gibna´ doa yubu leboga, sigag dodsiog di lebog dina: “Girigna´ mag ane na a´un nisin dululum.
40026028	Anese anena Neri eneng, leblorub eneng nenege, nimi nisin sigdi meilinge lubna´ se, yeglula´ aboga leblorubne.
40026029	Ane so bog Nana a´un ag lebnun: Wene ab uboga anggur mag ane Neri dunun arob sum aro bog wenena, Nana dunun gom, nenege na wenogne a´un ab nason Na´nayong damag una´ se sum danggale wenegaga dununa´.”
40026030	Gibna´ mos gigib sebeg di wenena, Yesus ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ab na Zaitun mein ag bieg.
40026031	Wera Yesus di sig ag lebog di: “Sum nene enimnag na Nase aboga a´undi odseig seinilina´ na warebusulula´. Anese mome dorob di na: ‘Nana domba wenne obneba´ domba na sen-senengna´ danggugonga´.’
40026032	Ane so bog na Na gigib bugogne wenena, a´un aro bog Na damen Galilea bilamnuna´.”
40026033	Petrus di Alag yubu degna´ lebog dina: “Sigdi odseig seinilina´ na An se aboga log warem abgong, bog na wenena, aneso ubnemen gom.”
40026034	Ba Yesus di alag lebog di: “Nana sirig yubu anag lebnun, sum nene enimnag na ayam yubu li weneli ngoubna´ aro bog anna li weneli Na ebyagnuloma´.”
40026035	Petrus di Alag lebog dina: “Ane so bog nana an ab nason somagdobnoma´, nana An ebyaggunun gom” wenabog, ba dirigoga bana´ nimi dara di babe neig yubu lebeg.
40026036	Gigib wenena Yesus ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ab nason mog sogo dogne si na Getsemani bieg. Di Alna Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi agna lebog dina: “Nana onogo doa yubu lelbilamne wenege na ane ag bulamlulum.”
40026037	Wera Alna Petrus ab Zebedeus di mabo besene ab, Alab isiboga bobisiog, di Alna ingmun-ingmun ubog, ba yaga´ gange igin ulamog.
40026038	Wera Yesus di sigag lebog: “Neri gange ongei seinilimna di somagna´ a´oli ubnel, ba ane ag umeb, di Nayab weldaldogob.”
40026039	Gigib ba Alna moga´ lobonggayog, di Alna sogo ag ombonggia doa yubu leldogog, di Eildi lebog dina: “Na´nayong lei, unubanmen wenena Neri ma´i ane na dora deiblom bog, neri yonge ag di gom, bog Eindi yonge ag di uboga.”
40026040	Nenege gigib ba Yesus na Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag yayog di, signa malamega´ eibsiog, di Eildi Petrus ag lebog: “A´un na ubuma jam dognog Na ab webdangganmen gom de?
40026041	A´un na webdanggoga doa yubu lemlulum uragsina´ lomag malyunggiyebag aboga. Gange na dagomanne bog sob na mesangne.”
40026042	Alna doa yubu on li besenenge lelbiog di Eildi lebog dina: “Na´nayong lei, ma´i nenena dora deibnemen gom wenena, Nana dene wenegaga, Eindi yonge ag danggulula.”
40026043	Alna on yayog wenege na signa a´osing malameg, bog gemera yayog, anese signa ising igin ulamsiog, ba wi malameg.
40026044	Alna sig anegag lobogsiog di on doa yubu li wenelinge lelbiog. Anda neig doa yubu nenegaga on lebog.
40026045	Gigib ba, Alna on Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag yayog, di sigab lebog dina: “A´un na mara deiya´ sera ulamlom de? Gedlulum, Sogo Nimi di Me na meili nimi see ag dodsinib sum na gigib danggal.
40026046	Bugoglulum, nun na balamgob. Gedlulum! Na doboga dodsinib nimi na gigib yal.”
40026047	Wenege Yesus na yubu aro leldogog bog, Yudas yayog (alna oo bare dirigoga ban nimi nenege). Anda al ab nason nimi dina´ imam ousa´ nang ab, Yahudi nimi salerob weig nang ab, parang ab gal lobdoba´ ab beyayeg.
40026048	Yudas Al widnibaneb nimi nenege di sigag gednebne ane ubnuna´ aboga ombararamsiog: “Neri nos aldogne nimi nenege na Ala´ anda Al aga salbululum” amog.
40026049	Al wenege sabseibi Yesus eiba´ ag segelyayog, di lebog dina: “Na´e Omoladsine” abog di Alag nos abog.
40026050	Bog Yesus di alag lebog: “Na´e lei, eindi ubnun aboga yalamne nenege na od unubulom.” Ba signa ya´indoga Yesus salbayeg di dobeg.
40026051	Bog nimi dogne Yesus ab nason balamegne di eildi see doblenggia parang gili salbayog, di Imam Weigne di ouragna´ne dogne di oo ag deiya oo blegleng gibog.
40026052	Ba Yesus di alag lebog di: “Parang ane na on eya´ ag dobonggiblom! Anese nimi dogne parang doblul wenena, alna parang di oboga derong aroblula´.
40026053	Goma eindi sembiblam di na, Na´nayong ag lebsene, ba besarob eim nang duabelas ribu Na aronena´ se, wene doldogol yaso gom sembiblam di de?
40026054	Bog ane so wenena damen Weig Yubu lomag mome dorobne sunum danggana´ se na sa´a ura danggaso do?”
40026055	Sum nenege Yesus di nimi dina´ ag lebog dina: “A´undi sembia Nana asoga´ne aboga Na salbaneneb parang ab gal lobdoba´ ab gedneboga beyalamlom de? Nana sob-sob sum Eimayong di ee ag bugoga omoladlamsino, bog a´un na Na salbamnelom goma´ aga.
40026056	Bog ununa´ nene nisin na damen omoladsina´ nang di mome dorobne sunum danggulul aboga.” Ba Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi nisin na Alag loboga bologa bindagdobeg.
40026057	Sig na Yesus gigib salbayeg, di Alna Imam Weigne Kayafas ag bobieg, anegag na Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nimi ab as salerob weig nang ab longamega´ ag.
40026058	Petrus na mog uboga Al eimig dobda balamoga´ murub Imam Weigne di eriga´ ag biog. Anda lomag samo wa´iyog, di yin bon nimi di arona´ nang bulamega´ gan-gan ag bulamog; ununa´ nenege goggob dagaldogla eibnun aboga.
40026059	Imam imam ousa´ nang na Weig Yubu omoladsina´ nang nisin ab na Yesus ag sonda´ yubu lag lebla abgob arob yubu elameg, Alna yaga obgob aboga.
40026060	Bog signa sonda´ yubu dina´ beyayeg, bog dogne sunum eibeg gom dog, nimi besene og yareg.
40026061	Anda lebdeg di na: “Nimi nene di lebog dina´, ‘Nana Eimayong di ee nene goboga deibne di on li sum weneli og sobnuna´,’ amog.”
40026062	Ba Imam Weigne na segoga Alag lebog di: “An ag sonda´ yubu lemgeanga´ ag ane na, Anna yubu degna´ lebsom gom de?”
40026063	Bog Yesus na yubu gelegoga doge amog. Ba Imam Weigne di Alag lebog dina: “Eimayong gamyagne si ag ab nun ag leblom, Anna Kristus de? Eimayong Mamne, goma gom-gom?”
40026064	Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “Al eindi gigib leblama´ ane. Anda bog Nana anag lebnun, wene ag uboga Sogo Nimi di Me a´un na Weig bebnag Migibne di sirig see ag seig bugoga eim ag deb gan-gan ag yanggale ba eibluluma´.”
40026065	Wenabog ba Imam Weigne benege di bagsum gweldegoga lebog dina: “Alna Eimayong ag elyaglamla, nun na sa´ase yog lag len nimi elamgob do? Wene eildi gigib Eimayong ebyagla´ na gigib gegbalom!
40026066	A´undi na sa´a sembiamlom do?” Sigdi yubu degna´ na: “Alna mednelamla´ se somagdoblul.”
40026067	Ba signa Eildi a´osing ag gamola´ solo gouluboga see bigna´ di oboga, on dara nimi di babe bongolganeglameg.
40026068	Lebeg dina: “Anna Kristus, nun ag lebsumbablom, Anna edne di olamgel do?”
40026069	Petrus na eriga´ ag bulamog wenege na, ouragna´ gel dogne ya´ina alag lebog dina: “An babe na Yesus Galileange ab nason sob-sob ulamseromne.”
40026070	Bog alna nimi nisin a´osing ag ebyagog di lebog dina: “Nana wangan, eindi leblamne nong na sa´a do?”
40026071	Alna asag wa´na isigin ag biog, ba wenege na on ouragna´ gel dogne al eibog di, anegag ulameg nimi ag lebog di: “Nimi nene na Yesus Nazaretne ag nason ulamserengne benege.”
40026072	Ba alna ebyagog di lebog dina: “Nimi nene na nana eel gom nimi.”
40026073	Al wenege sabseibi anegag umeg nimi na Petrus ag ya´ina lebeg di: “An babe na sigag seig nimi anda eindi yubu lena´ di lag neneldalamlam.”
40026074	Wera Petrus na al dama´ wibdayog di lebog dina, “Nimi nene na nana wangan” aldogog sabseibi ayam ngoubog.
40026075	Wera Petrus na Yesus di ura alag lemogne nenege sembibog di: “Ayam ngoubna´ aro bog anna Na li salag weneli ebyagnuloma´,” amoga´ anege anda alna as weilag seig langgindoga ngegoga engelamog.
40027001	Gigib ee ugag abenege na imam ousa´ nang ab, Yahudi as salerob weig nang ab nisin na longgoga Yesus obgob aboga garerob yubu lebeg.
40027002	Signa Al soubu goubeg di Alna mog sogo nenege salerobne Pilatus ag doboga bobieg.
40027003	Yudas na Al widnibayogne nenege Yesus na obgob aboga garerob yubu doblenggayega´ ising eibog wenena, alna ongei sembibog di girig wase perak deng dogne di ebna wenela´ anege na imam imam ousa´ nang ab weig nang ab ag on doladyesiog.
40027004	Lebog dina: “Anese nana gigib meili ubna, mednena´ gom nimi di eneng widnibana´ na.” Ba sigdi yubu degna´ na: “Nene na nun ab na sa´ase? Nene na od eindi og unubulom.”
40027005	Wenena Yudas na wase nenege na Eimayong di ee ag borebog, di ngang geregel dalbiog.
40027006	Imam imam ousa´ nang na girig wase perak nenege dobeg, di lebeg dina: “Wase nene na deilina´ ouling ag na dobonggibgob gom, wase nene na nimi eneng degna´ degla´ se.”
40027007	Signa gigib dognog yubu gareboga lebeg, di wase nene na sogo si na Tanah Tukang Periuk ag degeg anda sogo nenege na nimi asag nimi somagan, ba wangasin sogo danggibeg.
40027008	Anese aboga muruba´ sum nene babe sogo nenege na “Eneng Degna´ Sogo” alamang.
40027009	Aneso unubayog, ba damen omoladsina´ne Yeremia di lemog yubu sunum ubog: “Signa girig wase perak deng dogne di ebna weneli dobgong arobne anda Israel nimi di dognog nimi se degna´ garerobne ag dirigoga degna´ degeg.
40027010	Sigdi wase nenege na sogo di ma´i memenne ag doreg, Ayong Weigne di nayag lemog songe.”
40027011	Ba Yesus Pilatus ag bobieg. Pilatus di Alag isibayog di: “Anna Yahudi nimi se Borobne de?” Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “Al eindi leblama´ ane.”
40027012	Bog imam imam ousa´ nang ab Yahudi as salerob weig nang ab di Alag sonda´ yubu leboga gogongayeg, ba Alna yubu degna´ moga babe lebog gom.
40027013	Ba Pilatus di yubu Alag lebog dina: “Sigdi Anag sonda´ yubu dina´ lag lemang bog, Anna gegelamlam gom de?”
40027014	Bog Al na yubu degna´ moga dognog lebog gom, ba Pilatus dina, na´nini budnange sembibog.
40027015	Sob-sob seni yona´ weig sum gubernur na dolongsina´ ag dobonggirub nimi na soba´ nimi dina´ di lebna yubu ag lebda dollanalamsiog.
40027016	Anda sum nenege na yoo meili nongne eildi ununa´ nimi nisin eelne, eildi si na Yesus Barabas soubu gouboga dolongsina´ ag dobonggiruba´ ulamog.
40027017	Anese signa longgayeg wenena, Pilatus di sigag lebog: “A´undi yonge na edne aga loblambibsulul seinilimlom, Yesus Barabas goma Yesus na Kristus arobne aga gom?”
40027018	Signa gange erigal eisa´ Yesus alag doladyayega´ anege na, alna eel ubsiog.
40027019	Pilatus na sunusin buna´ ag bugamog wenege na, eildi gel di Alag yubu dogne deibog di: “Anna sirig nimi nene ag na see dobonggulom gom, anese Al se aboga ousa enimnag nana lenda iginne mamna.”
40027020	Bog imam imam nang ab Yahudi sogo weignang ab di migiba´ ane so leblulum aboga bebegayeg, ba nimi dina´ na Barabas na see loblublom, di Yesus na obneba´ alameg.
40027021	Ba gubernur di yubu degna´ na sig ag lebog dina: “Nimi besene abene na edne aga neri a´un se see loblubnun do?” Ba sig di yubu na “Barabas.”
40027022	Pilatus di sig ag lebog dina: “Aneso wenena Yesus na Kristus arobne benena sa´ubnun do?” Ba sig nisin di yubu migiba´ lebeg di “Alna glabneba´.”
40027023	Eildi lebog dina: “Bog Eildi meilinge na sa´a aga ubayo do?” Bog signa yubu migiba´ biaboga “Alna glabneba´.”
40027024	Wenegena Pilatus na gerog, ba ununa´ nisin na gilarobob ubog, di gwildi-gwildi ana´ ubog wenena, alna mag dobog di nimi nisin a´osing ag see mag legoga lebog di: “Nana nimi nene di eneng mednena´ na od gom, nene na a´undi og miboga unubululum!”
40027025	Ba nimi nisin danege di yubu degna´ lebeg dina: “Od meili Eildi eneng na nun ab nundi mabo ab di dora bobgob.”
40027026	Wera Pilatus na Barabas sig se doblambayog, di Yesus na legemna´ deiboga obeg di glablulum aboga dodsiog.
40027027	Gigib wenena Pilatus di Yin bon nang di sunusin ee ag bobieg, di yog yin bona´ nang biabsieg ba yin bon nang nisin longgoga Yesus ag adnaganegayeg.
40027028	Signa Eildi bagsum yonggayeg di, besarob mug do ligdoba´ so bagsum Alag onggibeg.
40027029	Signa seleng bosi soubu dogne wibeg di Eildi ousa´ ag deibeg di, Eildi sirig see ag seig na dunguna´ dogne doara gigib wenena, Al eiba´ ag gembonggia dereboga lemeg di: “Yahudi Nimi Borobne, giblamgeab” alameg.
40027030	Signa Alag gamola´ solo gouluboga dunguna´ anege doboga Eildi ousa´ ag olameg.
40027031	Gigib aneso leboga Al obeg wenena, Alag mug do ligdoba´ so bagsum nenege yongora doboga Eilda´ sob bagsum onggibeg. Gigib wenena Alna glabneb bo langgieg.
40027032	Sig na weig asag langgindoga balameg wenege na, Kirene nimi dogne eildi si na Simon ab ebbisidanggayeg. Nimi nenegag na sigdi bebegoga Yesus di glabna gal dora boubeg.
40027033	Wera signa ouling dogne sina Golgota yayeg, yubu nong na “Ousa´ Yanggol Deilina´ Ag” ana´ se.
40027034	Gigib wenena anggur ab meso sig mag ab isiboga doreg ba Alna gigib debyambara lobogog.
40027035	Alna gigib glabeg di, di sig na Eildi bagsum dobgob aboga undi olameg; anege na edne ag danggale wenena al doroblula´ aboga olameg.
40027036	Signa anege ag bugoga Alse welameg.
40027037	Eildi ousa´ eilibna Alna sa´a se iginne deiyamang aboga dorob mome ebdembameg, anda “Ane na Yesus Yahudi nimi Borobne” aboga domeg.
40027038	Alab asoga´ nimi besene ab nason glabamsieg. Nimi dogne sirig see ag seig nimi dogne na Eildi waneng see ag sig.
40027039	Nimi yaban wenena Alag gembara ngang gwa´dom-gwa´dom aboga dolbalag meili yubu lemeg.
40027040	Sigdi lemeg dina: “Eindi Eimayong di ee goboga li weneli sum og sobnun alamloma´, di An samog blebdanggulom, Anna Eimayong mamne wenena, glabna galag ane uboga yunggulom” alameg.
40027041	Aneso babe na imam ousa´ nang ab, Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab Yahudi weignang ab di meili yubu dereboga lemeg dina.
40027042	“Eildi yog nimi na bleblamsildo bog, Alna blebeldana´ gom! Alna Israel nimi Borobne, Alna glabna galag uboga wene yunggile wenena nun na Alag odseig sembibgob.”
40027043	Alna na Eimayong ag gange deirubne, anda Eimayong na Alag yo sembiblul wenena, Alna Eimayong di bleblula´, anese Eildi gigib lebo dina: “Nana Eimayong Mamne” alamo anda.
40027044	Asoga´ nimi Alab nason glabamsieg nang abenege di babe aneso neigne meili yubu lemdeg.
40027045	Ug digi nong ag jam duabelas murub uboga, jam tiga mog sogo abenege nisin na gunu danggayog.
40027046	Jam tiga so abenege, Yesus na yubu migiba´ biaboga: “Eli, Eli, lama sabakhtani?” Seoga´ anege yubu nong na “Na´nayong Eimayong, Na´nayong Eimayong, sa´a se Anna Na deiblouyamnelam do?”
40027047	Edbare nimi anege ag seglamega´ anda yubu nenege gegbayeg di lebeg dina: “Alna Elia ag bialamla.”
40027048	Al wenege sabseibi sig nimi aga nimi dogne berera biog, di alna eisa´ memeroba´ dobog, di sig mag anggur ag soumbonggia gal dungun ag goubia Yesus dulul aboga dorog.
40027049	Bog nen nimi di lebeg dina: “Loublom, nunna gemelamgob Alna Elia ya´indoga blebeldoglula´.”
40027050	Gigib wenena Yesus na on yubu migiba´ biabog di, Eildi gange dorog.
40027051	Bagsum Eimayong di ee ag urugag weilniruba´ anegena, enigi uboga unugu urugag besene gweldegoga mabog di, sa´uma´ wareldogog ba girig mein babe erebayog.
40027052	Nimi wangaroba´ nisin babe gubog, di Eimayong mabo aga somagdob nimi gigib bugogeg.
40027053	Yesus gigib gamyag bugog wenena, sig babe deiruba´ ag uboga langgieg, di Yerusalem geis asag wa´ alameg, ba nimi nisin di eibsieg.
40027054	Yin bon nang di weigne ab yin bon nang ab na, Yesus se welamega´ anda sa´uma´ wareboga nisin unubayogne eibeg, di yaga´ log danggesiog, ba sigdi lebeg dina: “Od seig ane na Eimayong Mamne.”
40027055	Anege ag na gelabo dina´ babe mog uboga gemelameg, signa Alag arona´ se Galilea murub Yesus eimig dobda yalameg gelabo.
40027056	Sig gan-gan ag ab gelabo abenege na Maria Magdalena ab, Yakobus ab Yusuf ab sigilin Maria ab, Zebedeus mabo sigilin ab ulameg.
40027057	Enimnag abenege na see yagne dogne Arimatea uboga yayog, eildi sina Yusuf. Al babe na Yesus ag dirigoga bana´ne.
40027058	Alna Pilatus ag biog di, Yesus di somagdoba´ boga´ molobayog. Ba Pilatus na Yesus somagdoba´ boga´ anege dodlulum aboga lebog.
40027059	Wenena Yusuf na somagdoba´ boga´ anege dobog di wenog besarob wina´ bagsum di gesebayog.
40027060	Di wenog deilisina´ addame ag meibog, girig mein damag addame logoga memeroba´ ag, anda gigib wenena weig girig dogne wegoga dembongibog di alna bindibog.
40027061	Bog Maria Magdalena ab on yog gel Maria ab na nimi deiruba´ ag sindam anegag bulamdeg.
40027062	Gwelegnag sum nenege na (Besen Sum se gednen sum), anda imam ousa´ nang ab Farisi nimi ab nason Pilatus ag bieg.
40027063	Anda sigdi lebeg dina: “Ayong lei sonda´ lesinne gamyag ulamog, di wenege na Eildi lemog dina, ‘Li weneli gigib uboga Nana on gamyag bugognuna´’ alamogne nunna sembiamab.
40027064	Anese nimi deiruba´ ag na besa welamig murub, weneli sum nenege danggulul aboga leblom. Gom wenena, Alna Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi di asoga´ dolyayigag, ba nimi nisin ag lebig di: ‘Alna somagdob nimi gan-gan ag uboga gigib bugogo,’ abig ba goggobag na yaga´ meili sirig dangganmen ublag, damen songe gom.”
40027065	Pilatus di sig ag lebog dina: “A´undi wen nang na ane bululum di deiruba´ ag anege na besa muboga welamlulum.”
40027066	Ba signa deiruba´ ag bieg di sigdi wen nang di aroboga, nimi deiruba´ ag anege gednebne uboga besa welameg.
40028001	Besen sum nenege na gigib bisilbiog, ba oumunggun sum nenege gwelegna´ lugun abenege Maria Magdalena ab on yog Maria ab deiruba´ ag gemelbirig.
40028002	Ba sa´uma´ nonggela´ oloboga wareldogog ba Ayong Weigne di besarob eim nang dogne, eim ag uboga yunggiog, di girig isigin nenegag ya´indoga demeglinggia girig eilibag bulamog.
40028003	Eildi a´osing na beba´ songe, eildi bagsum na yaga´ geis nong youmba´ so.
40028004	Welameg nang danege na eim nang log se bed-bed aboga, somagdob nimi songe danggayeg.
40028005	Aneso ubeg bog besarob eim nang nenege di, gelabo abenegag ag lebog di: “A´un na log unggom, anese nana eel, a´un na Yesus galag glabongne se elamdom.
40028006	Alna ane ag na od gom, Alna damen ab lebog songe gigib gamyag bugogo. Al meiruba´ ouling ag gemelyululum.
40028007	Wene berera bululum di Eildi dirigoga bana´ nimi ag omoladbusululum. Alna somagdob nimi gan-gan ag uboga gigib gamyag bugogo di, Al damen Galilea biog, anda Alna onogo ab eibluluma´. Gedsu, nana a´un ag sirig yubu lebna.”
40028008	Ba signa deiruba´ ag anege uboga berera bologa bireg, di log eisa´ on ngingyang gange ab di bologa Yesus di dirigoga bana´ nimi ag omoladbisireg.
40028009	Wera Yesus na oloboga gelabo danege ab ebbisidanggayeg di lebog dina: “Na´abo”, abog, ba signa Al beram yareg di Eildi yan ag gwililbindoga Alag meiboga gibdeg.
