41013007	Anda a´unna gegeldoglulum, ba mal lilim goma mal oldana´ se yubu lebgong wenena, a´unna log unggom. Nene nisin na od unubulula´, bog sogo goggobdagna´ sum nenege na aro.
41013008	Anese, yog as mog sogo dogne di, yog as mog sogo dognag mal webalamgonga´, ba borob as dogne di on yog borob as dognag mal webalamgonga´. Unulamle, bog mog sogo dara sig na sa´uma warelamlula´, bog gwaneng yo babe danggulula´. Nene nisin na me deiya´ dolamang songe eilnilamlula´.
41013009	Bog a´unna besa webdanggoga ulamlulum; yog sum a´unna Eimayong di ee ag wee wen nang ag doboga bobusugonga´, anda a´unna Weig yubu dona´ ee ag olamsiyig di salerob nang ab borob nang ab, Na se aboga bobusugonga´; sig ag lag lena´ se.
41013010	Bog oumunggun Eimayong di Besarob Yubu nenege na mog sogo nimi nisin ag omoladlamsugonga´.
41013011	Anda a´un nong salerobsiyig di isisin ee ag dolongolbisiyig wenena, a´unna usurub yubu donaga lebgoba´ do, aboga gange gweboga seiniling gom. Bog al wenege ab a´undi gange ag yubu nenaga lebgong aboga dodsile yubu aga leblulum; anese a´undi leblulum yubu nenege na a´undi gom bog Geid Gange di leblula´.
41013012	Alga di alga dogne obgong aboga dodsulula´, neigne babe na aleyong di almamne ag unubulula´: anda mog mabo na sigeleyong yabo ab sigilin yabo ab ag byablamsugonga´, anda sig babe obsugong aboga dodsugonga´.
41013013	Neri si se a´un ag gorogoga erigal ulamsugonga´. Bog nimi na lignibonggia ulamla´ murub goggobdagna´ sum dangale wenena alna bleblula´.”
41013014	Yogsum a´unna gemelamlulum ba: “Meili Usinne dogne eildi segnemen goma´ ag segamlul wenena, (eildin nimi na besa sembiblulum di) anda Yudea nimi na bologa meinag sig balamgonga´.
41013015	Ee aroma´ eilibsig ulamgong nimi na sigda´ damnang yogne dogne ee lomagsig dobgob aboga yunggina wa´ugong goma´.
41013016	Wee mog sogag welamig nimi na bagsum dobgob aboga on dolyugong goma´.
41013017	Unulamle sum nenege na me borob gelabo ab me manggoga dinilamig gelabo ab na yaga´ ingmun sirig ulamsulula´.
41013018	Unubululne nene na muru wal ag ubalag aboga a´unna doa yubu lemlulum.
41013019	Igin-igin ununa´ nenena damen Eimayong di sogo uliyog wilman wenege ab uboga wene babe unulameldo gom ununa´ aga ublula´, eimigsig onogo babe on unubulul gom ununa´ aga.
41013020	Anda Eimayong na sum li salag buruma´ dangiliso gom wenena, yogne-yogne nisin dognog sirig babe blebdanmen goma´. Bog Eildi webdob nimi se aboga Eimayong di sum buruma´ danggiboga´ anege di aga unubulula´.
41013021	Sum nenegab na nimi di a´un ag lebseng di na, ‘Gere! Kristus na ane’ goma, ‘Kristus na ono’ abgong wenena, a´un na odseig seiniling gom.
41013022	Anese, sonda´ Kristus ab sonda´ nabi nang ab yugonga´ anda, signa gedneb-gednebne ab budna´ ningginge ab unulamgonga´, Eimayong di webdob nimi ag yamnegoga yog bisig deibsinib so ununa´ ubsinib.
41013023	Wera, ununa´ nenege na ununa´ aro bog Neri damen a´un ag ombaramsini, ba besa weldalamlulum aboga!”
41013024	“Sum nenege igin-iginne gigib unura dagle wenena, eseng na gunu danggulula´, ba wal na meleg yelbulul goma´.
41013025	Gura´ na eim ag uboga daga-daga sogo ag malyongalamgonga´, eim ag borobne babe gwildi-gwildi arob ulamgonga´.
41013026	Sum nenege na nimi na gemelamgong bog, Sogo Nimi di Me na deb gan-gan ag Eildi yaga´ migibne ab, bebnagne ab gedman yalamlula´.
41013027	Sum nenege babe na Alna Eildi eim nang ag mog sogo gwaga´ dombare ag Eildi webdob nimi dobolbusululum aboga urag´ibsulula´; anda nenege na eim goggob ag uboga sogo goggob ag.
41013028	Gal ara di sununa´ yubu ombadsiogag ane doblulum. Wera gal go egag ubna di digoga mog wabna di ba´ salamla wenena, dou wal dobla aboga a´un na eel ulamlom.
41013029	Neig songe babe a´unna gemelulum, ba ununa´ nene gigib dangaldogle wenena, Alna beram isigin ag ulamla aboga eel ublulum.
41013030	Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lemna, yogsum ununa´ nene nisin unubulula´ anege na wene wilman ulamang nimi nene babe na gom ulduna´ gom bog unubulula´.
41013031	Anda yogsum eim ab sogo ab na gom urublula´, bog Neri yubu nenena gom urublul goma´.
41013032	Bog sum ab jam ab na nimi dogne babe eel gom, eim nang babe wangan, Eildi Me babe eel gom bog Ayong og eel ulamla.”
41013033	“Anese a´unna gemeyambara besa weldalamlulum! Edsum aga danggulula´ anege na a´un na babe wangan se.
41013034	Sununa´ na nimi dogne eildi ee louya yog mog sogo ag bilamso wenena, alna eildi ee nimi di welamgong aboga ouragna´ nimi ag doara wee eleb-eleb deiya, al isigin ag wen nimi ag babe welamlul aboga deibog.
41013035	Anese aboga weldalamlulum, ee deiya´ne benege na edsum aga yulula´ do? a´un na wangan se, enimnag gom, enimna digag gom, gwelegna´ yangman gom, gwelegnag goma, yulula´ anda.
41013036	Alna oloboga yanggale wenena, a´unna a´osing malamlulum bog yalag aboga.
41013037	Sa´asonge Neri a´un ag lebnange nenena, Neri nimi nisin se babe lemna anda, ‘Besa weldalamlulum!’ ”
41014001	Hari Paskah ab Perayaan Roti Tidak Beragi seni yubgob aboga ubega´ anege li salag besene so dayog wenena, imam weig nang ab Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsin nang ab, di signa gelelenga Yesus sa´a so bisig uboga salboga obgob aboga bisig eilameg.
41014002	Anese sigdi lebeg di na: “Seni yona´ sum nenena unubugob gom unuldogeb, ba nimi nisin dolbeseyebag aboga” abeg.
41014003	Yesus na Betania od wenena, Simon kusta neigna´ neiglamogne di ee ag gwaneng dera bulamog, bog gel dogne wangi mag degna´ nonggela´ log, bog wenog wangi mag gemerob ma´i ag dogne bobog, di Alag beyayog. Gigib wenena ma´i nenege ngang degna´ ag gwelia minyak mag na Yesus ousa´ ag yegonggibog.
41014004	Sig eibeg nimi na erigal ubsiog ba sig moumun lebongdanggayeg di: “Sa´ase aboga wangi mag ane na gilarob ubla do?
41014005	Wangi mag anena girig wase tiga ratus dinar degoga, see gom nimi ag doladsina´ bog ubla aboga.” Ba signa genegag gorogoga lemeg.
41014006	Bog Yesus na lebog di: “Ising og gembaramsu! A´unna sa´ase alag ane bebeg-bebeg alamlom do? Alna besarob ununa´ aga Na ag unulamnel.
41014007	Anese see gom nimi na a´un ab nason sob-sob ulamlulum di a´un na ed sum sig ag arobusugob yo sembiblulum wenena, arobusululuma´. Bog Nana a´un ab nason sob-sob ulamgob goma´.
41014008	Eildi gigib unubunun sembiblange aga ubla. Na deilinag aro bog Neri nong ag minyak mag deibnugonga´ anege se gedneboga deirub songe ubla.
41014009	Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lemna, asayag digum Eimayong di Besarob Yubu nene mog sogo nisin ag ombadda balamsugong di sa´a songe eildi unubal ununa´ nene babe alag seinilina se neblamgonga.”
41014010	Yudas Iskariot, alna Yesus ag dirigoga bana´ne bog imam weignang ag Yesus obgong aboga malbana´ yubu sigag selelbiog.
41014011	Ba signa Yudas di selelbalamog yubu nenege na sigdi oo gegeldogeg sum nenege na yaga´ ngingyang ubeg, di signa Yudas ag rupiah degugoba´ aboga salag legeg. Anda Yudas na garen edsum donaga uldogle, ba Yesus obgong aboga ulamog.
41014012	Oumunggun nong sum nenege na seni Perayaan Roti Tidak Beragi yon suma´ anda nimi na domba Paskah olameg, ba Yesus di dirigoga bana´ nang na Alag isibayeg: “An se seni asa ag yoboga gednelamgob do?”
41014013	Yesus di nimi besene bogibsiog di lebog di: “Weig asag bururum di, onogo ag na nenge dogne ma´i ag mag debonggia beyalamla ebbisidanggululum, ebbisidanggululum di alag dobda bururum.
41014014	Anda eildi wa´aldogle ee ag wa´ururum, di al ee deiya´ne ag anege isibururum, ‘Ayong omoladsinne di lebla di na: Na se ee garen na asayag do?’ Nayab Neri dirigoga bana´ nang ab seni Paskah yoboga dugoba´ se abla, sururum.
41014015	Nimi nenege na ee ouling weigne dogne labna´ ag enigi ombadsulula´. Anda ee nenege na gigib memboga gedneroba´ ag; anegag na nun se gednelamdurum.”
41014016	Wera dirigoga bana´ nang besena´ abenege na as nenegag bireg, di anegag na Yesus di ura lemog songe sumboga sunum dobdeg, di signa seni Paskah gednelamdeg.
41014017	Wera ee gigib eimbayog wenena, Yesus ab dirigo ga bana´ nang oo bara´ ab anegag yayeg.
41014018	Signa anegag bugoga gwaneng delameg wenena, Yesus di lebog di: “Nana a´un ag sirig yubu lemna, a´un gan-gan ag ane ab wene Na ab gwaneng nason delamabne di yogsum Na widnibunulula´.”
41014019	Wera sigdi gange ongei arob ubsiog ba, nimi dogne-dogne Alag isibayeg: “Nana gom bog leblam ba?”
41014020	Yesus di yubu degna´ sigag lebog di: “Al benege na a´un oo bare nang nene gan-gan ag anaba´ anda, Nayab neig yabna´ ag delamnamne bene di unubulula´ se.
41014021	Sogo Nimi di Me na Alna mome ag dorob songe uboga bulula´, bog Sogo Nimi di Me ag widnibulul nimi anege na ongei arob. Anda alna manggamseng gom wenena od seleb bog.”
41014022	Yesus ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ab na gwaneng denebuyeg wenegena, Yesus na roti gwaneng anege dobsalbayog, di doa yubu lebog. Doa yubu leboga roti gwaneng anege Eildi se di gesebseigia sigag dodsiog, di sigag lebog di na: “Doblulum; anena Neri nong aboga.”
41014023	Gigib wenena Alna girigna´ mag ma´i doboga doa yubu lebog di sigag dodsiog, ba sig nisin na girigna´ mag anege doboga deyeg.
41014024	Ba Eildi sigag lebog di na: “Anena Neri eneng, leiblourub eneng nenege, nimi dina´ se yegoga deirubne.”
41014025	Nana sirig yubu a´un ag lemna, Nana anggur nong ane on ouyag dunun goma´ murub uboga mag dena´ sunum danggale sum nenegaga Eimayong damag una´ se wenog anggur aga dora dununa´.
41014026	Gigib deyeg di wenena Eimayong ag gibna´ mos dogne sebeg di Zaitun unangag bieg.
41014027	Yesus di sigag lebog di: “A´un nisin Nayog deibloubnululum di bindagdobluluma´, anese mome dorob di: ‘Nana domba deiya´ne obne wenena, domba nisin na langsambugonga´.’
41014028	Bog Na gigib gamyag bugibnele wenena, Galilea asag a´unna aro bana´ gom bog Na damen bilamnuna´.”
41014029	Bog Petrus di Alag lebog di: “Sig nisin na An og deiblouya bindibgong bog, nana Anog beiblobgunun goma´.”
41014030	Alag Yesus di lebog di: “Sum nene an ag sirig yubu lebnun: “Einimnag ane babe ayam yubu li besene ngoubna´ aro bog, anna li salag weneli Nase ebyagnuloma´.”
41014031	Ba Petrus na yaga´ migiba´ yubu degna´ lebog di: “Nana Anab nason isiboga somagdobnoma´, bog neri An se nana wangan absene goma´.” Anda on yog dirigoga bana´ nang di babe neigso yubu lemeg.
41014032	Yesus na sig ab mog sogo dognag bieg sina Getsemani, anda Yesus di Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ag lebog di: “Na doa yubu lelbine wenege na a´un na ane ag bulamlulum.”
41014033	Alna Petrus ab Yakobus ab Yohanes ab og bobsiog. Alna ingmum-ingmun ubog, ba yaga´ gange igin ubog.
41014034	Eildi sigag lebog di: “Neri gange na yaga´ ingmun ulamnel, di somagdobnemena´ so ulamnel. A´unna webdanggoga ane ag ulamlulum.”
41014035	Al mog so lobonggibog, di sogo ag malbindoga doa yubu lemog; Alag jam nenegag ubogne nenege gom ubso aboga.
41014036	Lebog di na: “Ayong, Anna Na´neyong. Anda yogne-yogne nisin Ayong Eindi wenena unubanmen gomne dogne odgoma´ dogne od gom. Wera Anna Na ag igin-iginne nene doblom. Neri yonge ag di gom, bog Eindi yonge di ublom.”
41014037	Gigib wenena Alna on yayog di sig weneli na a´osing malameg, ba eibsiog, anda Alna Petrus ag lebog di: “Simon anna a´osing anam malamlam de? Anna jam dognog se weldana´ na unubanmen gom de?
41014038	Webdanggoga doa yubu lemlulum, a´unna uragsina´ lomag malyunggugob gom aboga, gange na dagomanne bog sob na mesangne.”
41014039	Yesus na on mogso lobonggia neig doa yubu on lelbiog.
41014040	Gigib ba on Alna yanggayoga´ babe sig na a´osing malameg, ba eibsiog, sigdi ising na igin log ba, Yesus ag yubu degna´ lebgob arob yubu babe signa wangan ubeg.
41014041	Wera Alna li wenelinge yayog, di sig ag lebog di: “Wene a´un na a´osing malamlulum di deg-deg selamlulum. Wene gigib. Jam na gigib dangal. Gedsu, Sogo Nimi di Me na meili una´ nang di see ag widnilamneang.
41014042	Bugoga yululum ba nunna balamgob. Al Na widnebunululne na beram.”
41014043	Sum nenege Yesus na yubu anam selelamog bog, Yudas oloboga segelyayog, alna dirigoga bana´ nang oo bare nang danegaga nimi dogne, anda al ab nason imam weig nang ab, Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsin nang ab, weig nang ab, yin ab mal ab boboga yalameg.
41014044	Alag widnibaneb nimi nenege na gednebne ane sig ag ombadsiog: “Neri nos al dogne nimi nenege na Al; anda Al salbululum di besa weboga bobululum.”
41014045	Anda alna anegag yayog di wenege na wenege sabseibi Yesus ag ya´ina lebog di: “Omoladsinne” aboga Alag nos abog.
41014046	Sig na Yesus dobeg di Al salbayeg.
41014047	Sig gan-gan ag anegab nimi dogne di parang glibsalbayog, di Imam Weigne di ouragna´ne dogne oo bleglenggayog.
41014048	Yesus di sigag lebog di: “A´undi sembia Nana yoonge aboga a´unna mal ab yin ab boboga Na salbaneneb yalamlom de?
41014049	Sob-sob sum Nana a´un gan-gan ag Eimayong di ee ag omoladlamsina´ na a´undi Nana salelamnelom gom bog, Weig Yubu lomag mome dorob songe sunum ublul aboga.”
41014050	Wera Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang nisin na Al loboga bindibeg.
41014051	Goubini me dogne alna weiya´ bagsum dognog onggoga eildi nong lilidanggamog di, al eimig dobda balamog, signa salbugob aboga ulameg wenege na.
41014052	Bog alna bagsum lobdeboga nong baneng bologa balamog.
41014053	Gigib wenena Yesus na Imam Weigne a´osing ag bobieg anda; imam weig nang nisin ab, yog weig nang ab, Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsin nang ab anegag longolameg.
41014054	Anda Petrus na Al eimig mog uboga dobda balamog, anda Weig Imam Weigne di eriga´ ag biog, anege ag wen nang gan-gan ag ug legda bulamog.
41014055	Imam weig nang ab, Eimayong di ee ag wee wen nang nisin ab na, Yesus obgob aboga lag lena´ se bisig eilameg, bog sig na bisig eiyameg gom.
41014056	Nimi dina´ babe Al a´osing ag sonda´ yubu lag lena´ lemeg, bog nimi dogne di on yog nimi ag sunum so yubu lebog gom.
41014057	Anda edbareso nimi Alag byaboga sonda´ se lag lena´ ane lelwinggieg:
41014058	“Nun na gigib gegboyub, ba nimi nene di lebog di: ‘Eimayong di ee nimi see di sorob ee nene na, neri goboga yog ee li weneli og sobnuna´, nimi see di sona´ gom ee abog’ seyeg.”
41014059	Sig di lag lena´ yubu nene babe yog nimi on yog nimi ag lena´ sunum gom.
41014060	Wera, Imam Weigne wa´ilameg nimi gan-gan ag uboga segogog, di Yesus ag isibayog, eildi lebog di: “An ag sonda´ yubu se unubal aboga lemang yubu nene, Anna yubu degna´ lebnemen gom de?”
41014061	Bog Alna yubu gelegoga yubu degna´ babe lebog gom. Ba Imam Weigne di on alag isibayog: “Anna al Gibdubne di Me Mesias de?”
41014062	Yesus di yubu degna´ lebog di: “Nana Al; a´un na Sogo Nimi di Me yaga´ migibne di sirig see ag sig bugoga, eim ag deb gan-gan ag yalamle ba eibluluma´.”
41014063	Imam Weigne na eilda´ bagsum anege na gweldegoga lebog di na: “Nunna sa´ase on lag lena´ elamgog do?
41014064	A´un na gigib gegbalom ba Eimayong ag dolbalag nembal, a´undi sembia na sa´a do?” Sig na yubu selboga garerob yubu na Al obeb, ba somagdoblul, abeg.
41014065	Wera edbare so nang di Alag gamola´ sologoulbia, Eildi ising liliboga see bigna´ di olameg di, Alag lemeg di: “Lag sumbulom, edne di oldomgel do? Si siblom” alameg. Anda wee wen nang di babe Alag olameg.
41014066	Sum nenege na Petrus na eriga´ ag umog bog, Imam Weigne di ouragna´ gel dogne yayog.
41014067	Anda wenege na genege na Petrus ug legda bulamog ag eibog, di eildi a´osing ag besa mibog di lebog di: “Anna Yesus Nazaretne ab nason yabalamdomne benege goma?”
41014068	Bog alna epyagoga lebog di: “Nana wangan eindi leblam yubu besa sembibna gom” di, alna isigin seibura´ agsig biog bog.
41014069	Wenege ouragna´ gel genege na Petrus ag gerog di, anege bugameg nimi ag lebog di: “Nimi nenena sigab nason yabalamongne benegaga nenge dogne ane” abog.
41014070	Bog Petrus na on epyagog. On wenege sabseibi anegag umeg nimi di Petrus ag lebeg di: “Anna sig ab nason ulamlomne benege anna Galileangea´ anda.”
41014071	Wera Petrus na wiboga oboga leibog di: “A´undi silamlomne benege na nana eel gom.”
41014072	Bog al wenaldogog sabseibi wenege ayam yubu li besenenge ngoubog. Ba Petrus na Yesus di alag lemogne nenege sembibog: “Ayam yubu li besenenge ngoubna´ aro bog anna Nana li wenelinge epyagnuloma´.” Anda alna sembibiog di engayog.
41015001	Gwelegna´ lugun sabseibi wenege imam weignang ab, yog weig nang ab, Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsin nang ab, Eimayong di ee ag wee wen nang nisin ab, isiboga garerob yubu selbayeg di Yesus soubu gouboga Alna Pilatus ag dodladbieg.
41015002	Pilatus di Yesus ag isibayog: “Anna Yahudi nimi borobne de?” Ba Yesus di yubu degna´ lebog di: “Al eindi leblama´ ane.”
41015003	Imam weignang di Alag mednena´ne ubla aboga gogolimeg.
41015004	Pilatus na on Alag isibayog di lebog di na: “Anna yubu degna´ lebnemen gom de? Gere, nimi dina´ di An ag medena´ne ubla aboga goglamgeyang ba.”
41015005	Bog Yesus na yubu degna´ moga´ babe lemog gom ba, Pilatus na irei budna´ aboga sembibog.
41015006	Sob-sob weig sum ab ununa´ na nimi dina´ di molbane ag lebda unub nimi dogne dolongsina´ ag uboga see lobloubsieg.
41015007	Sum nenege na nimi dogne eildi si na Barabas al dolongsina´ ag gweigoga bosin nimi ab nason yog nimi ab dobonggirub, anda sig na gweigoga bosina´ lomag uboga nimi osina´ se.
41015008	Wera nimi dina´ na ya´indoga sob ununa´ nenege ag dirigoga wene babe unubugong aboga molbayeg.
41015009	Pilatus di yubu degna´ lebog di sigag isibesiog: “A´undi yonge na a´unse Yahudi nimi di borobne aga neri see lobloubnun de?”
41015010	Alna eel ubog Imam-imam weig nang sirig gange di gom, bog nunda´ danggaso arob gange di alag doladbiega´ anegena.
41015011	Bog imam weig nang na nimi dina´ ag bebegoga molbayeg, di Barabas aga sig se see lobloubsulom aboga molbayeg.
41015012	Pilatus na yubu degna´ lebog di sigag isibesiog: “Aneso wenena a´undi Yahudi nimi borobne alamlomne benena neri sa´ubnun do?”
41015013	Wera sig na yubu dina´ areboga alag lebeg di: “Alna gal ag glablulum!”
41015014	Wera Pilatus na sigag lebog di: “Bog Eildi meili una´ na sa´ubog do?” Bog signa yubu migiba´ areboga lebeg di: “Alna gal ag glablulum!”
41015015	Anese aboga Pilatus na nimi dina´ di gange ngingyang ublul aboga Barabas na sig se see lobloubog, bog Yesus na legemna´ deboga olameg di gal ag glabgong aboga dodsiog.
41015016	Gigib wenena yin yagnang di Yesus doboga nimi sunusin asag ee ag bobieg, di yin yagnang nisin longolulum aboga biabsieg.
41015017	Sig na Alag youngga bun bog so bagsum dogne onggibeg, bog ousa´ goluna´ Mahkota selengne dogne wibeg di Eildi ousa´ eilib deibeg.
41015018	Gigib wenena sig na Alag giblameg di lemeg di na: “Yahudi nimi Borobne na´e.”
41015019	Signa Eildi ousa´ ag gwesa´ di obsaboga Alag gamola´ sologoulbia Al eiba´ ag gosam oglumugunggia mabonggia meiblameg.
41015020	Alag dolbalag nemboga meili yubu lebeg wenena, youngga bunso bagsum anege yonggayeg, di Eildi bagsum Alag onggibeg. Gigib wenena Yesus na gal ag glabgob aboga asag sig bolanggieg.
41015021	Sum nenege na nimi dogne si na Simon, alna Kirene nimi (Aleksander ab Rufus ab sigeleyong) as beiyag sig uboga wenog yayog nimi alna yabayog bog, nimi nenegag Yesus di glabna gal gyablom aboga bebegayeg.
41015022	Sig na Yesus doboga mogsogo dogne si na Golgota bobieg. Golgota yubu nong na: “Nimi deildalblouag.”
41015023	Wera signa anggur mag ab mur ab isiboga memeroba´ dogne Yesus ag doreg, bog Alna lobogog.
41015024	Gigib wenena signa Al gal ag glabeg, di sig na Eildi bagsum dobgob aboga undi olameg; anege na edne ag danggale wenena al doroblula´ aboga olameg.
41015025	Jam sembilan uldogog wenena Alna gal ag glabeg.
41015026	Anda yubu deiya Al obega´ anege nong na, mome ag doboga ebdembayeg di: “Ane na Yahudi Nimi Di Borobne” aboga.
41015027	Al ab nason asoga´ nang besene ab isiboga gal ag glabsieg, anda nenge dogne na Eildi sirigse agsig bog nenge dogne na Eildi wanengse agsig.
41015028	Wera neig songe Eimayong di yubu ag lerobne sunum danggayog: “Alna meili una´ nimi ab gan-gan ag Al babe eldirub.”
41015029	Anegag yabalameg nimi di Alag meili yubu leboga ngang gwa´dom-gwa´dom aboga sigdi lemeg di: “Anna Eimayong di ee goboga deiya li weneli og sobnun alamluma´ di,
41015030	glabna´ gal ag uboga yunggilem di An samog blebdanggulom.”
41015031	Neig songe babe na Imam-imam weignang ab Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsin nang ab Alag meili yubu leboga olameg, di sig moumun sigdi lemeg di na: “Yog nimi na bleblamsil bog Al damneng na blebeldalamla gom ba.
41015032	Al Kristus ane Israel nimi Borobne glabna gal ag uboga yunggulul ba nundi ising eibeb di odseig sembibgob.” Bog Al ab nason glabamsieg nang besene abenege di neig songe babe Alag meili yubu lemdeg.
41015033	Jam duabelas na, as nenege nisin gunu danggayog, di wenege murub uboga jam tiga danggayog.
41015034	Anda jam tiga uldogog wenena, Yesus na yubu migiba´ lebog di: “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakhtani?” Yubu nong na: “Na´neyong Eimayong, Na´neyong Eimayong, Anna sa´ase Nana beiblomnelam do?”
41015035	Ane gegbayeg, di edbare so nimi anegag umeg nimi di lebeg di: “Gedsu Alna Elia bialamla.”
41015036	Wera nimi na eisa´ di memeroba´ dogne beya´indoga anggur yoo mag lomag soumboga gwesa´ ag gegnebonggia Yesus ag dulul aboga dorog di lebog di: “Wera nunna dilamgob Alna Elia ya´indoga doblinggibla´abmen.”
41015037	Wera Yesus na yubu migiba´ leboga Eildi gange busu dagdobog
41015038	Al wenege sabseibi ab Eimayong di ee ag bagsum wilniruba´ anege na ereboga besene danggoga enigi uboga ounugu malyunggiog.
41015039	Sum nenege yin yag nang di weigne Al eiba´ ag seglamoga´ anege Eildi somagna´ eibog wenena, eildi lebog di: “Od seig nimi nene na Eimayong Mamne.”
41015040	Edbare so gelabo babe na mog uboga ising eibeg. Sig na Maria Magdalena ab, Yoses ab Yakobus goubini me ab sigilin Maria ab, Salome ab segameg di.
41015041	Sig nisin na Yesus ag dobda balameg, di Alna Galilea od wenege na Alag arolameg gelabo. Anda anegag na yog gelabo dina´ babe Yerusalem uboga Yesus ab nason ya´ilameg gelabo seglameg.
41015042	Al wenege sabseibi na ee eimbayog, anda sum nenege na dangganeba´ Besen sum se gednen suma´ anda.
41015043	Anese aboga Arimatea nimi Yusuf na Majelis weigne, anda alna Eimayong damag una´ se dira ulamogne, alna bosa´ goma´ Pilatus ag yayog di Yesus somagdoba´ boga´ molobayog.
41015044	Yesus na gigib somagdobla arob yubu gegbayog wenena, Pilatus na irei arob aboga, yin yag nang di weigne biabog, di alag isibayog, Yesus na gigib somagdobog goma aboga.
41015045	Yin yag nang di weigne di yubu leleboga ombarog, ba alna gigib gegbayog wenena, Yusuf ag Yesus di boga´ somagdoba´ anege na od seleb doblom.
41015046	Yusuf na bagsum lenan dogne degog di gigib wenena, Yesus somagdoba´ boga´ glabna gal ag uboga doblenggibog, di bagsum lenan anege di gesebayog di. Gigib wenena nimi deilin ag girig addame memeroba´ ag deibog di girig isigin anege demeglinggayog ba seregdayog.
41015047	Maria Magdalena ab Yoses eilin Maria ab na Yesus na asa deililbiyang do, aboga gemelbideg.
41016001	Hari Minggu gibna´ sum gigib bisilbiog wenena, Maria Magdalena ab, Yakobus eilin Maria ab, Salome ab na song besarob mag degeg di Yesus ag liggob aboga Yesus delinag anege bobieg.
41016002	Oumunggun sum nenege gwelegna´ lugun wenege sabseibi eseng dingilongoldogog abenege na signa nimi deilin ag anege bieg.
41016003	Bog sig moumun girig isigin seregdoba´ anege na edne di guboga demeglenggiblula´ do? Aboga sig moumun lebongdanggayeg.
41016004	Bog signa beram nong ag bindoga gereg ba girig nenege na yaga´ ningnong girig bog gigib demegoga malyunggilamog ba eibeg.
41016005	Signa nimi deilinag lomag anege gemelwa´iyeg, bog wa´iyega´ bisig abom ag sirig agsig anege goubininge dogne geis bagsum onggamog, di bulamog, ba signa logoldayeg.
41016006	Bog benege di sigag lebog di: “Log unggom mem! A´unna Yesus Nazaretne se elamlom, gal ag glabongne benegese elamloma´, anda Alna gigib gamyag bugogo. Alna ane ag od gom. Anda od gedlulum, sigdi Al deibonga´ ouling na anea´ anda gedlulum.
41016007	Bog wene na bululum di, Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ag yubu nene omoladbusululum. Di Petrus ag babe leblulum di na, ‘A´un Galilea bana´ na aro bog Al damen gigib bil sululum abog.’ Anda a´unna onogab Al eibluluma´, damen ab Eildi a´un ag ura lemog songe nenege sumboga.”
41016008	Wera signa nimi deiruba´ ag anege uboga langgieg, di log eisa´ bologa bieg. Wenaboga anege na logse dognog nimi ag babe moga´ nebeg gom.
41016009	Yesus na somagdoba´ ag uboga gigib gamyag bugogog, di oumunggun Minggu nenegab gwelegna´ lugun na, oumunggun nong na Maria Magdalena ag omoranggayog (Maria gene na damen Yesus di meili gange nang segbare wa´ilameg bog wesiamog gel genege).
41016010	Anda Maria Magdalena na Yesus ag dirigoga balameg nang sig ag omoladbisiog, anegag na Al salag ag uboga engelamega´ ag anege.
41016011	Bog wenege sabseibi Yesus na gigib gamyag bugogla, ba eildi eibla arayayeg yubu nenege signa gegbayeg, bog sirig sembibeg gom.
41016012	Gigib wenena Alna on yog a´osing songe sambibog, di Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang besene ag yogso a´osing ura sig a´osing ag lag neneldalyayog. Sig besene na weig as beiyagsig langgindoga balamdeg bog.
41016013	Wera sig besene na on losombareg di siggabo yog nimi ag omoladyesireg, bog siggabo di babe sig besene ag na sirig sembibsieg gom.
41016014	Goggobdagna´ na Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ga´lombare nang ag lag neneldalyayog, signa gwaneng delameg bog. Anda sigdi gange gas una´ ab sirig seinilina´ gom ab se, sig ag Eildi lebsiog, anese signa Al somagdoba´ ag uboga gamyag bugogog, ba ising eibig nimi di Alna gigib gamyag bugogla abeg yubu ag sirig lebang seinilina´ goma´ se.
41016015	Anda Eildi sigag lebog di na: “Bululum di mogsogo nimi nisin ag Eimayong di Besarob Yubu nene lera omoladbusululum.
41016016	Nimi dogne alna eildi odseig seinilina´ di dobonggirub wenena, yogsum alna bleblula´, bog nimi dogne alna eildi odseig seinilina´ gom wenena alna iginne degna´ iginne aga deglula´.
41016017	Gedneb gedneb una´ne nenena odseig seinilina´ nimi ag dangalyalamlula´, signa Neri si ag uboga babe meili gange nang wa´indub nimi dolanalamsugonga´, di signa wenog yog yubu-yog yubu babe lemgonga´.
41016018	Baga´ babe sigdi see di dolsalelamgonga´, somagna´se yoo selele mag delamgonga´ anda babe, signa somagna´ sigag bebogsulul goma´, yogne-yogne iginne babe, sigdi see babe neigna´ nimi eilib sesalelonglamsiyig bog, sigdi neigna´ nenege na egeldalamgonga´.”
41016019	Yesus na Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ag nene songe gigib lebog di wenena, Alna eimasag bowinggindibog di, Eimayong di sirig se agsig bulwinggiog.
41016020	Wera sig nisin babe na yog sogo-yog sogo eim lomon as lomon Eimayong di Besarob Yubu nene lera bolanggieg, anda Ayong Weigne ab isiboga wee nason welamang, Eimayong di Besarob Yubu babe gedneb-gednebne ab di sunum besarob dangilimla.
42001001	Teofilus bebnagne, nun gan-gan ag ab danggayo ununa´ nenege na nimi di membugob aboga sumbayeg,
42001002	sigdi nun ag ura ombadsieg songe, damen ab ising di eiya Weig yubu omoladsina´ ab di
42001003	Anese aboga, nana ununa´ nenege nisin damen unubayegne nenege gigib delegoga eel di, nana a´unse mome besa urubub buku ag dobnun aboga garerob yubu dobsi,
42001004	ba an eel danggulom aboga, yogne-yogne nisin an ag ombadgeyeg yubu nenege nisin na odseig sirigne.
42001005	Herodes na Yudea nimi borobne ulamog wenena, nimi dogne Abia agsigne aga eildi si na Zakharia imamne ulamog. Eildi gel na Harun yena´ gel eildi si na Elisabet.
42001006	Sig besene na Eimayong a´osing ag besarob sirig nimi ulamdeg di lerob yubu nisin ag lebda ulamdeg di Ayong Weigne di unum gareboga deirubne ag ab na sodnerob una´ gom-gom ulamdeg.
42001007	Bog signa me odgom, anese Elisabet na yougel ba sig besene na wisi salag ulamdeg.
42001008	Ig dogne sum na sigdi wee wensum danggayog, ba Zakharia na Ayong Weigne a´osing ag imam wee welamog.
42001009	Anese sob ura ulamegob undi obeg, sum nene na imam nene di welamlul aboga begna´se, Geis Legdob Ee ag anege besarob song gal dana´ dalwa´na´se na al aga webeg.
42001010	Wenege nimi nisin na asag longgoga doa yubu lemeg. Sum nenege na besarob song gal dana´ se suma´ anda.
42001011	Zakharia ag Ayong Weigne di eimnang dogne lag danggayog di song dana´ ouling beram sirig ag samo segamog.
42001012	Alna ununa´ nenege eibog di langom aboga log ubog.
42001013	Bog Eimnang nenege di alag lebog di na: “Zakharia lei, log unggom, eindi doa yubu na gigib gegbala´ anda eindi gel Elisabet na anse me nengmabo manggulula´, anda eildi si na Yohanes aboga singgulom.
42001014	Anna ngingyang uboga eii dolamloma´, anda nimi dina´ babe al manggala´ se ngingyang ulamgonga´.
42001015	Anese alna Ayong Weigne a´osing ag noble di, alna anggur goma serem song mag dena´ gom-gom ulamle di eilin me eilina´ ag muruba´ Geid Gange degneboga ulamlula´;
42001016	Israel nimi nisin na sigdi Eimayong Ayong Weigne ag eildi boradeibsulula´,
42001017	Elia di migib ab gange ab di Alna Ayong Weigne damen menggoga balamlula´, ayong yabo di gange na samboga me ag deilyalamsulula´, gegeng gom nimi di gange na sirig nimi di gange ag beyalamsulula´. Unubogale di Alse nimi gedneboga deiblula´.”
42001018	Ba Zakharia di eimnang nenegag lebog di na: “Ununa´ nene sunum danggulula´ anege na sa´ura eel danggounun do? Anese nana wisi salag ba neri gel babe mangaroba´ salag na gigib wisi dangdob.”
42001019	Eimnang nenege di yubu degna´ alag lebog di na: “Nana Gabriel Eimayong ag arolamnange anda nana an ab yubu selbanem di Besarob Yubu ane ombadlul aboga bogibnel.
42001020	Odseig anna yubu gomne danggoga yubu goma´ ulamlem murub nene nisin danggulul, anese anna neri lebna yubu nene odseig sembiblam goma´se sirigne danggale sum nenegaga.”
42001021	Wenege nimi dina´ na Zakharia se dilamega´ anda. Signa budna´ aboga ngalaglameg, alna geid legdob ee lomag uldablamoga´se.
42001022	Al langgiog wenege na, sigag yubu babe lebog gom ba signa eel ubeg, alna geid legdob ee lomag ab yogne dogne eiyamla aboga; Anese alna yubu unum gom umog ba sigag see di sunuboga ombadsiog.
42001023	Eildi wee wena´ salag gigib dagog wenege na, alna eildi ee ag biog.
42001024	Li edbare so uboga gigib wenena eildi gel Elisabet na me bobog, anda wal lambare na lag dangalyanggana´ gom-gom ulamog, di eildi lebog di na
42001025	“Anena nase Ayong Weigne di una´ di, nimi dina´ a´osing ag neri eili deiya´ wene lubibnel.”
42001026	Na´ab wal ag ab Eimayong di eimnang Gabriel Galilea sogo ag ad si na Nazaret bulom aboga bogdebel yayog,
42001027	goubini gel dogne ag nimi dogne si na Yusuf di saboga bolamog Daud di eelom nimi di; goubini gel genege di si na Maria.
42001028	Eimnang nenege na Maria di ee ag wa´ina eildi lebog di: “Gibgen, an aga besirub, Ayong Weigne na an ag ulamgulula´.”
42001029	Maria na leldogog yubu nenege gegboga langom abog di nong na sa´ase gibnel aboga eildi gange lomag isidanggayog
42001030	Eimne benege di alag lebog di na: “Maria lei, log unggom, anese anna Eimayong a´osing ag glagia doladsina´ dobloma´.
42001031	Sirig anna yogsum na me boblem di nengmabo mangguloma´ anda Eildi si na Yesus singgulom.
42001032	Alna Weig danggale wenena Eimayong Weig bebnagne di Me alamgonga´. Anda Ayong Weigne Eimayong di Eildi ayong mangadangdobne Daud di borobne na Alag glagia dodlula´,
42001033	Anda Alna unum-unum se Yakub yena´ nimi di borobne ulamlula´ anda Eildi Borobne na goggob daglul goma´.”
42001034	Eimnang ag Maria di lebog di na: “Nana nengabo gom gel bog ununa´ nene na sa´ura danggulula´ do?”
42001035	Alag eimnang di yubu degna´ na: “Geid Gange na an eilib yunggile di Eimayong Yaga´ Bebnagne di migib na an ag dembonggibgulula´; anese eindi manggulom me nenege na geidne, Eimayong Mamne alamgonga´.
42001036	Sirig anggagal Elisabet babe na wisi salag bog me nengmabo bomla, anda wal nene na alna na´ab wal umla, yougel alameldong gel genege na.
42001037	Anese Eimayong na sonda´ lenggomne.”
42001038	Maria di lebog dina: “Sirig nana Ayong Weigne di ouragna´ gel; eindi leblam yubu nenege nisin na, na ag unubulula´.” Ba eimnang nenege na alag louya bindibog.
42001039	Li edbare so sum gigib uboga Maria na berera mein bisig uboga Yehuda ad dogne ag biog.
42001040	Anege ab na alna Zakharia di ee ag wa´iog di Elisabet ag na ´e aboga gibog.
42001041	Elisabet na Maria di gibna´ gegeldogog wenege, Elisabet babe na Geid Gange degneboga eildi me me eilina´ lomag bomoga´ na sa´almerelamog,
42001042	ba yubu migiba´ biaboga lemog di na: “Gelabo nisin gan-gan ag ab anna beisirub eindi me eilina´ di do babe beisirub.
42001043	Nana edne aboga Na´neyong Weigne eilin di gemelyanelam do?
42001044	Anese sirig, eindi gibna´ yubu neri oo ag gegeldogna wenena, neri me me eilina´ lomag na sa´mereboga danggweleng alamla.
42001045	Anda alna ngingyang ulamlul gigib odseig seinilina´ se, anese alag Ayong Weigne di sa´asonge lerobne nenege na, nisin sunum unubulula´ aboga.”
42001046	Wera Maria di lemog di na: “Neri gange na Ayong Weigne ag bebnag deilimna,
42001047	di neri gange na, na Blebnenne Eimayong se ngingyang ulamnel,
42001048	Anese na lamarob gange di Eildi ouragna´ ulamna´se Eildi eibneyo. Odseig wene ab eilniboga yog mangadangden balamig nimi donogo di babe nana besarob ngingyang gange deirub gel alamnugonga´,
42001049	Anese Alna Yaga´ Migibne di weig ununa´ nisin nayag ubneyo anda, Eildi si na Geis.
42001050	Anda Eildi weradona´ na Alag log seinilimig nimi ag ulamsulula´, mangadangden donogo nimi ag babe.
42001051	Eildi see di ununa´ na Eildi migib di omoldalamlula´, anda dengdang ana´ gange nimi na doulul seigilimsulula´.
42001052	Sig weig buna´ ag salerob nimi nisin na Eildi sogo ag deibsulula´, di sig sogo ag gange nimi nisin na bebnag deibsulula´;
42001053	Alna yo nimi ag na besarobne dina´ ma´iya doladlamsil, di seyag nimi ag na see baneng bindiblulum alamla;
42001054	Alna Eildi ouragna´ne Israel arolamla, anese Alna Eildi weradona´ sembia di,
42001055	Eildi nunisang yabo ag ura leiblouyamog songe, unum-unum se Abraham ab eildi mangadangdob nimi ab se.”
42001056	Anda Maria na Elisabet ab nason wal weneli so ulamdega´ anda, on eildi ee ag ya´indibog.
42001057	Elisabet na me mangan wal gigib ubog wenena alna me nengmabo manggayog.
42001058	Eildi neig asag nimi ab, algabo ab, al yena´ nimi ab na Ayong Weigne di alag weradona´ dina´ di una´ nenege signa gegelameg di, al ab nason ngingyang ulameg.
42001059	Anda sum lin bare gigib wenena signa me nenege bog gareboga aleyong di si ag dirigoga Zakharia singgugob aboga ulameg,
42001060	bog eilin di lebog di na: “Gom, alna Yohanes singgugob.”
42001061	Alag sigdi lebeg di na: “Anggabo di mabo di si babe aneso singirub gom si bog.”
42001062	Di aleyong ag na me si na edsi aga singgugob do aboga see di sumboga isibayeg.
42001063	Ba alna mome don girig dogne molbesiog di mome na aneso leboga dobog: “Eildi si na Yohanes.” Ba signa nenege nisin se ngalagayeg.
42001064	Anda wenege sabseibi eildi bam guboga silamu yongon ubog ba alna yubu leboga Eimayong meiboga giblamog.
42001065	Wera beram ulameg nimi nisin na log ubsiog ba unubayog ununa´ nenege Yudea mein nisin ag lera yabalameg.
42001066	Anda ununa´ nene gegbayeg nimi nisin na, gange ag doboga sembibeg di lemeg di na: “Me nene na eimig na sa´aso danggulula´ do?” Ayong Weigne di see na alag bo ulamla´ se.
42001067	Aleyong Zakharia na, Geid Gange degnebayog ba, eimigsig ubneb yubu lemog di na:
42001068	“Ayong Weigne Israel nimi di Eimayong ag meiboga gibgob, anese Alna Eildi nimi ag aroboga lobsina´ ag bobalamsulula´,
42001069	Eildi nunse blebsina´ gwaga´ segibog, Eildi ouragna´ne Daud di mangadangden nimi aga,
42001070	– damen danegab Eildi yubu geis legdob nabi nang bam ag uboga lemog songe –
42001071	nun ag malborob nimi ag uboga lobolisina´ se, nun ag goroglamsiang nimi nisin di see ag ab uboga di babe,
42001072	Eildi weradona´ na nunisang yabo ag omoladlamsildo, di Eildi geis leiloulina´ ag sembia,
42001073	nenege na Eildi nunayong Abraham ag leiblouyamogne na, Eildi nunag glagia dodsineba´se,
42001074	nun ag malborob nimi see ag uboga lobibsile, ba nunna log gom gom Al giblamgob aboga,
42001075	nunna Al a´osing ag geis legdob ab sirigne ab aga ura ulamgob.
42001076	Anda an neri me lei, Eimayong Yaga´ Bebnagne di nabinge alamgonga´; anese anna an damen menggoga balamlem di Al Ayong Weigne se bisig gednelamloma´,
42001077	Eildi nimi ag na sigdi meilinge lubilisina´ ag, deiya´ deiya blebsina´ besa eel una´ doaddob,
42001078	nun ag Eimayong di wana´ usina´ ab weradona´ ab, di Eildi nun ag arolamsulula´, bebnag ouling ag uboga gwelegnag ab eseng oulu bowenggalamla songe,
42001079	sig gunu lomag ulamang nimi ab somagna´ne damag ulamang nimi ab ag waralamsile ba nundi yan loboga isiboga mon angarob una´ ag boradeibsineb.”
42001080	Me nenege na weiga´ nolamog di eildi gange babe yaga´ migib ulamog. Anda alna bubsya´ ag ulamoga´ murub eildi sum ubog wenena Israel nimi ag lag yayog.
42002001	Sum nenege na, Roma sogo borobne Kaisar Agustus na, nimi nisin di si mome ag dolyugong arob yubu doblenggibog.
42002002	Nimi si eildina´ nene na oumunggun nong ubegne, Kirenius na Siria sogo ag Gubernur ulamog salag ab.
42002003	Wera nimi nisin na mome si dobgob aboga balameg, sigdi as eleb-eleb uboga.
42002004	Anda Yusuf babe na weig ad Nazaret uboga Galilea sogo di Yudea uboga Daud di ad si Betlehem biog, anese alna Daud di mangadangden nimia´ anda neig eelom aboga –
42002005	Eildi saboga dorob gel Maria na me bomog bog mome si dobnom aboga nason bireg.
42002006	Signa anegag bireg bog Maria na me mangana´ beram ubog,
42002007	ba alna eildi me yandonge nengmabo manggayog, di bagsum di wamleboga meiya´ densadna´ lomag meiyamog, sig man ee ouling dogne odgom se.
42002008	Mogsogo nenegag ab bubsya´ag domba wennang na einimnag signa domba wera ulameg.
42002009	Sigag Ayong Weigne di eimnang dogne sig beram oloboga segelyayog ba Ayong Weigne di melega´ na sigag dinggonggibsiog ba signa yaga´ log ulameg.
42002010	Ba eimnang nenege di sigag lebog di na: “Log unggom, anese nana mogsogo nimi nisin se besarob ngingyang yubu lera yan:
42002011	Sum nene Daud asag na a´unse Blebsinne gigib manggamla, anege na Kristus.
42002012	Anda a´unse gednebne na ane: A´unna me dogne bagsum di geseboga sapi di dena´ deilina´ ouling ag meiyamanga´ eibluluma´.”
42002013	Wenege sabseibi on eimnang dina´ ab isiboga segelyayeg di eimag ulamang nang dina´ di Eimayong meiboga giblameg, di lemeg di na:
42002014	“Eimayong bebnagne na yaga´ bebnag ouling ag ulamla, ba sogo nimi na isiboga mon angarob una´ di Eildi yonge ag ulamgonga´.”
42002015	Gigib wenena Eimnang danege na sigag loboga on eimasag winggindibeg, ba domba wennang danege na sig moumun lebongdanggayeg di: “Ayong Weigne di nun ag lebla songe, nunna sa´asonge danggamla´ Betlehem onogo gemelbugob.”
42002016	Di signa berera bindoga Maria ab Yusuf ab me nenege na meiya´ densadna´ lomag malamoga´ ab eibsieg.
42002017	Anda signa Al eibeg wenege na, Me nenege se yubu sigag leboga ombaramsiogne nenege sigag ombadsieg.
42002018	Anda nimi nisin na domba wennang di sigag lebeg yubu nenege gegbayeg wenena signa budna´ alameg.
42002019	Bog Maria na una´ nenege nisin na doboga deiya eildi gange ag dolamog.
42002020	Wera domba wennang danege na on somboga balameg wenena, Eimayong bebnag deiya gibgi balameg yogne-yogne nisin sigdi gegboga eiyamegne nenege se, sigag lemogne nenege nisin sunum eibeg di.
42002021	Lin bare sum gigib sunum dangalbayog wenena, Alna gere boga´ gareboga Eildi si na Yesus singgayeg, si nene na Alna eilin di bona´ arobog eimnang di lemeg si.
42002022	Musa di wenena´ yubu ag lebda sigdi geis una´ sum gigib dangalbiog wenena, Alna Ayong Weigne ag dodneb Alna sigdi Yerusalem asag bobieg,
42002023	Ayong Weigne di garerob yubu ag mome na aneso dorob: “Me nengmabo yandonge nisin na Eimayong se geisne deiblulum aroba´ anda,”
42002024	sa´asonge oboga doladna´ senge na Ayong Weigne di garerob yubu ag dirigoga wenena, tekukur winang besene goma merpati winang me besene goma aroba´ anda.
42002025	Yerusalem asag nimi dogne si na Simeon ulamog. Alna sirig besarobne Israel nimi gange iga´ dibsina´se dira ulamog, ba Geid Gange na alag ulamog.
42002026	Alag Geid Gange di damen lag lemog di na, alna Mesias eilina´ arobog wenena somagdoblom goma´ amog, nenege na Al Ayong Weigne di Mesias.
42002027	Al na Geid Gange di Eimayong di Ee ag yayog. Wenege Me Yesus anege na aleyong ab eilin ab di boboga Damen Wenena´ Yubu ag songe Alag ubnom aboga bowa´ireg,
42002028	ba alna Me nenege doboga eirisalbayog di Eimayong giboga lemog di na:
42002029	“Ayong Weigne lei, wene Eindi ouragna´ne ane na isiboga mon angarob gange di bildiblul aboga, Eindi yubu ag dirigoga see loubnulom,
42002030	Anese Eindi blebsina´ nenege na neri ising di gigib eibna,
42002031	nenege na yog as yog as nimi nisin a´osing ag Eindi gigib gedneboga deibluma´ anda,
42002032	nenege na yog as yog as nimi se lag danggoga diman waralamsile, di Eindi Israel nimi se bebnagne ulamlula´.”
42002033	Anda aleyong ab eilin ab na Alse lebog yubu nisin gegboga budna´ alamdeg.
42002034	Wera Simeon na sigag gigib besibsiog di Menege eilin Maria ag lebog di na: “Odseig Me nene na Israel nimi nisin se doboga segilisina´ ab dolengsina´ ab se ulamle ba gedneba´ anda nimi nisin na byabaldana´ ulamgonga´
42002035	anda a´undi gange ag na mal songe sengablamsulula´, nimi nisin di gange lomag seinilina´ lag danggulul aboga.”
42002036	Anegag na Hana babe od umog, alna nabi gel, Fanuel manggel Asyer sisa´ nimi. Alna wisi sirig gel. Alna nenge ag dobog di wenege na alegne ab na eseng yala´ segbare umdeg,
42002037	anda wene alna geiriya´ gel ulamog di eseng yala´ na delapan puluh empat ulamog. Di alna Eimayong di Ee ag na loubnang gom-gom sinag gwelegnag giboga dena´ gom-gom doa yubu lera ulamog.
42002038	Anda alna wenege babe anegag yayog di Eimayong ag na´e aboga gibog di Me nenege se yubu babe na Yerusalem asag lobsina´ se dira ulameg nimi nisin ag lemog.
42002039	Anda Damen Wenena´ Yubu ag unulamlulum aboga lerobne nisin gigib unubareg wenena, signa on sigdi asag anege weig ad na Nazaret Galilea sogo ag yareg.
42002040	Me nenege na nonggela´ nolamog di migib danggoga, gerem ulamog, ba Eimayong di glagia doladsina´ na Alag ulamog.
42002041	Sob-sob eseng yala´ nisin na Yesus aleyong ab eilin ab na seni Paskah yona´ sum na Yerusalem asag balamdeg.
42002042	Yesus mangaroba´ salag na eseng yala´ oo bare ubog wenena sigdi weigsum sob ununa´ songe Yerusalem asag winggieg.
42002043	Seni yuna´ sum nisin gigib wenena signa bildibgob aboga balamdeg bog Yesus na Yerusalem asag ulamog aleyong ab eilin ab wangan bog.
42002044	Anese sigdi sembia na Alna neigbisig balamab nimi ab balamang sembia signa bisig mogsogo wesumboga bireg, di signa sigdi eelom nimi ab sig eel nimi ab gan-gan ag danege elamdeg.
42002045	Anese signa Al eibdeg gom di signa losomba Yerusalem asag on Al elbireg.
42002046	Li weneli sum gigib uboga Alna Eimayong di Ee ag ulamog ba eibdeg; Alna weig yubu omoladsina´ nang gan-gan ag bulamog, di sigdi lemeg yubu gegboga sigag isina´ yubu babe isilamsiog.
42002047	Anda Alag gegelameg nimi nisin na Eildi yubu gerem ab Eildi yubu degna´ nisin lemogne ab se yaga´ budna´ alameg.
42002048	Anda aleyong ab eilin ab na Al eibdeg wenege na, eilin di, Alag lebog di na: “Neri Me lei, Anna nun ag sa´a se aneso ubsiom do? Aneyong ab na ab na anse elamgenam di giring eisa´ eibnam.”
42002049	Eildi yubu degna´ sigag lebog di na: “A´unna sa´aboga Nase elamnerom do? Nana Na´neyong di Ee ag ulamna´ anege na a´unna eel gom de?”
42002050	Bog Eildi sigag lebog yubu nong na signa besa sembibdeg gom.
42002051	Di Alna sigab nason Nazaret asag yayeg; anda Alna sigdi yubu gegboga sigdamag ulamog. Ba eilin na ununa´ nenege nisin eildi gange ag deilimog.
42002052	Anda Yesus na Eildi nong babe weiga´ nolamog di Eildi gange gerem seinilina´ babe ma´alamog; ba Eimayong di babe nimi di babe wana´ ulameg.
42003001	Kaisar Tiberius di bomog salag na eseng yala´ kelima belas bomog, wenege na Pontius Pilatus na Yudea asag se weigne ulamog, ba Herodes na Galilea mogsogo sig se borobne ulamog, alga Filipus na Ituria mogsogo ab Trakhonitis mogsogo ab se borobne ulamog, ba Lisanias na Abilene mogsogo sig se borobne ulamog,
42003002	Sum nenege na Hanas ab Kayafas ab na Weig Imam nang danggamdeg, bog Eimayong di yubu na Zakharia mamne Yohanes bubsya´ag ulamoga´ ag yayog.
42003003	Yohanes na mag Yordan domon nisin ag yabalamog di eildi yubu na noroldana´ di yubu migiba´ mag dolongsina´ se, meilinge loldogna´ yubu ab meilinge lubna´ yubu ab lemog,
42003004	Yesaya di eimigsig ubnebne se buku ag mome domog songe: “Bubsya´ ag yubu dogne lera ulamle di na: Ayong Weigne se bisig gednebululum, di Alse bisig na wes doumdigum membululum.
42003005	Bluag na songa´ deibneba´, di mein ounang nisin ag na neigdiguma´ ubneba´, gegdoba´ ag na wes ubneba´, winggina yunggina uruba´ ag na neigdiguma´ ubneba´,
42003006	anda nimi nisin na Ayong Weigne di blebsina´ eibgonga´.”
42003007	Wera nimi dina´ na mag dobonggibsulul aboga alag yalameg, ba eildi lebog di na: “A´un baga´ gei di yala´ dorob nimi lei! Edne di a´un ag lemla, ba eimig a´un ag gorogna´ deilisila´ ag anege na blebdangga bineb de?
42003008	Noroldana´ gange di meilinge lobogloma´ do anegag sumboga. Anda a´undi gange ag og Abraham na nundi ayong seiniling gom! Anese nana a´un ag lebnun: Eimayong di na girig nisin ane aga Abraham di mabo danggibnemen!
42003009	Yee na gigib gedneboga gal yareng ag deibog anda do besa mouna´ gom gal nisin na weble di ug lomag boreblula´.”
42003010	Ba nimi dina´ di alag isibayeg di na: “Aneso wenena, nunna sa´ubgob do?”
42003011	Ba eildi yubu degna´ na: “Nimi dogne eildi nong bagsum besene od wenena gom nimi ag dogne boglul, nimi dogne alna dena´ od wenena al babe neigne unubulul.”
42003012	Wase donnang babe mag dobonggibsulul aboga yayeg di signa alag isibayeg di na: “Omoladsina´ne lei, nunna sa´a aga ubgob do?”
42003013	Ba eildi yubu degna´ na: “A´unna weiga´ loboga molosing gom, bog a´unse gigib gedneboga garerobne og.”
42003014	Anda yin yagnang di babe na alag isibayeg di na: “Wera nunna sa´a ubgob do?” Ba Yohanes di yubu degna´ sigag na: “Alaboga dona´ ab loboga dosina´ ab na unggom bog a´undi wee di degna´ sunumne og dolamlulum.”
42003015	Bog nimi dina´ na neboma dira ulamega´ anda, sig nisin Yohanes se yubu na gange ag og isildalameg, alna Mesias dore aboga,
42003016	bog Yohanes di yubu degna´ sig nisin nimi ag lebog di na: “Nana mag sirig ag dobonggibsunun, bog Al eimig yululne na migibne na songe gom anda nana Eildi yan ongona´ wed babe ubuma lobeganmen gom. Anda yogsum a´unna Eildi Geid Gange ab ug ab di dobonggibsulula´.
42003017	Sebyaresalboga geila´ lenga´ losamboga borebnange na Eildi see ag gigib bomla anda Eildi gandum do nong na golonga´ ag deiblula´, bog geila´ na sabnemen gom ug ag Eildi dablula´.”
42003018	Yohanes na yog wenena´ yubu ab nimi nisin ag Besarob Yubu omoladlamsiog.
42003019	Aneso ulamog dog Herodes mogsogo borobne di alga di gel Herodias doboga´ ab eildi yog meilinge nisin unulamogne ab se delagoga lemog,
42003020	ba borobne na on yog meilinge ab ma´aboga Yohanes na dolongsina´ ee ag dobonggibog.
42003021	Nimi dina´ gigib mag dobonggibsiog di wenege na Yesus babe mag dobonggibog ba doa yubu anam leldogog bog eim isigin gabog
42003022	di Geid Gange na winang merpati nong songe Al eilib yunggiog. Bog gegeldogog ba eimag uboga yubu dogne leldogog di na: “Anna Neri Me Neri wana´ ulamgenne, Anse aga Neri ngingyang ulamnel.”
42003023	Yesus na Eildi wee eilnibayog wenege na, Eildi mangaroba´ salag eseng yala´ na tiga puluh tahun so bog anda nimi di seinilina´ na Alna Yusuf mamne, Yusuf na Eli mamne,
42003024	Eli na Matat mamne, Matat na Lewi mamne, Lewi na Malkhi mamne, Malkhi na Yanai mamne, Yanai na Yusuf mamne,
42003025	Yusuf na Matica mamne, Matica na Amos mamne, Amos na Nahum mamne, Nahum na Hesli mamne, Hesli na Nagai mamne,
42003026	Nagai na Maat mamne, Maat na Matica mamne, Matica na Simei mamne, Simei na Yosekh mamne, Yosekh na Yoda mamne,
42003027	Yoda na Yohanan mamne, Yohanan na Resa mamne, Resa na Zerubabel mamne, Zerubabel na Sealtiel mamne, Sealtiel na Neri mamne,
42003028	Neri na Malkhi mamne, Malkhi na Adi mamne, Adi na Kosam mamne, Kosam na Elmadam mamne, Elmadam na Er mamne,
42003029	Er na Yesua mamne, Yesua na Eliezer mamne, Eliezer na Yorim mamne, Yorim na Matat mamne, Matat na Lewi mamne,
42003030	Lewi na Simeon mamne, Simeon na Yahuda mamne, Yehuda na Yusuf mamne, Yusuf na Yonam mamne, Yonam na Elyakim mamne,
42003031	Elyakim na Melea mamne, Melea na Mina mamne, Mina na Matata mamne, Matata na Natan mamne, Natan na Daud mamne,
42003032	Daud na Isai mamne, Isai na Obed mamne, Obed na Boas mamne, Boas na Salmon mamne, Salmon na Nahason mamne,
42003033	Nahason na Aminadab mamne, Aminadab na Admin mamne, Admin na Arni mamne, Arni na Hezron mamne, Hezron na Peres mamne, Peres na Yehuda mamne,
42003034	Yehuda na Yakub mamne, Yakub na Ishak mamne, Ishak na Abraham mamne, Abraham na Terah mamne, Terah na Nahor mamne,
42003035	Nahor na Serug mamne, Serug na Rehu mamne, Rehu na Peleg mamne, Peleg na Eber mamne, Eber na Salmon mamne.
42003036	Salmon na Kenan mamne, Kenan na Arpakhsad mamne, Arpakhsad na Sem mamne, Sem na Nuh mamne, Nuh na Lamekh mamne,
42003037	Lamekh na Metusalah mamne, Metusalah na Henokh mamne, Henokh na Yared mamne, Yared na Mahalaleel mamne, Mahalaleel na Kenan mamne,
42003038	Kenan na Enos mamne, Enos na Set mamne, Set na Adam mamne, Adam na Eimayong di me.
42004001	Yesus na Geid Gange degneboga on mag Yordan ag uboga Geid Gange di dora bogoga bubsya´ ag sig bobiog.
42004002	Anegag Alna empat puluh sum ulamog ba Iblis di ouragalyayog. Anegag ulamog sum abenege Alna dena´ gom-gom ulamog di gwaneng yo ubog.
42004003	Ba Iblis di Alag lebog di na: “Anna Eimayong mamne wenena, girig ane aga gwaneng roti danggulula´ se leblom.”
42004004	Ba Yesus di yubu degna´ alag lebog di na: “Mome dorob di na: Nimi na gwaneng roti di og gamyag ulameldong gom.”
42004005	Gigib wenena eildi Yesus na bebnag ouling dognag bobiog di sogo ag borobne nisin ising ublamab alamang songe ura Alag ombayog.
42004006	Iblis di Alag lebog di na: “Yogne-yogne bo usina´ ab bebnagne ab na nayag dowaddoba´ anda nisin An ag dodgunun anda neri dodnuna´ na neri dodnun sembibne nimi ag dodnun.
42004007	Anna na damag malya´ina gibnulom wenena, nene nisin na Einda´ danggulula´.”
42004008	Bog Yesus alag lebog di na: “Mome dorob di na: Anna Ayong Weigne Eimayong ag og giblem di anna Eildi yubu og dolamlom arob!”
42004009	Gigib wenena eildi Yesus na Yerusalem asag bobiog di, Eimayong Ee aroma´ eilib segibog di Alag lebog di na: “Anna Eimayong Mamne wenena, Anna ane ag uboga ounu sa´lenggiblom,
42004010	Anese An se yubu mome na aneso doroba´ anda, Alna Eildi eimnang ag An wegena´ se ouragibsulula´,
42004011	ba Anna sigdi se yanggol ag yangasalbagugonga´, girig di Eindi yan oulug diggulul gom aboga.”
42004012	Yesus di yubu degna´ alag lebog di na: “Weig yubu ag na: Anna Ayong Weigne Eimayong ag sunung gom arob!”
42004013	Iblis na yogne yogne nisin gigib ouragsabog di wenena, alna Alag loboga besarob garen sum donaga dira ubnun aboga bindibog.
42004014	Yesus na Geid Gange migib ab di on Galilea sogo ag yayog. Anda Alse yubu na mogsogo nenege ag wegelganeglamog.
42004015	Wenege Alna yubu don ee nisin ag danege omoladlamsiog ba nimi nisin di Alag meiblameg.
42004016	Alna Nazaret Al weig uyameg asag yayog, anda Eildi sob ura unub Besen Sum Alna yubu dona´ ee ag wa´iyog, di Weig Yubu eildibunun aboga segogog.
42004017	Weig yubu eildibunun aboga segogog ba, Alag na damen nabi Yesaya di dorob buku Yesus ag doboga doreg, ba buku nenege sanggoga, yubu nene ag eiya sanggayog:
42004018	“Ayong Weigne di Gange na, Na ag od ulamnel, Nana gigib Eildi see mag deibneyoga´se, sig segom nimi ag Besarob Yubu omoladsina´se; Eildi Na gigib bogdebelyaneog
42004019	sig gouboga deiruba´ ulamang nimi ag na lobna´ yubu ombadsulul, ising urub nimi na eibgong, gwaregdob nimi na lobdob ulamgong, Ayong Weigne weradona´ eseng yala´ na gigib yala´se.”
42004020	Gigib eildibayog di Buku anege na gigib wa´abonggia wee nimi ag doara bugog; ba dona´ ee nenegag nimi nisin di ising na Alag balamog.
42004021	Wera Alna eilniboga sigag omoladsiog di Eildi sigag lebog di na: “Gegeldoglom sum nene ab ayat nene ag dorobne na sunum ubla.”
42004022	Anda sig nimi nisin di Alna sirig danggibig di Eildi gemerob yubu leboga´ se babe budna´ alameg, di sigdi lemeg di na: “Al ane na Yusuf di me gom de?”
42004023	Ba Eildi sigag lebog di na: “Sirig eimig a´undi yubu dognog Nayag leblulum di na: Wesisinne lei, Andama´ wesedangdoblem di Eindi as nene ag babe unubulom, yogne-yogne nisin Kapernaum ab unulamlum ba nundi gegelamubne nenege unubulom!”
42004024	On Eildi lebog di na: “Nana a´un ag lebnun, sirig nabi nang na eildi asag nimi di na gegelameldong gom.
42004025	Nana a´un ag lebnun, Neri lebnunne nenena sirig yubu: Elia ulamog wilman wenege na Israel sogo ag geiriya´ gelabo dina´ ulameg, wenege na eseng yala´ weneli wal na´ab bare eim isigin seregdoba´ ulamog ba mogsogo nisin ag na omom gwaneng yo girim langgilamog,
42004026	Bog Elia na sig geiriya´ gelabo danegag bogdebamog gom, alna Sidon sogo ag ab Sarfat asag geiriya´ gel dognag bogdebamog.
42004027	Anda nabi Elisa wilman sum babe Israel nimi meibu susu blolamsiog nimi dina´ od bog sig nimi danege aga nimi dognog babe wesibog gom, bog Siria nimi Naaman og wesibog.”
42004028	Yubu nenege gegbayeg di yubu dona´ ee ag nimi danege nisin yaga´ gorogna´ubeg.
42004029	Sig nisin na segogeg Yesus a´osing gareboga Alna ad beiyagsig bolanggieg di ad nenege goggobag gosag bobieg, Alna god nenegag doranaggob aboga.
42004030	Bog sig gan-gan ag ab uboga olob-oloba bindibog.
42004031	Gigib ba Yesus na weig as dogne Galilea sogo ag Kapernaum biog, di Besen Sum nisin na anege ag omoladlamsiog.
42004032	Signa Eildi omoladlamsiogne se budna´ aboga gegelameg, anese Eildi lemog yubu na migib gedman lemoga´ se.
42004033	Yubu dona´ ee ag anege na meili gange nang wa´ildub nimi dogne od umog di alna yubu migiba´ biaboga lemog di na:
42004034	“Yesus Nazaretne lei, Anna nunag sa´ubsunun aboga yalam do? Anna nun oboga gom ubsineb yalam de? Nana eel Anna: Eim Ayong ag uboga Geis Legdobne.”
42004035	Bog Yesus di alag obog di Eildi lebog di na: “Gelegalem di alag uboga langgulom!” Ba meili gange nang nenege na nimi dina´ gan-gan ag uboga nimi nenege wegdeboga langgiog di on ouyag neigna´ ulilyayog gom.
42004036	Anda nimi nisin na budna´ aboga log ubsiog ba sig moumun lelongoldalameg di lemeg di na: “Lemla yubu nene na budna yubu lemla! Anese doumdigum nongob ab migib ab di Eildi meili gange nang ag lemla ba signa langgalamang.”
42004037	Di Alse yubu na mogsogo nenege ad nisin ag wegelganeglameg.
42004038	Gigib wenena Alna yubu don ee nenegag langgindoga Simon di ee ag biog. Simon alyamalgel na daboyon weiga´ neiglamog ba al arobulul aboga Yesus ag molbayeg.
42004039	Ba Alna genege abomag segogog di daboyon neigna´ nenegag lebog, ba neigna´ nenege babe na alag loboga langgiog. Ba genege na berera bugogog di sigag arolamsiog.
42004040	Sinagsig ee eseng dom-dom alamog danege na, nimi nisin na yog neigna´-yog neigna´ neiglameg nimi Yesus ag beyalamsieg. Ba Eildi see sig ag eleb-eleb salbonggia wesilimsiog.
42004041	Meili gange nang nisin babe nimi nisin ag uboga “Anna Eimayong di Me.” Aboga yubu migiba´ leble langgalameg. Ba Alna yubu leblulum gom aboga yubu migiba´ mema´ lebog, anese signa eel Alna Mesias aboga.
42004042	Ee gwelegel gasalamla wenege, Yesus na biog di deso arob ouling dognag biog. Bog nimi dina´ na alse elameg, anda al eibeg wenena nun loboga bisilag aboga Al salemumeg.
42004043	Bog Eildi sigag lebog di na: “Yog weig as nisin ag se babe Nana Eimayong Damag una´se Besarob Yubu yaga´ omoladlamsununa´ anese aboga Na bogdebelyaneog.”
42004044	Anda Alna Yudea sogo ag yubu dona´ ee nisin ag Besarob Yubu ombadda yabalamsiog.
42005001	Ig dogne sum na, Yesus na mag sein Genesaret dalag seglamog, ba nimi dina´ Al beram ya´ina longolganeglameg, Eimayong yubu gegbaneb.
42005002	Alna mag dalag perahu besene eibog. Ikan donnang na gigib yunggilameg di ikan don agleng wed mag leglameg.
42005003	Alna perahu dogne ag winggiog, perahu nenege na Simon di perahu ag, anda alag lebog di na perahu ane na mag dalag aneboga moga´ mogso gogonggiblom. Di Alna perahu eilib bugoga nimi dina´ ag omoladlamsiog.
42005004	Alna yubu gigib ombadsiog di wenena, Simon ag lebog di na: “Mag lum urug nong ag gogonggalem di ikan don agleng wed ikan dobnun aboga doreblom.”
42005005	Simon di yubu degna´ na: “Omoladsina´ne lei, nunna ousa einimnag wee nonggela´ wemab bog unuruba´ soa´ babe domab gom bog od Eindi leblama´ se nana ikan don agleng wed nene dorebnun.”
42005006	Anda signa gigib unubayeg di, ikan weiga´ dina´ dobeg, ba sigda´ ikan don agleng wed na gweldeglamog.
42005007	Anda signa siggabo yog perahu ag ulameg nang ag arolyousululum aboga see gwa´dobayeg. Ba sig yayeg di signa isiboga perahu besena´ abenegag lilameg ba ikan di perahu abenege na mag lomag bodomorobsinmenso ulamsiog.
42005008	Simon Petrus na ununa´ nene eibog di wenege na Yesus eiba´ ag malya´ina lebog di: “Ayong Weigne lei, nana meilinge se Anna nayag loboga bulom.”
42005009	Anese al ab nason ulameg nimi nisin ab na ikan dina´ dobega´ anege se budna´ aboga log ulameg;
42005010	neigsonge babe na Simon algabo Zebedeus mabo Yakobus ab Yohanes ab babe. Simon ag Yesus di lebog di na: “Log unggom, wene ab eilnibonggia anna nimi dosinne danggulom.”
42005011	Anda signa sigdi Perahu mag dalag deililbieg di, sig dinge yogne yogne nisin loboga, Yesus eimig dobda bieg.
42005012	Ig dogne sum Yesus na ad dogne ag ulamog. Anegag ab na meibu susu weiga´ blolamog nimi dogne ulamog. Alna Yesus eibog wenege na, alna malya´indoga molbayog di na: “Ayong lei, Anna wesilinena´ yo wenena na wesibnulom.”
42005013	Ba Yesus na Eildi see doblenggia benege ag salbonggibog di lebog di na: “Nana yo ulamnel, anna eg danggulom!” Al wenege sabseibi eildi neigna´ meibu susu nenege babe na gom urubog.
42005014	Yesus di nimi nenege ag yog nimi ag babe na lenggom aboga mema´ lebog: “Bilem di, imam nang ag an egdanggayoma´ anege lag lena´se omoldalbulom di Musa di lerobne songe an egdanggalama´se gibna´ deililbulom sig gedneb eel una´ se.”
42005015	Bog Yesus se yubu na yog as yog as weiga´ wegda yabalameg ba nimi dina´ Eildi yubu gegboga sigdi neigna´ wesibsulul aboga ya´ina longgoga yalameg.
42005016	Aneso ulameg bog Alna lobda deso arob ouling ag bindoga doa yubu lemog.
42005017	Ig dogne sum Yesus na omoladlamsiog ba, Farisi nimi edbareso nimi ab Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab na bugoga Alag gegelameg. Signa Galilea asag ab Yudea asag ab Yerusalem asag ab nimi ya´ilameg. Ayong Weigne di migib na Alag ulamog, ba Eildi na neigna´ nimi wesilimsiog.
42005018	Bog edbare nimi na yan ebdenerobne dogne eilda´ mana´ gedman galgolaya´ oboga bobeg di ee ag bowa´ina Yesus beram meibgob aboga ubeg.
42005019	Anegag nimi dina´ log se bowa´inmen gom ubog ba, signa ee aroma´ eilib winggiyig di aroma´ gaboga eilda´ mana´ gedman nimi dina´ gan-gan ag gaboga Yesus eiba´ ag doblenggayeg.
42005020	Yesus na sigdi odseig seinilina´ eibsiog di wenena, Eildi lebog di na: “Na´e lei, eindi meilinge na gigib lubdub.”
42005021	Bog Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab Farisi nimi ab di gange lomag sembibeg di na: “Nimi nene na ednedi Eimayong meili dolbalag nenelamla do? Nimi di meilinge na ednedi lubibsulula´ Eimayong di og lubibsulul goma´ de?”
42005022	Bog Yesus na sigdi gange seinilina´ eel ubsiog, di sigag lebog di na: “A´undi gange ag na sa´asonge se seinilimlom do?
42005023	Od yongon yubu na nesa aga lebnemen: ‘Eindi meilinge na gigib lubdub’ abnemen goma, lebseng di na: ‘Bugoglem di yabaldomlom’ abnemen gom?
42005024	Bog a´unna eel ublulum aboga, anda sogo ag ane Sogo Nimi di Me na meilinge lubsina´ se salerobne ulamla” – wera yan ebdenerob nimi nenegag Eildi lebog di –: “Nana an ag lemna, bugoglem di, einda´ ona´ mana´ ab boblem di eindi ee ag baldomlom!”
42005025	Al wenege sabseibi alna sig a´osing ag berera bugogog di, eilda´ ona´ mana´ dora dobog, di Eimayong bebnag deibdei eildi ee ag bildibog.
42005026	Nimi nisin na budna´ aboga log ubeg di Eimayong bebnag deilimeg, anda signa yaga´ log ulamsiog ba lemeg di na: “Sum nene ab budna´ne lag gigib eibab.”
42005027	Gigib ba Yesus na langgindoga bayog wenege na Alna wase oboga bonne dogne si na Lewi wase oboga molon ee ag bugamoga´ ag eibog. Yesus di alag lebog di na: “Na eimig dobda yulom!”
42005028	Ba Lewi na segogog di yogne yogne nisin loboga Al eimig dobda biog.
42005029	Anda Lewi na Alse seni weiga´ dogne eildi ee ag yobog di wase oboga molon nimi ab yog nimi dina´ ab isiboga Al ab nason delameg.
42005030	Farisi nimi ab Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab na Yesus ag dirigoga bana´ nang ag lemsieg: “A´unna sa´ase wase oboga molon nang ab meili una´ nimi ab nason neiga´ ag delamlom do?”
42005031	Ba Yesus di sigag yubu degna´ na, Eildi lebog di: “Nong besarob ninggi nimi di na wesisin nimi yo ulameldong gom, bogna neigna´ nimi di wenegaga yo ulameldong;
42005032	Nana besarob sirig nimi se biabsunun aboga yesi gom, bogna meili una´ nimi se yesi, ba signa noroldana´ gange di meilinge ag loboggong aboga.”
42005033	Farisi nimi danege di Yesus ag lebeg di na: “Yohanes ag dirigoga bana´ nimi na ig dogne ig dogne na dena´ deroggong gom len doa yubu ab lemeldong, neigsonge babe na Farisi sisya´ ag dirigoga ban nimi babe unulameldong, bog Eindi dirigoga bana´ nimi na mag ab gwaneng ab delamang.”
42005034	Sigag Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “Gel dobnebne benege na eildi nimi ba´ danege ab nason umseng dog nimi danegag na dena´ derob gom gom abso de?
42005035	Bog eimig yanggale sum nenegaga gel dobnebne benege sig gan-gan ag uboga doble sum nenegaga signa dena´ derob gom-gom ulamgonga´.”
42005036	Alna sigag sununa´ yubu dogne ombadsiog di na: “Nimi dogne di wenog bagsum aga delegoga dobso, di damen seinog bagsum ag ma´aboga wednebaso gom. Unubaso wenena, wenog bagsum nenege babe na delegaso, di damen bagsum ag ma´aroba´ anege na sunum ubso goma´ wenog bagsum di delegasoa´ ag na.
42005037	Neigsonge babe na nimi dogne di wenog anggur mag dogne na damen ma´i boga´ ag yegonggaso goma´, aneso unubaso wenena, wenog anggur mag nenege di damen agleng boga´ ma´i nenege na delegoga yegsyoa´ ba wenog anggur mag nenege na gilalobsenga´, ba ma´i boga´ nenege babe golaboga meili urubsyoa´.
42005038	Bog wenog anggur mag wenena wenog agleng ma´i boga´ ag yegonggia deibnemen.
42005039	Anda nimi dogne na damen anggur mag dele, di on wenog anggur mag babe desene aboga yo ubso goma´, anese eildi lebso di na: Damen anggur mag aga so besarob absoa´.”
42006001	Besen Sum dogne na, Yesus ab, Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ab na gandum wee bisig balameg, di Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang na gandum do dagoga see di bubya´iya delameg.
42006002	Bog Farisi nang edbare di lebeg di na: “Sa´ase a´unna Besen sum ab ununggom aboga mem arobne ag byaboga ulamlom do?”
42006003	Ba Yesus di yubu degna´ sigag na: “Daud di sa´aso umogne nenege a´unna eildina´ gom de? Al ab sig alag dirigoga bana´ nimi ab dena´ yo ubsiog ba wenege na,
42006004	alna Eimayong di ee ag wa´iog di gwaneng roti deiruba´ doboga deog di alag dirigoga bana´ nimi ag dodsioga´ anege na, gwaneng roti nenege na seila´ nimi na denggoma´ alna imam nimi og dena´ aga.”
42006005	Sigag on Yesus di lebog di na: “Sogo Nimi di Me na Besen Sum se Ayong Weigne.”
42006006	Yog Besen sum ig dogne Yesus na yubu dona´ ee ag wa´indoga omoladlamsiog. Anegag see sirig see somagdob nimi dogne od umog.
42006007	Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab Farisi nimi ab di Yesus ag ising wanalameg, Alna Besen sum bog nimi wesibnubusila´ aboga, anda Alna mednelamla abgob arob una´ di.
42006008	Bog Alna sigdi seinilina´ eel ubsiog di see somagdob nimi ag anege lebog di na: “Bugoglem di sig gan-gan ag segoglom!” Ba nimi nenege bugoga segogog.
42006009	Ba Yesus di sigag lebog di na: “Nana a´un ag isibusunun: Besen sum ab unubanmenne na nesa yaga, besarobne aga ubnemen goma meilinge aga ubnemen gom, nimi gange blebsinmen goma nimi oboga gom ubsinmen gom?”
42006010	Wenabog di gigib wenena Alna sig nisin ag gemera deibsiog di, neigna´ nimi nenegag lebog di na: “Eindi see salebong danggulom!” Ba nimi nenege na aneso unubayog ba eildi see na egdangdobog.
42006011	Ba signa yoo selele winggisiog, ba signa Yesus ag sa´ubgob aboga yubu selelameg.
42006012	Sum nenege Yesus na doa yubu lebnun aboga mein ag winggiog di ee einimnag na Alna Eimayong ag doa yubu lemog.
42006013	Lemog bog ee gweleg-gasabayog wenena, Alna Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang Nayag yululum aboga biabsiog, di nang nene na doldogna´ nang aboga sibsiog:
42006014	Simon babe Eildi si na Petrus aboga singgayog, di Andreas Simon alga ab, Yakobus ab, Yohanes ab, Filipus ab Bartolomeus ab,
42006015	Matius ab, Tomas ab, Alfeus mamne Yakobus ab, Simon aga Zelot nimi alameldongne ab,
42006016	Yakobus mamne Yudas ab, Yudas Iskariot Al eimig mal widnibanebne ab websiog.
42006017	Sig anege nimi ab nason yunggieg di Alna sogo saba´ ag seglamog: ba Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ab, Yudea sogo yog ad yog ad nimi dina´ ab Yerusalem asag nimi babe, weigmag laut abomag Tirus ab Sidon ab nimi babe neiga´ ag longolameg.
42006018	Signa Eildi yubu gegbayeb di sigdi neigna´ babe wesibsulul aboga yayeg; bog sigdi gange meili gange nang wa´indub nimi babe wesibsiog.
42006019	Anda nimi nisin di yaga´ Al nong beboggob aboga yoyablameg, anese migib deiya´ Eildi nong ag langgindoga Eildi nimi dina´ wesilimsiog.
42006020	Wera Yesus na Eildi dirigoga´ bana´ nang ag gemera lebog di na: “A´un see gom nimi na, ngingyang ulamlulum, anese Eimayong damag na, a´unda´ anda.
42006021	A´un wene gwaneng yo ulamlom nimi na, a´unna ngingyang ulamlulum, yogsum na mon og ubsulula´ anda. A´un wene engena´ geira´ ulamlom nimi na, a´un na ngingyang ulamlulum, yogsum og sobluluma´ anda.
42006022	Nimi na Sogo Nimi di Me se aboga a´un ag erigal ulamsiyig wenena, a´unna ngingyang ulamlulum, anda signa a´un ag gebsiyig di, a´un ag meili lebsiyig di, yog meilinge aboga a´undi si lobogsugonga´.
42006023	Sum nenege na a´unna ngingyang uboga eii dolamlulum, anese a´undi degna´ na weiga´ eim asag od; anese neigsonge babe na a´unisang yabo di nabi nang nisin ag gigib unulamsiyig.
42006024	Bog a´un see yag nimi lei a´unna ongei arob, anese a´undi gange iga´ dibsina´ na a´undi damnang di iga´ dibsina´ dorob.
42006025	A´un wene mon og ulamlom nimi na, a´unna ongei arob ulamlulum, anese a´unna yogsum gwaneng yo ulamsulula´. Bog a´un wene og solamlom nimi na ongei arob ulamlulum, anese yogsum a´unna ingmun gweseboga engelamluluma´ anda.
42006026	A´un nimi nisin di meiblamsiang nimi, a´unna ongei arob ulamlulum; anese siglisang yabo di babe mednena´ yubu omoladsin nabi nang ag babe neigne umsiyega´ anda.”
42006027	“Bog a´un Nayag gegelamlom nimi ag, Nana lebnun: A´undi malborob nimi ag wana´ ubsululum, di a´un ag goroglamsiyig nimi ag besarobne ulimsululum;
42006028	A´un wemdabsugong nimi ag na beisilisina´ molbululum; di a´un ag meili derelamsugong nimi se na doa yubu lebsululum.
42006029	Nimi dogne di eindi abom dara bonggagale wenena abom dara babe dodlom, nimi dogne di eindi bagsum dogne doble wenena, on nong bagsum babe doblul aboga ising deibloublom.
42006030	A´un ag molbesiyig nimi ag na dodsululum; a´undinge dorob nimi ag na on moloboga donggom.
42006031	Anda yog nimi di aneso ubseng aboga eindi seinilimlamne nenegaga eindi babe sig se neigne unubulom.
42006032	Anda anna an ag wana´ seinilimgeyang nimi se og wana´ seinilimsulom wenege na anse degna´ na sa´aso degna´ degenmen do? Anese meili una´ nimi di babe sig ag wana´ ulamsiang nimi ag na wana´ seinilimsiang.
42006033	Anese a´un ag besarob ulamsiang nimi ag a´undi babe besarobne ulamsilom wenena, a´undi degna´ na sa´aso degna´ degsinmen do? Meili una´ nimi di babe aneso neigne unulamang.
42006034	Wera a´unna yoga´ dogne se-se nimi ag dodsulom wenena, eildi yoga´ dogne dodnulula´ arobne di dodlom wenena, eindi degna´ na sa´aso degna´ dobnemen do? Meili una´ nimi di babe meili una´ nimi ag se-se doladlamsildong, signa sigdinge urubub neigne dobgoba´ aboga.
42006035	Bog a´unna a´un ag malborob nimi ag wana´ ulamsululum di sig ag besarobne unulimsululum di degna´ yogsum degnulul arobne di se-se doladsinggom, anda eindi degna´ na weiga´ doblem di Eimayong Yaga´ Weig Bebnagne di me dangguloma´, anese Alna na´e anggom nimi ag babe meili nimi ag babe Besarobne.
42006036	A´undi Ayong na weradona´ gange di ulamsil songe neigne a´un babe weradona´ gange di ulimsululum.”
42006037	“A´unna nimi ag sunulamsululum gom wenena, a´un ag babe sumbusulul goma´. A´un babe iginne sigag deilimsululum gom wenena, a´un babe iginne deibsulul goma´; lubibsululum wenena a´un babe lubibsulula´.
42006038	Yog nimi ag dodsululum wenena a´un ag babe dodsugonga´: A´undi besa sumbamlulum sununa´ ag sumboga, wareboga yegoga langgalamlulne babe na a´un ag dodsulula´. Anese a´undi sumbugob aboga sumbamlulum sununa´ nenege ag sumboga a´un ag sumbusulula´.”
42006039	Yesus na on yog sununa´ yubu dogne babe na sigag lebog di na: “Ising urubne dogne di ising urubne dogne bomengga balamso de? Sig besene na lomag malyunggisereng goma´ de?
42006040	Donne dogne na omoladsina´ ne bisiboga al aga bebnag ulameldo gom, bog don nimi nenege na omoladsina´ yubu nenege gigib dobna wenegaga omoladsina´ne ab neigdigum ulamla.
42006041	Anna sa´se angga di ising ag gal sembengga´ gemelamlam, bog Eindi ising ag gal gareroba´ eibdangdob gom dog?
42006042	Anna sa´ura angga ag lemlam di na: Na´e lei eindi ising ag gal sembengga´ dobgunun alamlam, bog eindi ising ag gal gareroba´ eiyamlam gomdog? Gegeng gom nimi lei, gal gareroba´ eindi ising ag anege damen doblem di, anggabo di gal sembengga´ ising ag ora´ anege besa eiya doblambusulom.”
42006043	“Anese besarob gal dogne di meili galdo moulameldo gom, di on meili gal dogne di besarob galdo moulameldo gom.
42006044	Anese gal nisin anege na eildi do di aga eel ulameldong. Anese nimi na malmeila´ seleng gan-gan ag ab gal ara do dogne daglameldong gom, anda seleng gal di aga na anggur do daglameldong gom.
42006045	Besarob nimi wenena besarobne dollanalameldong besarob gange di bog meili nimi na meilinge aga dollanalameldong eildi meili una´ne di. Anese eildi bam ag uboga lemlange na gange ag uboga langgalamla.”
42006046	“A´unna sa´ase Nayag, Ayong Weigne, Ayong Weigne alamnelom dog, Neri lemna yubu ag unulamlom gom do?
42006047	Nimi na Nayag yalamig di Neri yubu gegboga unulamgong nimi nisin na – Nana a´un ag lag lebnun alna edne ab neigdigum sumbanmen,
42006048	Alna ee solamog nimi dogne ab neigso: Nimi nenege na yaga´ yana´ logoga ee diga´ na girig eilib deiya solamog. Ba mag wemboga´ eilba yalamog di ee nenegag siglibayog wenege na, ee nenege na warebanmen gom ubog, anese ee nenege na gigib gad muboga somog ba.
42006049	Bog nimi na Neri yubu gegban dog unulameldong gom nimi na, nimi dogne ee diga´ deilina´ gom gom sogo eilib solameldo nimi songe neigne. Anda mag wemboga eilba yanggayog di ee nenege na sigliboga gugog di yaga´ goboga meili urubog songe.”
42007001	Yesus na nimi dina´ a´osing ag yubu gigib leradagonggayog wenena, Alna Kapernaum asag wa´iyog.
42007002	Anege ag na yin yagne di ouragna´ne dogne od anda, alna eildi a´osing agne. Ouragna´ nimi nenege na neigna´ gad neiglamog di somagdobnemena´ ulamog.
42007003	Wenege yin yagne benege na Yesus se yubu gegbayog di Yahudi weignang edbareso nimi Alag molona´se bogibsiog, ba Al ya´indoga eildi ouragna´ nimi nenege wesiblul aboga.
42007004	Ba signa Yesus ag yayeg di wenena Alag yaga´ molbayeg, di lebeg di na: “Alna Eindi aga sunum arobanmen,
42007005	alna nundi sogo nimi nisin se wana´ ulamsil di, nundi yubu dona´ ee babe eildi solamsilne.”
42007006	Ba Yesus na sig ab nason isiboga bieg. Alna yin yagne di ee beram yanggayog wenege na yin yagne benege di algabo ag Alag lelbululum aboga ouragibsiog di na: “Ayong Weigne lei, iginso unggom, anese Ayong na neri ee ag dobgenmen gom;
42007007	Anese nana An ag yanggana´ na sunum gom sembibno di yano gom. Bog yubu dognog leblem wenena neri ouragna´ne na egdangdoblula´.
42007008	Anese nana damagne, anda na damag na yin yagnang dara babe od. Anda yin yagnang danege dogne ag neri: Bulom! absene wenena: Alna bisoa´, anda on nimi dogne ag lebsene di: Yulom! Absene wenena, alna yasoa´, goma neri ouragna´ nimi ag: Ane weblom! Absene wenena alna websoa´.”
42007009	Yesus na lebog yubu nenege gigib gegbayog wenena, alse budna´ abog di Al eimig yalameg nimi nisin ag gemesomboga Eildi lebog dina: “Nana a´un ag lebnun, Israel nimi nisin ag na aneso weig odseig seinilina´ nimi dogne Nana eilimneldo gom!”
42007010	Anda sig bogdebamsiog nang nenege gigib ee ag yayeg wenena, ouragna´ nimi nenege na gigib egdanggamoga´ ag gemera yayeg. Nain Asag Ab Goubini Me Dogne Yesus Di Gamyag Bugibog Yubu
42007011	Gigib wenena Yesus na ad dogne si na Nain asag biog. Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang ab nason bieg, bog nimi dina´ babe longgoga Al ab nason balameg.
42007012	Alna ad nenege lega´ isigin beram gigib biog wenena, somagamog nimi nenege na gal golaya´ oboga bolanggieg, me nenege na nengmabo yandome dognoga´ eilin na geiriya´ gel, anda ad nenege nimi dina´ ab geiriya´ gel genegab isiboga bolanggieg.
42007013	Ba Ayong Weigne na geiriya´ gel genege eibog di, wana´ gange di Eildi gange ag ebegayog, ba Eildi genege ag lebog di na: “Engeng gom!”
42007014	Wenarobog Alna gal golaya´ omega´ beram bina, se salbonggibog, ba sig gal golaya´ gyabameg nang na boseglomeg, ba Eildi lebog di na: “Goubininge lei, Nana an ag lemna bugoglom!”
42007015	Ba nimi nenege na gamyag bugogog di bugoga alna yubu lemog, ba Yesus di menege eilin ag doboga dorog.
42007016	Nimi nisin na log ubeg di signa Eimayong bebnag deilimeg, di lemeg di na: “Weig nabinge dogne nun gan-gan ag lag dangalyal”, anda “Eimayong na Eildi nimi gigib arolyesil.” Alameg.
42007017	Wera Yesus se yubu na Yudea sogo nisin ab sogo dara-dara nisin ab ag wegel wareglameg.
42007018	Yogne-yogne nisin unulamogne nenege na Yohanes na eildi dirigoga´ bana´ nang ag uboga dobog di wenege na,
42007019	alna nimi besene sig gan-gan ag uboga biabsiog di Ayong Weigne ag isilburugong aboga bogibsiog di na: “Eimig yulul arob nimi nenege na An goma on yog nimi yulula´se dira ulamgob gom?” abla abdurum.
42007020	Ba sig besene na Yesus ag gigib yareg di wenege na, sigdi lebdeg di na: “Yohanes mag dolongsina´ ne di An ag yubu isibagunoma´ se aboga bogdebelyeisil: Anda eimig yulul arob nimi nenege na An goma on yog nimi yulula´se dira ulamgob gom?” sereg.
42007021	Sum nenege Yesus na nimi dina´ yog-yog neigna´ nimi ab igin-iginne ab meili gange nang wa´indub nimi ab wesilimsiog, di ising urub nimi dina´ babe Eildi ising eilina´ doladlamsiog.
42007022	Anda sigag Yesus di yubu degna´ na: “Balamdurum, di a´undi ising gemelamdomne ab oo gegbaromne ab na Yohanes ag lera bururum di na: Ising urub nimi na ising eilimang, yan inga´ dangdob nimi na yan sirig yabalamang, meibu susu nimi besaroba´ egeldalamang, oson nimi na gegelamang, somagdob nimi na gamyag buldoglamang, di Besarob Yubu seegom nimi ag omoladlamsiang.
42007023	Anda Na se loldognena´ gom nimi na besarob ngingyang ulamlul.”
42007024	Gigib ba Yohanes di bogdebamsiog nang abenege gigib bireg wenena, Yesus na Yohanes se yubu nimi nisin danege ag lemog di na: “A´unna sa´ase bubsa´ ag bulum do? Om di wid bogweneglamla´ anege se gemelbineb de?
42007025	Goma a´unna sa´ase bulum do? Gemerob wina´ bagsum ongorob nimi nenege gemelbineb de? Gemerob bagsum ongorob nimi ab besa urubub dobnemen gomob ulamang nimi ab di ouling na as borobne di asag ulamang.
42007026	Bog a´unna sa´ase gemelbalamlom do? Nabinge gemena´se de? Nana a´un ag lebnun, alna nabi anda meneng wansog.
42007027	Anese alse yubu na mome dorob di na: Gedlom, Nana Neri weboga bogdob nimi dogne bogdebel yununa´ An aro bog al damen, alna Anse bisig An a´osing ag gednelamlula´.
42007028	Nana a´un ag lebnun: Gelabo di mangarob nang nisin gan-gan ag ab na Yohanes dognog yaga´ bebnag weigne ulamla, bog Eimayong damagne mogne aga weig alna damagso ulamla.”
42007029	Nimi nisin na Eildi lemog yubu gegelameg, wase oboga molon nang babe signa Eimayong di sirigne odseig seinilimeg, anese signa Yohanes di mag dobonggibsulul aboga gigib dowaddanggdob nimi.
42007030	Bog sig Farisi nimi ab Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ gerem nang ab na sigag Eimayong di sembirubne na lobogameg, anese signa Yohanes di mag dolongsina´ yo gom se.
42007031	Yesus di lebog di na: “Sa´aso sununa´ aga Nana wene wilman ulamang nimi ag sununa´ ane sumbunun do? Anda signa sa ´a aga ab neigso do?
42007032	Sigse sununa´ na aneso mogmabo di pasar ag bina bulameldong di bialdalameldong mabo so nimi: ‘Nunna a´unse mob di lilim lemab, bog a´unna sunugna´ gom, nunna nimi salag ag sebna mos seblamab, bog a´unna engena´ gom.’
42007033	Anese Yohanes mag dolongsinne yayog wenena, alna gwaneng roti ab anggur mag ab dena´ gom ba, a´un dibna: ‘Alna meili gange nang wa´indubne alamlum.’
42007034	Gigib ba Sogo Nimi di Me yayog di Alna gwaneng ab mag ab delamog, ba a´undi lemlum di na: ‘Gedsu, Alna gogoga denne serem sebnange, wase moloboga donnang ab meili una´ nimi ab sigga alamlum.’
42007035	Bog dolamang nimi nisin na gerem deiya´ di sirigne dangilimsil.”
42007036	Farisinge dogne di Yesus ag gwaneng nason eildi ee ag dugob aboga biabog. Ba Yesus na Farisinge di ee ag yayog di bugoga gwaneng delameg.
42007037	Ad nenegag na meili una´ gel aga nimi nisin di eel gel dogne ulamog. Wenege genege na gegbayog ba Yesus na Farisinge di ee ag gwaneng delamla arob yubu gegbayog di, alna song besarob unmag ma´i degneroba´ dogne dora bobog di yayog.
42007038	Di alna engerobog Yesus weilagsig Eildi yan beram segelbiog, di Eildi yan ag na eildi engesuma´ di legoga eilda´ osong di gebog, di gigib wenena Eildi yan ag nos abog di song besarob un mag nenege di ligog.
42007039	Wenege Farisinge aga Yesus ab gwaneng nason dugob aboga biamogne benege na ununa´ nenege eibog wenena, eildi gange lomag lebog di na: “Al ane na nabinge wenena, Alna eela´, Alag salbonggibla gel gene na edne sa´aso gel aboga na; Alna od eel, gel gene na meili una´ gel.”
42007040	Wera Yesus di alag lebog di na: “Simon lei, Nana an ag yubu dogne lebnun aboga ubna.” Ba Simon di yubu degna´ na: “Omoladsina´ne lei, od leblom.”
42007041	Yesus di lebog di na: “Nimi besene di nimi dogne ag wase debloroba´ od. Nimi dogne di na girig wase lima ratus so deblorob bog nimi dogne di na girig wase 50 so deblorob.
42007042	Anese sig besene na girig wase nenege sunum degnemen gom, ba alna sig besene di deblorobne nenege lubibsiog. Sig gan-gan ag anege ab yaga´ weig wana´ uboga´ na edne aga do?”
42007043	Simon di yubu degna´ na: “Neri sembia na al yaga´ weiga´ deblorobne aga.” Yesus di alag lebog dina: “Odseig eindi sembiblamne nene na.”
42007044	Di genege ag gemerobog, Eildi Simon ag lebog di na: “Anna gelabo ane eiblam de? Nana eindi ee ag wa´in bog, anna Nayag Neri yan legna´ mag dogne dodnelam gom, bog alna eildi engesuma´ di Neri yan ag legnel di eildi osong di gebnel.
42007045	Anna Nayag nos abnelam gom, bog alna Na wa´na´ ag danegab dagibnang gom-gom Neri yan ag nos abnel.
42007046	Anna Neri ousa´ ag minyak mag lignelam gom bog alna Neri yan ag besarob song un minyak mag di lignel.
42007047	Anese Nana an ag lebnun: Eildi meilinge nisin na gigib lubdub, anese alna wana´ gange dina´log ubla´se. Bog nimi dogne wana´ gange moga´ ublul wenena, eildi meilinge babe moga´ og lubiblula´.”
42007048	Wenaboga genegag Eildi lebog di na: “Eindi meilinge na gigib lubdubgel.”
42007049	Anda sig Al ab nason bugoga dena´ delameg nimi na sigdi gange lomag og sembibeg di na: “Alna edne, ba nimi di meilinge na Eildi lubilimsil do?”
42007050	Bog Yesus di genegag lebog di na: “Eindi odseig seinilina´ di gigib blebdangdoblam, anda besaroba´ baldomlom!”
42008001	Nenege nisin gigib unuboga wenena, Yesus na weig as nisin ag babe mog as nisin ag babe Eimayong damag una´se Besarob Yubu ombadda yabalamsiog. Al ab Eildi dirigoga bana´ nang oo bare ab nason,
42008002	anda edbare gelabo na meili gange nang wa´indub ba wesiamsiog gelabo ab goma yog neigna´ weisiamsiog nimi ab, Maria aga Magdalena alameldong gel aga meili gange nang segbare doblambiamog gel ab,
42008003	Herodes di wase bonne Khuza algel Yohana ab, Susana ab yog gelabo dina´ ab. Gelabo dane nisin na sigdi damnang seyagne di balameg nimi arolamsieg.
42008004	Wenege nimi dina´ longgoga yalameg, nimi danege na weig asag nimi aga Yesus ag isiboga yalameg, ba Alna sununa´ yubu nene neblamog di na:
