49004030	A´unna Eimayong di Geid Gange ag ongei arob ununa´ unggom, blebsina´ se sum nenege yanggale wenege se gednebne gedneb ubsiog.
49004031	Signe nisin ab, gorogna´ne ab, lesinne ab, oldana´ ab, sya´aldabaldana´ ab na a´un gan-gan ag uboga boreblulum, yoonge nisin babe na neigne.
49004032	Bog a´unna a´un moumun besarob ubdanggoga, yaga´ wana´ deibdanggoga, a´un moumun lubildalamlulum, Eimayong di Kristus bisig a´un ag ura lubibsiog songe.
49005001	Anese a´unna Eimayong ag dagoma unun nimi danggululum, Eildi wana´ mabo songe ulamlulum.
49005002	Wana´ una´ lomag ulamlulum, Kristus Yesus di gigib a´un wana´ sembibsiog, di Alna nunse doaddanggayog, gibna´ se oboga doladna´ne ab Eimayong se besarob song dana´ ab dabog.
49005003	Bog yolsagaldana´ ab sodnerob ununa´ nisin ab goma neringe og danggaso seinilina´ ab na a´un gan-gan ag ab na lebnemen gom, nene na geis legdob nimi di sunum ununa´ gom.
49005004	Neigne babe sugurub yubu ab, garen seila´ yubu goma obbil arob gomso yubu, nisin na sunum gom, bog samboga na na´e ana´ yubu og lemlulum.
49005005	Anese nene nisin na besa sembiblulum: Yolsagaldan nimi ab sugurub nimi goma neringe og danggaso seinilina´ nimi ab ane yubu nong na sunuruba´ gibna´so una´, anda Kristus ab Eimayong ab damag una´ ag se dobgong goma´.
49005006	A´unna nimi di garen dibab yubu lena´ bisig yamnegoga deibsiyigag, aneso yubu nisin ununa´ bisig na gegeng gom nimi nisin ag Eimayong di gorogna´ doldogolyalamsildo.
49005007	Anese a´unna sig ab nason neiga´ ag dirigoga unggom.
49005008	Damen a´unna gunu ulamlum, bog wene na Ayong Weigne lomag di diman ulamlom, anese diman mabo ulamlulum.
49005009	Anese diman di do na besarobne ab sunum urububne ab sirigne ab moulamla.
49005010	Anda Ayong Weigne di ngingyang ublul arobne aga sumbululum.
49005011	Gunu di ununa´ do dogne mubla arob gomne na ununggom, bog samboga ununa´ nene nisin na dobgegleboga nong lag deiblulum.
49005012	Anese sigdi yubu lemangne babe geleleng aroba´ ag unulamangne babe na eili bongoldana´ ulamla.
49005013	Bog yogne-yogne nisin diman di lag dangalimla ba eilimang, di yogne nisin lag eilimangne nenege na diman di.
49005014	Anese aboga lerob di na: “An malamlamne lei, bugoglom, somagdob nimi gan-gan ag uboga bugoglem, ba Kristus di diman an ag waralamgulula´.”
49005015	Anese, a´undi una´ na sa´aso ulamgob aboga besa sembiblulum, wou nimi di ununa´ songe unggom, bog gerem nimi di ununa´ songe ulamlulum.
49005016	Garen umlom wenaga besa unulamlulum, anese wene salag na meili salag ulamla´ anda.
49005017	Anese aboga a´unna loba´so unggom, bog a´unna Ayong Weigne di yo seinirubne eel ubgob aboga yoyablamlulum.
49005018	A´unna anggur mag di seremso unggom, anggur mag di na gange busu di yonge wenggalameldo, bog a´unna Gange di degneboga ulamlulum,
49005019	anda alga ag-alga ag yubu leldoglulum wenena gibna´ mos ab, meiboga gibna mos ab Weig yubu mos ab di seblamlulum. A´undi gange nong nisin di Ayong Weigne se mos seboga eii dolamlulum,
49005020	yogne-yogne nisin se nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus si ag uboga al Eimayong nun Ayong ag sob-sob na´e alamgob.
49005021	Kristus ag log sembia alga damag-alga damag ulamlulum.
49005022	A´un gelabo lei, Ayong Weigne damag ulamlom songe, a´undi nengabo damag ulamlulum.
49005023	Anese gelabo di ousa´ na sigdi nengabo, neigsonge Kristus na Jemaat nisin di ousa´ne, Eildi aga nong bleblamsil.
49005024	Anese jemaat na Kristus damag ulamla songe, gelabo di nengabo ag yogne-yogne nisin babe neig songe unulamlul.
49005025	A´un nengabo lei, a´undi gelabo ag wana´ ulamsululum Kristus di babe jemaat wana´ sembibog di Al na gigib jemaat se doaddanggayog.
49005026	Al geis legnun aboga wenena, Al damen Eimayong yubu di mag legdob.
49005027	Aneso uboga jemaat na Al beram dora deibsiog meili una´ gom-gom diman ag ulamlul aboga, goma gugsuna´ gom-gom goma nene a´osing songe gom-gom ulamlul aboga, bog alna geis legdoba´ meili urub goma´ ulamlul.
49005028	Neigne babe na nengabo di eildi nong wana´ uldalamla songe eildi gel ag babe wana´ ulamlul: Nimi na eildi gel ag wana´ ulamla wenena aldamneng se wana´ uldalamla.
49005029	Anese nimi dogne eildi nong se na yoo deildalameldo gom, bog alna gembara besa weldalameldo, Kristus di jemaat ag ulamsildo songe,
49005030	Anese nun nisin na Eildi nong ulamab.
49005031	Anese aboga nengabo na aleyong ab eilin ab loboga eildi gel ab nong dognog ulameldong, di sig besene na sob dognog danggalameldong.
49005032	Gelelenga dognorobne nene na weiga´, bog neri lebnange nong na Kristus ab jemaat ab dirigoga una´ se.
49005033	Sa´asonge babe na a´un nisin eleb-eleb ag ulamlange na: Eindi nong wana´ uldalamlam songe eindi gel ag babe wana´ ulamlom, gelabo babe na eildi nengabo ag log ulamlul.
49006001	Mog mabo lei, a´un na Ayong Weigne lomag uboga a´unin a´uneyong yabo ag dagomalamlulum, anese sirig una´ na ane.
49006002	A´uneyong a´unin yabo ag giblamsululum, nene na damen garerob yubu ab leiblourubne dogne na:
49006003	a´unna besa ulamlulum di a´undi una´ salag sogo ag ane weya´ ulamlulum aboga.
49006004	A´un ayong yabo lei, a´undi mabo di gange ag yoo nenesing gom, bog Ayong Weigne di Damen Wenena´ Yubu di wemboga omoladlamsululum.
49006005	A´un arona´ nimi lei, a´un sogo ag ane salerob nimi ag log gange di dagom alamlulum, besa doumdigum gange di, a´undi Kristus ag ura dagom alamlom songe,
49006006	Sig a´osing ag sigdi gange ngingyang ubgong arobob wenege se og ununggom, bog na Kristus di ouragna´ nimi gange nong nisin di Eimayong di yonge aga unulamlulum,
49006007	Anda yog wana´ se welamang songe, nimi na Ayong Weigne se wee welamang nimi se gom.
49006008	A´unna eel, nimi eleb-eleb na ouragna´ nimi babe, lobdob nimi babe, alna yogne-yogne besa unulamle wenena, alna Ayong Weigne di degna´ urubub doblula´.
49006009	Anda a´un salesin nimi babe sigag aneso unulamlulum di lesina´ na loboglulum. Sembiblulum, sigdi Ayong Weigne babe a´undi Ayong Weigne babe eimasag ulamla di Alna nimi a´osing ag miblamsil gom.
49006010	Unura na a´unna Ayong Weigne lomag migib umlulum di, Eildi borob migib lomag ulamlulum.
49006011	Mal oldana´se Eimayong di gadne nisin eneggogobululum, ba Iblis di gesen sonda´ yubu leldogsila´ ag na gad segoga dolbalag nembugob aboga;
49006012	Anese nundi yoyablamabne na nundi nong ab eneng ab di oldana´se gom, bog bo ulamsiangne nisin ab, salerobne nisin ab, gunu sogo ag ane salbamlange nisin ab, eimag meili gange nang nisin ab ag dolbalag nenesina´se.
49006013	Anese aboga mal oldana´se Eimayong di gadne nisin doblulum, ba a´unna meili sum nenege oldoululum wenena gad seglamgob aboga, a´unna gigib unura daglulum di wenena.
49006014	Wera gedneboga segamlulum di, saba´ wegena´ na sirigne aga wegebululum di seng na sunum urububne aga onggululum,
49006015	A´undi yan ag na glagdob una´ onggoga isiboga mon angarob una´ di Besarob Yubu omoladsina´se;
49006016	Yogne-yogne dangalyanggala´ lomag na odseig seinilina´ gadne onggolulum, anese a´undi odseig seinilina´ gadne di meili gangenge di ugdo so mal nisin sabluluma´.
49006017	Anda blebeldana´se ousa´ gouluna´ gadne ab Gange di mal yoonge ab doblulum, nenege na Eimayong di yubu.
49006018	Doa yubu nisin ab molona´ nisin ab di, sob-sob sum Gange bisig doa yubu lemlulum wenena a´undi doa yubu lomag na webdanggoga geis legdob nimi nisin se molona´ babe na daglouling gom,
49006019	Nase babe, ba neri bam si guboga, sirig lena´ yubu glagia dodneyogne, Besarob Yubu geleleng aroba´ anege bosa´ goma´ omoladlamsunun aboga,
49006020	Nana dolongsina´ lomag dobonggiruba´ ag ab doldogna´ nimi songe arolamsin. Doa yubu lemnululum ba neri lebnun seinirub yubu nenege na nana bosa´ goma´ lag deilimnun.
49006021	A´un babe eel ublulum nayag ulamneyangne ab neri ulamnange ab na, nungga Tikhikus nundi wana´ne Ayong Weigne di wee yeng gange di welamlange di, a´un nisin ag ombadsile ba eel ublulum.
49006022	Yubu nenese aga alna neri a´un ag bulom abna, anege na nayag ulamangne ab neri ulamnange ab eel ubsulul aboga anda a´undi gange eildi iga´ diblamsulul aboga.
49006023	Isiboga mon angarob una´ ab wana´ gange ab odseig seinilina´ ab na Ayong Eimayong ag uboga ab Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab na a´un ab nason ulamluluma´.
49006024	Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di glagia doladsina´ na Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ag wana´ ulamang nimi ag ulamsulula´ derong arobneb gom wana´ nenege na.
50001001	Paulus ab Timotius ab Kristus Yesus di ouragna´ nang di, a´un geis legdob nimi nisin Filipi asag Kristus Yesus lomag ulamlom nimi ab, bo mengesin nimi ab, arosin nimi ab ag na.
50001002	Nundi Ayong Eimayong ab Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab di glagia doladsina´ ab, isiboga mon angarob gange una´ ab na a´un ag ulamsulula´.
50001003	Nana a´unse sob-sob sum seinilimsin di, Eimayong ag na´e alamna.
50001004	Nana sob-sob sum a´un nisin se doa yubu lemsin, di nana ngingyang eisa´ doa yubu sob-sob lemna.
50001005	Anese a´unna Eimayong di Besarob Yubu omoladsina´ lomag ab dirigoga oumunggun sum murub uboga wene ulamloma´ se.
50001006	Yubu nene na nana yaga´ sirig seinilimna, nenege na, besarob wee nene na a´un gan-gan ag ab Eildi elniruba´ anda werabalamle di Kristus Yesus di sum nenege ab goggob daglula´.
50001007	Odseig nana a´un nisin se urubub aneso sembibsunun, anese a´unna neri gange ag ulamloma´ se, anese a´un nisin babe na nayag dodneog glagia doladsina´ dolamloma´ se, nenege na nana dolongsina´ lomag dobonggibneang sum ab goma ghag aldogna sum nenege ab Eimayong di Besarob Yubu lena´ se migib deilimna sum ab gom.
50001008	Anese Eimayong na neri lag lenne anda nana a´unse yo ulamnel Kristus Yesus di wana´ nenege di.
50001009	Neri doa yubu na ane, sirigne eel una´ ab yog-yog seinilina´ nisin lomag ab di a´undi wana´ nenege na on ma´alamlul,
50001010	di a´unna besarobne aga weblulum, di a´unna Kristus di sum nenege na geis legdoba´ sodnerob goma´ ulamgob aboga,
50001011	Do sirigne Yesus Kristus di welamlange nenegaga sumboga moulamlulum Eimayong gibna´ ab bebnag deilina´ ab se.
50001012	Neri yonge na na´abo a´un eel ublulum aboga, anda nayag dangalyalamnelne nene na Besarob Yubu gigib weiga´ weglamla´ di,
50001013	wera Borob nimi di wee asag nimi nisin babe yog nimi babe nana Kristus se aboga dolongsina´ lomag dobonggiruba´ na gigib eel.
50001014	Anda nunggabo dara dina´ na Ayong Weigne bisig ab odseig seinilina´ gigib dolamang, na dolongsina´ lomag dolongnena´ di, Eimayong di yubu se na log gom-gom bosa´ goma´ leboga omoladlamsiang.
50001015	Anda nimi dara Kristus se omoladlamsiangne na gorogna´ ab delegeldana´ ab di, bog dara nimi na Alse besarob seinilina´ di omoladlamsiang.
50001016	Nimi dane na Kristus se yubu na wana´ gange di omoladlamsiang, anese signa eel ulamang di na nana Besarob Yubu ag ghag ana´se ane ulamna,
50001017	bog yog nimi dara na sigdi bebnagne se sunum gom ununa´ ulamang, aneso ura ulamangne di nana dolongsina´ lomag iginne deilimneang.
50001018	Bogna od meili, anese sa´a songe babe na Kristus se yubu omoladlamsineba´, besarob doumdigum una´ di babe sonda´ so una´ di babe. Ununa´ nenese nana ngingyang ulamnel. Anda nana sob-sob ngingyang ulamnuna´,
50001019	Anese nana eela´ anda, nene nisin goggobdagna´ na a´undi doa yubu ab Yesus Kristus Gange ab di na aroboga blebnena´ se.
50001020	Anese neri yo ulamna di nebom alamnange na ane ba nana yogne-yogne nisin lomag ab na eili ubnulul gom bog nisin na gedneloroba´ ulamlul aboga, neigsonge na wene babe, Kristus na neri nong lomag uboga bebnag deilimna, od na gamyag ulamna´ ag babe somagdobnuna´ ag babe.
50001021	Anese na nong gamyag ulamna´ na Kristus se anda somagdobnun wenena mubdub.
50001022	Bog nana sogo ag ane ulamna wenena, do bebnagne se welamna. Anda nana nesa aga webnun, nana wangan.
50001023	Nana sisa´ besene di glilamnerang: nana bisene di Kristus ab nason ulamsenem yo ulamna, anda nene na yaga´ besarob nong sirig;
50001024	bog nana a´unse aboga sogo ag ane ulamna wenena besarob.
50001025	Anda ununa´ nene nana odseig aboga eel ulamna: nana ulamne di a´un ab nason ulameb ba a´unna a´undi odseig weiga´ nolamle di ngingyang ulamlulum aboga,
50001026	A´undi nase Kristus Yesus lomag ngingyang eisa´ na weiga´ ma´alamlul, nana a´un ag on yanggane wenege na.
50001027	Wene weiga´ na ane, Kristus di Besarob Yubu ag sumboga ulamlulum, ba na yanggane wenege eibsunun aboga, bog na yane gom wenege na gegbunun aboga, anda a´unna dognog gange di gad seglamlulum, dognog seinilina´ ab di Besarob Yubu omoladsina´ di odseig seinilina´ dangalamsilne ag yaga´ yoyablamlulum,
50001028	a´un ag malborob nimi di babe gwarebom arobob na ubsugong goma´. Sigse gednebne nisin na derong arobnebne, bog a´unse gednebne na blebsina´ se, anda nene na Eimayong ag uboga yalamla.
50001029	Anese a´un ag glagia dodsiogne na Kristus ag odseig seinilina´ se og gom, bogna Alse igin-iginne babe dobgong aboga,
50001030	damen neri yaga´ unulamsi ba nayag eiblum songe, wene babe a´unna nase yubu gegelamlom.
50002001	Wera anese Kristus di nong lomag na wenena´ ab, wana´ gange di iga´ dibsina´ ab, Gange ab dognog isiboga una´ ab, wana´ dirigdangdob una´ ab wana´ usina´ ab ulamla,
50002002	anese ngingyang gange di nene sunum danggibnululum: a´unna dognog gange dognog seinilina´ ab dognog wana´ ab, dognog gange ab, dognog unubugog arobne ab ulamlulum,
50002003	a´undi weig senge goma gilaboga meibna´ senge og enggom. Bog samboga wenena damag gange di yog nimi se damen bebnag sembiblulum a´undam nimi se damen gom;
50002004	nimi eleb-eleb a´undam nimi di bebnagne senge damen bebegnang gom mem, bog yog nimi di bebnagne senge babe.
50002005	A´undi gamyag una´ isiboga na Kristus Yesus di seinilina´ songe seinilimlulum,
50002006	al nong na Eimayong ab neignong bog, Eildi sembia nana Eimayong nong aboga salbayog gom,
50002007	bog Alna nisin louya ouragna´ nimi songe danggayog di, Alna nimi sirig songe danggayog.
50002008	Alna sogo nimi songe danggayog di sogo ag lambonggia dagom alamog murub somagdobog, anda nenege na glabna gal ag somagdobog.
50002009	Anese aboga Alna Eimayong di yaga´ bebnag deibog di, yog-yog si nisin se Alag dognog si bebnag dorog,
50002010	Anda yogne-yogne eimag odne nisin ab, sogo agne nisin ab, sogo damagsigne nisin ab di, Yesus di si og gosam oglumugung gibgong aboga.
50002011	Nimi nisin di lag lemig di na: “Yesus Kristus na Ayong Weigne”, Ayong Eimayong se bebnagne! Alamgonga´.
50002012	Na´abo neri wana´ seinilimsin nimi lei, a´unna sob-sob dagom alamlulum; anese a´undi blebsina´ se soba´ welamlulum bed-bed aboga log eisa´, na od wenege songe se og gom, bog na odgom wene babe,
50002013	anese Eimayong di og a´un bisig welamla yonge babe wee babe Eildi yonge ag lebda welamsil.
50002014	Yogne-yogne unulamlulum wenena, ongei arob gange ab byabaldana´ ab di unulamlulum gom,
50002015	Ba a´unna meilinge ab sugurub una´ ab gom nimi aboga, Eimayong di mabo meili una´ gom nimi ab di, gange gegdob nimi ab, deng-deng arob nimi ab gan-gan ag ulamlulum di, a´unna sig gan-gan ag sogo ag gura´ meleg waralamla songe ulamlulum,
50002016	Eimayong di gamyag yubu besa salbamlulum, ba Kristus di sum nenege nana bebnag bugnun aboga, anda neri sunulamnange ab, ingmun gweselamnange ab na gilaboga ulamna goma´ anda.
50002017	A´undi odseig seinilina´ yubu dona´se neri nong oboga eneng yegnugonga´ anda, nana ngingyang ulamna di a´un ab nason ngingyang ulamna.
50002018	Anda a´un babe ngingyang ulamlulum di neig so na nayab babe ngingyang ulamgob.
50002019	Bog Yesus bisig uboga Timotius a´un ag berera doldogolyunun aboga nebom alamna, ba a´unse lerob yubu nenege di neri gange daglenggibnun aboga.
50002020	Anese nimi dognog babe nayab dognog gange dognog seinilina´ nimi dogne odgom, a´un ag yaga´ besa gembonggibsulul arob nimi na.
50002021	Anese nimi nisin na sigdi weigne se og elamang di, Kristus Yesus di weig una´ elamang gom.
50002022	Eildi yeng una´ na gigib sunurub, ba a´unna gigib eel anda alna Besarob Yubu omoladsina´ se nayag arolamnel eildi me di aleyong ag arolameldo songe.
50002023	Nana al aga berera doldogolyununa´ aboga nebom alamna, anda sa´a songe neri unubunun bisig na gigib lag ulamla;
50002024	bog nana Ayong Weigne bisig uboga sirig seinilimna, di a´un ag berera gemelyusunun aboga ulamna.
50002025	Od se-se a´un ag Epafroditus doldogolyunun seinilimna, anege na alna na´e nayab wee nason welamnamne di nayab nason yoyablamnamne, neri yonge aronena´ se a´undi weboga doldogolyulumne.
50002026	Alna a´un nisin se yaga´ yo ulamsil di eildi gange babe ingmun ulamla, anese a´unna al neigna´ se yubu nenege gegbaloma´ se.
50002027	Odseig nong alna neigna´ di somagna´ beram ubo, bog Eimayong na alag wana´ ubo, anda alse og gom, bog nase babe, ba ongei arob gange on ma´alamsulul gom aboga.
50002028	Anese aboga alna berera doldogol yununa´, ba a´unna al eiblulum wenena a´unna ngingyang ubsile ba neri ongei arobne babe moga´ danggulul aboga.
50002029	Alna Ayong Weigne bisig ngingyang gange di doblulum di also nimi na giblulum.
50002030	Anese alna Kristus di wee se aboga somaganmen so ubog di eildi gange gamyaga´ na neri wee aronena´ se aboga a´undi moga ´ gomne ag sunum ulina´ se deibog.
50003001	Na´abo a´unna Ayong Weigne lomag ngingyang ulamlulum. Yubu nene nana a´un ag mome dobna´ na igin gom di a´un ag sunum urububne dodsin.
50003002	Gam a´osing ag na gen eisa´ ulamlulum, meili wee welamang nimi a´osing ab babe weldalamlulum, sonda´ bog garena´ nimi a´osing ag babe na gen eisa´ ulamlulum.
50003003	Anese nun aga na bog garerob nimi, Eimayong Gange di giblamab nimi, di Kristus Yesus lomag bebnag ulamab di nimi di lag ununa´ ag odseig sembibab gom.
50003004	Nimi di lag ununa´ ag odseig seinilina´ wenena na babe unubasena´ nong na od. Yog nimi na nimi di lag ununa´ se odseig seiniliseng wenena, nana on meneng wansog:
50003005	Nana lin sum ag na bog garebaneyeg, nana Israelne, sisa´ na Benyamin nang, Ibrani as sobne, Damen Wenena´ Yubu ag lebda wene nana Farisi nang ulamsi.
50003006	Neri unulamsinge na jemaat olamsisi, sirigne na nana Damen Wenena´ Yubu ag dagom alamsi wenena nana meili una´ gomne ulamsi.
50003007	Bog neri damen mubdob ulamsinge nenege na wene Kristus se wenena gilaboga seinilimna.
50003008	Nana Kristus Yesus Ayong Weigne nisin se bebnagne eel uldogna di wenena, yogne-yogne danege nisin na gilaboga seinilimna. Alse aboga nana yogne-yogne nisin na soua´ lulunga´ songe sembia lobogsi, di nana Kristus dobnun aboga,
50003009	anda Al lomag ulamna´ na Damen Wenena´ Yubu ag dagom ana´ se neri sirigne di gom, bog Kristus ag odseig seinilina´ di sirigne ulamna, sirigne nenege odseig seinilina´ bisig Eimayong di uboga.
50003010	Neri yo ulamnange na Al ab Eildi gamyag buldogna´ migib ab Eildi igin-iginne lomag isiboga dona´ ab besa eel una´, anda Eildi ura somagdobog songe na babe somagdobnuna´.
50003011	Ba goggobdagna´ na babe somagdob nimi gan-gan ag uboga gamyag buldogna´ dobnun aboga.
50003012	Nana ununa´ nene gigib dobna goma sunum urubub danggal abna gom, bog nana anam dobda balamna, anda nana dobne wenena salbununa´, anese na Kristus Yesus di gigib ura salbaneog songe.
50003013	Na´abo lei, neri sembia na degna´ dona´ anege na gigib dobna sembiamna gom, bog neri unubununne na nene aga: neri damen weilagsigne na ibogne di sa´asonge na a´osing agne aga a´osing ag deiya balamnun,
50003014	anda nana degna´ nong dobnun aboga dobneba´ ag bologa balamna, nenege na Kristus Yesus lomag uboga Eimayong di eimasag biasina´ ag.
50003015	Anese nun sunum urubub nimi na aneso sembibgob. Bog a´un gan-gan ag nimi dogne di yog seinilina´ od wenena, yog sum Eimayong di a´un ag lag danggiblula´.
50003016	Bog od seleb nundi eel una´ ag lebda dangalbiyabne ag sumboga nundi bugob arob bisig nenegag balamgob.
50003017	Na´abo lei, a´unna neri unulamna songe unubululum, di sigag babe besa gedlulum, nundi a´unse sununa´ dangguyub so ulamang nimi ag.
50003018	Anese nana sob-sob a´un ag lemna songe, anda wene nana engena´ geira´ a´un ag babe lag lemna, nimi dina´ na Kristus di glabna gal ag malborob ulamang.
50003019	Aneso nimi na goggobdagna´ sum na gom urubgonga´, sigdi ayong weigne na sigdi aso, sigdi bebnagne na eilinge ulamang, sigdi seinilina´ na sogo agne og seinilimang.
50003020	Bog nundi dibab ad na eim asag, anda enigi ab na nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus Blebsinne se dira ulamab,
50003021	anda nundi nong meilinge nene na sambesile ba Eildi bebnag nong songe danggugoba´, Eildi migib di og yogne-yogne nisin Al damag deiblula´.
50004001	Anese aboga, neri wana´ ulamsin di yo ulamsin nimi lei, neri ngingyang ab, neri Mahkota ab anda a´un na Ayong Weigne lomag migib seglamluluma´, na´abo neri wana´ ulamsin nimi.
50004002	Nana Euodia ab, Sintikhe ab se Ayong Weigne bisig dognog gange seinilina´ ulamdurum aboga wembesin.
50004003	An Sunsugos ag babe molbagen, na´e yengne, sig gelabo ag babe arolamsulom. Anese sig na nayab nason Besarob Yubu omoladsina´ ag yo yablamaba´ anda, Klemens ab na´abo wee nason isiboga welamab nimi nisin ab di si na gigib gamyag buku ag mome doroba´ anda.
50004004	Ayong Weigne lomag a´un na sob-sob ngingyang ulamlulum, on dogne ab lebnun: Ngingyang Ulamlulum!
50004005	A´undi besarob una´ gange na nimi nisin di eel ubsiyigag anda, Ayong Weigne na yanggana´ beram ulamla.
50004006	A´un na yogne-yogne nisin se babe gange gweseboga seiniling gom, bog a´undi yonge nisin na doa yubu ab di Eimayong ag giboga lag mololamlulum,
50004007	Ba Eimayong di isiboga mon angarob gange nimi di eel dangganmen gomne nenege na, a´undi gange ab seinilina´ ab na Kristus Yesus di welamsil.
50004008	Wera, na´abo lei, goggobdagna´ na sirigne nisin ab, bebnagne nisin ab, sunumne nisin ab, geisne nisin ab, so songe nisin ab, gegena´ mag besarobne nisin ab, gibna´ senge na isiboga wenena besarob ununa´ anda ane songe nisin besa sembiblulum.
50004009	Sa´a songe a´undi nayag gembara gigib doblumne ab, gegbulumne ab eiblumne ab, nene nisin unulamlulum. Ba Eimayong isiboga mon angarob gange deiya´ne di a´un ag wera ulamsulula´.
50004010	Nana Ayong Weigne lomag yaga´ ngingyang ulamna, anese wene goggobdagna´ a´undi nayag seinilina´ ab una´ ab di on nolamla. Od-seig a´un na, soba´ nayag seilimnelom bog, a´un na garen sum od gom.
50004011	Neri aneso lemnange nenena, na gom se lemna gom. Alna neri gigib eel ubsi di od nisin sum se neri seyagne sunum una´ dorob.
50004012	Sa´a songe na damnang moga´ gom, weiga´ gom ulamna´ na nana eel. Yog-yog yubu ab yog-yog ununa´ ab nayag geleleng arob ununa´ dogne od gom, gwaneng monog goma gwaneng yo gom, damnang weiga´ goma moga´ gom anda babe.
50004013	Nayag Eildi dodneog migib nenege lomag uboga yog-yog ununa´ bolamna.
50004014	Bog a´undi unulamlomne babe besarob, a´un na neri igin-iginne ag babe gigib dolamlom.
50004015	A´un babe eel, Filipi nimi lei; Besarob Yubu eilniboga ombadsisi sum nenege na Makedonia uboga bisi, wenege na dognog jemaat di babe nayag doladnena´ ab dona´ babe od gom, bog a´undi og arolamnulum.
50004016	Anese Tesalonika uboga aga na aronena´ se li salag dogne besene doldogolyunulum.
50004017	Bog neri a´osing agne na doladsina´ anege gom, bog do a´un se weiga´ mubdoub ulamlula´ anegaga.
50004018	Wene yonge nisin na a´un ag uboga, bog on yaga´ weiga´ sirig dolamna. Neri damnang seyag weiga´ ulamla´ na a´undi Epafroditus ag deiblum, ba dobsinge nenege di yogne song besarobne deilina´ ab, oboga doladna´ ngingyangne ab na Eimayong ngingyang ulamlange.
50004019	Neri Eimayong di a´undi yonge nisin na Eildi seyagne ab bebnagne ab di Kristus Yesus lomag uboga urubub sunum ulimsulula´.
50004020	Nundi Ayong Eimayong na unum-unum se bebnag ulamla´. Amin.
50004021	Neri gibsina´ babe geis legdob nimi ab Kristus Yesus lomag gibsululum. Na´abo nayab nason ulamab nimi di a´un ag gibsiang.
50004022	Geis legdob nimi nisin di babe a´un ag gibsiang, sig Kaisar di eelom nimi nong di babe gibsiang.
50004023	Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di glagia doladsina´ na a´undi gange bo ulamsulula´.
51001001	Nana Paulus, Yesus Kristus di doldogna´ne ulamlul aboga, Eimayong sembibogne nenege di deibneogne ab, nungga Timotius ab di,
51001002	Na´abo a´un geis legdob nimi ab Kolose asag ab Kristus lomag odseig seinilimlom nimi ab ag. Nundi Ayong Eimayong di glagia doladsina´ ab isiboga mon angarob una´ ab na a´un ag ulamsulula´.
51001003	Nunna sob-sob sum Ayong Eimayong ab Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab ag na´e alamab, di nunna sob-sob a´unse doa yubu lemsiab,
51001004	Anese nunna a´undi Kristus Yesus ag odseig seinilina´ nenege ab a´undi geis legdob nimi nisin ag wana´ ulamsiloma´ ab na gigib gegbayob,
51001005	Anese aboga a´unse nebom arobne na eimasag gedneboga deirub. Nebom arobne nenege se yubu na a´unna damen danegab gigib gegbulum sirig yubu lomag ab, nenege na Besarob Yubu,
51001006	anda a´un ag gigib yayog. Besarob Yubu nenege na do muboga yog sogo yog sogo nisin ag weglamla, neigsonge babe na a´un gan-gan ag a´un gegbulum wilman wenegab uboga anda Eimayong glagia doladsina´ nenege sirig eel ulamlom.
51001007	Nene nisin na a´unna Epafras ag uboga eel ublum, nundi wana´ne nungga wee neigdigum welamabne di, a´unse na Kristus ag besa dagoma wenne.
51001008	Eildi babe na a´undi wana´ nenege na Eimayong Gange di nunag gigib lag deibog.
51001009	Anese nunna gegbuyub sum nenege ab uboga, nunna a´unse doa yubu dagloubnang gom-gom lemsiab. Nundi mololamabne na, a´unna gerem deiya´ nisin dobig di eel una´ sirigne eel ubgong aboga, anda Ayong Weigne di yonge ag sunum urubub eel dangana´se.
51001010	Ba a´unna Al a´osing ag sunum nimi ulamlulum di yogne-yogne na Alag ngingyang ublul arobne ag uboga, anda a´undi wee besa welamlomne nenege nisin di do moulamlulum di Eimayong se besa sirig eel una´ lomag wablamlulum,
51001011	anda Eildi bebnag migib di on migib dangilimlulum di yogne-yogne nisin ngingyang gange di lambonggia dolamlulum,
51001012	anda al Ayong ag na´e aboga giblamlulum, Eildi diman borobne damag ab geis legdob nimi di dobnebne Ayong di gedneboga deibsiogne nenege dobneba´.
51001013	Nunna gunu migib lomag uboga Eildi lobibsiog di Eildi wana´ Me di Borobne damag deilbisiog;
51001014	Al lomag uboga nunna lubsina´ dorob, nenege na meilinge lubibsiog.
51001015	Alna Eimayong eiling gomne di sunuruba´, yogne-yogne nisin ubogne ag na a´osing agne yandonge ulamla,
51001016	anese Al lomag uboga yogne-yogne nisin eimag odne babe sogo ag odne babe ubog, eilimabne babe eilimab gomne babe, borob nimi babe weigbuna´ ag burub nimi babe, salerob nimi babe bosin nimi babe, yogne-yogne nisin Eildi Al se og ubsiog.
51001017	Yogne-yogne nisin aro bog Al damen ulamog, di yogne-yogne nisin babe Al lomag bo ulamla.
51001018	Alna nong di ousa´, nenege na jemaat. Alna yandonge, somagdob nimi gan-gan ag uboga oumunggun gamyag bugogog, di Alna yogne-yogne nisin se a´osing agne ulamla.
51001019	Anese Eimayong di sembia urubne nisin na Eildi nong ag degneboga ulamla,
51001020	anda Al bisig uboga Eildi yogne-yogne nisin Al nong di isibsiog, eimag ulamlange babe, sogo ag ulamlange babe, Kristus di glabna gal ag ab Eildi eneng di gigib isibsiog.
51001021	Damen a´unna Eimayong ag na mog ulamlum di a´undi gange seinilina´ na Alag malborob ulamlum, nenege na gedneb lag a´undi ununa´ meili di,
51001022	Wene Eildi isibsiog, Kristus Eildi nong di somagna´ uboga, a´unna Al a´osing ag geis legdob di sodneboga meili urub goma´ ulamgong aboga deibsiog.
51001023	Anese a´unna odseig seinilina´ di yabdaboga, warebom ana´ gom-gom gad seglamlulum, anda Besarob Yubu ag nebom arobne lobogebag aboga, anda a´unna gigib gegbulum di eim lomon as lomon nisin lerayabalamang, anda na Paulus ane na gigib eildi wee wena´ne danggisi.
51001024	Wene nana a´unse igin-iginne dolamna ab ngingyang ulamna, anda neri nong ag dara moga´ne na Kristus di Eildi nong se igin-iginne dobogne ag sunum danggulul aboga, nenege na jemaat.
51001025	Eimayong di nayag dodneog wee nana jemaat nene se wee wenne danggisi, Eildi yubu urubub a´un ag omoladsina´ se,
51001026	anda nenege na gelelenga dognoroba´ walbu esengbu nimi ublig-lig ububalamog, bog wene na Eildi geis legdob nimi nisin ag lag dangalamla.
51001027	Eimayong na sigag omoladlamsil, yaga´ seyagne ab bebnagne ab geleleng aroba´ aga Yahudi gom nimi gan-gan ag ab, nenege na: Kristus na a´un lomag ulamla, anda nebom ana´ bebnagne!
51001028	Nunna Alse aga omoladlamsiab, nimi eleb-eleb nunna wembesiyib di gerem deiya´ nisin di ombadsugob wenena, nimi eleb-eleb Kristus lomag sunum urububne ag bobesina´ se.
51001029	Nene aga na Eildi migib ag dirigoga neri unubasene aboga yoyablamna, neri nong lomag wee migiba´ welamlange di.
51002001	Anese neri yonge na a´un eel ublulum aboga, a´unse neri yoyablamnange nenege na yaga´ igin log, anda a´un ab, sig Laodikia nimi ab, nimi nisin ab sig nanong eel ulamneang gom nimi ab se,
51002002	sigdi gange iga´ dibsili di signa dognog wana´ lomag ulamgong aboga, ba signa seyagne nisin ab sirig seinilina´ eel una´ ab, Eimayong di geleleng arobne eel una´ ab dobgonga´, nenege na Kristus,
51002003	anese gerem deiya´ nisin ab eel una´ nisin ab na Eildi nong lomag dognoroba´ ulamla.
51002004	Nana yubu nene lebnun, a´unna nimi di besarob-besarob yubu leiya sonda´ lebsugong gom aboga.
51002005	Anese nanong na a´un gan-gan ulamab gomag ab, bog neri gange na a´un ab nason ulamab, di a´unna Kristus lomag odseig seinilina´ di gad seglamloma´ ab, a´unna urubub ulamloma´ ab, eibna wenena nana ngingyang ulamnel.
51002006	A´unna nundi Ayong Weigne Kristus Yesus gigib doblum songe, neigne na unum-unum Eildi nong lomag ulamlulum.
51002007	Wera a´unna Eildi nong lomag yareng doara Al eilib solamlulum, a´unna a´unag gigib ombaddobne ag odseig seinilina´ di on dogne ab ma´aboga gad seglamlulum, ba a´undi gange ag na na´e ana´ on dogne ab ma´alamsulul.
51002008	Gen eisa´ umlulum, nimi di garen nebna´ yubu ab, sonda´ se mangaroba´ deiya´ lebna´ yubu omoladsina´ ab, sogo ag gange nisin ab di gange goubsiyigag aboga, bog nene na Kristus ag uboga gom.
51002009	Anese Eildi nong lomag na Eimayong di unne nisin degneboga ulamla,
51002010	anda a´unna Eildi nong lomag gigib degnebsiog. Al aga na salerob nimi ab bosin nimi ab di Ousa´ne ulamla.
51002011	Al lomag uboga a´unna gigib bog garerob, bog garerobne nenege na nimi se di urubne gom, bog Kristus di bog gadbesiogne, nenege na meilinge ag nong loldogna´ bisig uboga,
51002012	anese a´unna Al ab nason dolongsina´ lomag wanggisiog, anda a´un babe Al lomag uboga bugibsiog, Eimayong di migib di welamlange ag odseig seinilina´ bisig uboga, somagdob nimi ag uboga Al babe gigib gamyag bugibog.
51002013	A´un babe damen mednena´ ununa´ di gigib somagdoba´ ulamlum, di gange di bog garena´ babe garerob goma´ ulamlum, ba Eimayong di Al ab nason gamyag bugibsiog, nundi mednena´ne nisin gigib lubibsiog di,
51002014	mome debloroba´ anege na gigib lubibsiog, garerob yubu ag dirigoga wenena nunna iginne dobnemen bog. Anda Eildi glabna gal ag ab oboga gom ubog.
51002015	Salerob nimi nisin ab bosin nimi nisin ab Eildi sogag danggibsiog, di signa Al bebnag dangaldogog di signa nimi nisin di ngalagalwa´na´ danggibsiog.
51002016	Anese a´unna gwaneng mag dena´ se goma, weigsum se goma, wal wenogne eneldogna´se goma, besen sum se gom nimi na a´un ag iginne deibsugong aboga deillobnang gom;
51002017	nene nisin na eimig yanebne se eimange, sirig nongne na Kristus.
51002018	A´unna eimnang ag giblamang nimi di sigdi meini sogag lambonggia a´undi bebnag dangdobne ag gomolubgong arob una´ uldoggonga´ anda, sigdi seigda´ib eirubne ab gedneb-gednebne ab aga sogo ag gange seinilina´ di weiga´ danggia uldogigne ag na a´unna ising deillobnang gom,
51002019	wera alna Ousa´ne ag muboga gad salbamla goma´ di, nong nisin asa uboga, mel-mel ab gongal ab ma´aboga goubna´ wenena nong dognog dangalamla, ba Eimayong di wabnange ag lebda wablamla.
51002020	A´unna Kristus ab nason isiboga gigib somagdoblum, di sogo ag gange ag na lobdob, bog sa´ase a´unna od aro sogo ag ane ulamna´ songe ununa´se garerob yubu damag ulamlom do?
51002021	nenege na “Saleng gom, delyamong gom, beldognang gom!” arobne,
51002022	nene nisin na doboga unulamna´ anda on gom urubneb damnang aga, anda nimi di og leboga ombaddob yubu.
51002023	Ununa´se garerob yubu nene na, od gemena´ na gerem aboga, sigdi og gibna´ memelamang, sogo ag lamaroba´ nenedanggoga, sig dam nimi obdanggoga, bog alna sogo ag ane nong di yonge aa arobne obbil arob gomne aga unulamang.
51003001	Anese aboga, a´unna Kristus ab nason bugibsiog wenena, bebnag ununa´ elamlulum, Kristus asa Eimayong di sirig see agsig bulamla´ ag anege.
51003002	Bebnag ununa´ se sembiblulum, sogo ag ununa´ se gom.
51003003	Anese a´unna gigib somagdoblum, ba a´undi gamyag una´ na Kristus ab nason isiboga Eimayong di nong lomag dognibsiog.
51003004	Wera Kristus na nundi gamyag una´ ulamla wenena, yogsum lag danggale ba a´un babe yogsum Al ab nason isiboga bebnagne lomag lag danggululuma´.
51003005	Anese a´undi nong ag yogne-yogne nisin sogo agne na somagiblulum, nenege na yolsagaldana´ ab, sugurub una´ ab, gange busu di yonge ab, gange yoonge ab, neira´ og danggaso arob gange babe na, sunuruba´ gibna´ ab neigne,
51003006	nene nisin na Eimayong di gorogna´ dora deilyalamang (dagom ana´ gom nimi ag).
51003007	Damen a´un babe al lomag ulamlum wenege na ununa´ nene unulamlum.
51003008	Bog wene na, a´unna nene nisin boreblulum, nenege na lesina´ ab, gorogna´ ab meili ununa´ ab, meili dolbalag nenesin yubu ab, a´undi si ag uboga meili yubu lena´ ab.
51003009	A´un moumun sonda´ yubu leldanggom, a´unna damen nimi ab damen ununa´ ab na gigib yongoloubluma´se,
51003010	a´unna gigib wenog nimi dora ongorob, ba sob-sob wenogne samolamla di Al Ubsiogne di sunuruba´ songe sirigne eel una´ dolamlom.
51003011	Ununa´ nenege di aga Yunani nimi goma Yahudi nimi gom, bog garerob nimi goma bog garerob gom nimi gom, Barbar nimi goma Skit nimi gom, ouragna´ nimi goma lobdob nimi gom eleb-eleb dogne odgom, bog yogne-yogne na Kristus nonga´ anda, Alna yogne-yogne lomag babe ulamla.
51003012	Anese aboga, Eimayong di webdob nimi nisin na geis legibsiog Eildi wana´ ulamsil, ba wana´ gange ab yongon gange ab, sogag so gange ab, mesang so gange ab, lamarob gange ab dora onggululum.
51003013	A´unna on yog nimi ag babe lamarob gange ulamlulum, di on yog nimi ag lubilimsululum, nimi dogne on yog nimi ag malboroba´ od wenena, Ayong Weigne di a´un ag gigib lubibsiog songe, a´un babe aneso unulamlulum.
51003014	Anda eini nisin na: wana´ gange aga dora onggululum, soubu gouboga dognog dangilina´ ab sunum urubub ulina´ ab una´ songe se.
51003015	Kristus di isiboga mon angarob una´ na a´undi gange ag bo ulamsulul, anese aboga a´un biabsiog dognog nong dangana´ se. Anda na´e alamlulum.
51003016	Kristus di yubu na a´undi gange ag yambia ulamsulu, ba a´unna gerem omoladsina´ nisin ab yog nimi ag Damen Wenena´ Yubu leboga mos ab, gibna´ mos ab Weig yubu mos ab seblamlulum, di a´undi gange lomag uboga Eimayong ag na´e alamlulum.
51003017	Anda a´undi yogne-yogne nisin yubu lena´ di goma ununa´ di unulamlomne nenege na, Ayong Weigne Yesus di si ag uboga nisin unulamlulum, Al bisig uboga nundi Ayong Eimayong ag na´e alamlulum.
51003018	A´un gelabo lei, a´undi nengabo ag dagom alamlulum, Ayong Weigne lomag sunum songe.
51003019	A´un nengabo lei, a´undi gelabo ag wana´ ulamsululum di alag na erigal ununa´ unggom.
51003020	A´un mogmabo lei, yogne yogne nisin na a´undi noubu nang noubu nimi ag dagom alamlulum, anese nene aga na Ayong Weigne lomag ngingyangne.
51003021	Ayong yabo lei, a´undi me ag gange ogob ulinggom, eildi gange malyunggulul arob una´ unggom aboga.
51003022	A´un ouragna´ nimi lei, a´undi ayong yabo sogo ag ane yogne-yogne salerob nimi ag dagom alamlulum, sig a´osing ag se og sigdi gange ngingyang ubgong arob una´ se og gom, bog Ayong Weigne ag log uboga doumdigum gange di unulamlulum.
51003023	A´undi sa´a songe unubululumne nenege babe na, a´undi gange nisin di Ayong Weigne ag una´ songe unubululum, nimi ag se gom.
51003024	A´unna eel, Ayong Weigne di aga na a´unse degna´ gedneboga deiruba´ dobneba´. Kristus na a´undi Ayong Weigne, ba a´unna Eildi ouragna´ nimi.
51003025	Nimi dogne mednerob una´ ulamle wenena, alna eildi mednerob una´ doblula´, anese Ayong Weigne na nimi a´osing ag mibsing gomne.
51004001	A´un salesin nimi lei, a´undi ouragna´ nimi ag na sirigne ab sunum urububne ab og unulamsululum; a´unna eel, a´unse salerobne babe eim asag od.
51004002	Na´e arob yubu leboga doa yubu og lemlulum, di webdangda ulamlulum.
51004003	Nunse babe doa yubu lemsululum, ba Eimayong na nundi omoldasina´ isigin gubsulul aboga, ba nunna Kristus se geleleng arob yubu nenege lemgob, anda anese aga nana dolongsina´ ag dobonggibneyeg.
51004004	Al unubasene arobne nenege na nana aneso uboga lag danggibnuna´.
51004005	Nimi asag nimi a´osing ag na gerem sirig ulamlulum, di garen od wenena besa unulamlulum.
51004006	Sob-sob a´undi yubu lena´ na wana´ gange di sumboga lemlulum, uwa´ soo songe, di a´unna nimi ag sa´asonge yubu degna´ lebneba´ anege eel uboga.
51004007	Neri ununa´ nisin na nungga Tikhikus di a´un ag ombadsulula´, nungga nundi wana´ne, alna ouragna´ yengne Ayong Weigne di wee nason welamabne.
51004008	Al aga neri a´un ag bogibna di yubu nong na, neri ulamnange a´un eel ublulum di a´undi gange iga´ dibsulul aboga.
51004009	Al na neri Onesimus ab nason doldogolyesin, nungga na a´un gan-gan ag ab, wana´ yeng gange ulamlange di. Ane ag yogne-yogne nisin dangalamlange na sigdi aga a´un ag ombadsurugonga´.
51004010	A´un ag Aristarkhus nayab nason dolongsina´ ag dobonggirubne di gibsil, Barnabas mamne Markus ab di, (alse lerob yubu na a´unna gigib doblum, anda alna a´un ag yanggale wenege na alna od doblulum).
51004011	Yesus aga len si na Yustus ab di gibsiang. Sig gan-gan ag weneli nimi abenena bog garerob di na´abo dangdob, ba Eimayong damag wa´na´se wee welamab; signa neri gange iga´ dibnen nang danggayeg.
51004012	Kristus Yesus di ouragna´ne Epafras a´un ab neignang di babe gibsil, alna a´unse doa yubu sob-sob lemsil a´unna gad seglamlulum aboga, gange wisirub nimi ulamlulum di Eimayong di yonge yogne-yogne nisin ag na sirig seinilimlulum.
51004013	Anese, nana alse lag lena´ yubu ombadsin, alna a´un ab sig Laodikia nimi ab Hierapolis nimi ab se wee gad welamla.
51004014	Nundi wana´ne Lukas wesisinne ab Demas ab di a´un ag gibsirang.
51004015	Nunggabo Laodikia nimi ag nundi gibsina´ babe ombadsululum, Nimfa ab eildi ee ag jemaat nimi ag babe.
51004016	Anda mome doroba´ ane a´un gan-gan ag gigib eildibululum di wenena, jemaat Laodikia nimi babe yaga´ eildilbugong, ba Laodikia nimi se dorob mome babe a´un eildibululum.
51004017	Anda Arkhipus ag babe leblulum di na: “Besa gembonggiblom, Ayong Weigne ag uboga eindi doblum wee nenege na sumboga besa welamlom.”
51004018	Nana Paulus di gibildogsin. Gibsina´ mome nene na neri see nong di dobna. Nayag soubu goubduba´ babe sembiblulum. Glagia doladsina´ nenege na a´un ag ulamsulula´.
52001001	Nun Paulus ab, Silwanus ab Timotius ab di. Jemaat Tesalonika nimi ag Ayong Eimayong ab Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab di, glagia doladsina´ ab isiboga mon angarob una´ ab na a´un ag bo ulamsulula´.
52001002	Nunna a´un nisin se al Eimayong ag sob sob na´e alamab di a´undi si siboga doa yubu lemsiab.
52001003	Anese nunna sob-sob seinilimsiab a´undi odseig seinilina´ di welamlom wee ab, a´undi wana´ usina´ yoyablamlomne ab nundi Ayong Eimayong a´osing ag Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ag neboma gad seglamloma´ se.
52001004	Anda nunna eel, na´abo Eimayong di wana´ sembirub nimi lei, a´unna gigib Eildi websiog.
52001005	Anese nundi Besarob Yubu a´un ag ombadsuyubne na yubu di og lebub gom, bog Geid Gange migib ab di warebanmen gomne sunumne aga ombadsuyub. Odseig a´unna eel, a´unse aboga nundi a´un gan-gan ag welamubne nenege na.
52001006	A´unna nun ab Ayong Weigne ab di una´ dagom ana´ nimi danggulum; gwaregna´ igin-iginne yaga´ dina´ log bog yubu nenege na gigib ngingyang gange di doblum Geid Gange di wena´ bisig,
52001007	ba a´unna Makedonia asag nimi ab Akhaya asag nimi ab odseig seinilina´ nimi nisin se sununa´ danggulum.
52001008	Anese Ayong Weigne di yubu na gigib Makedonia asag ab Akhaya asag ab lera weglamla, bog mogsogo nisin ag a´undi Eimayong ag odseig seinilina´ lera weglamang, ba ununa´ nenese na nundi yogob na lebnemen gom.
52001009	Anese nunse yubu na nimi nisin di neblamang, a´undi nun dobsulumne ab sunuruba´ gibna´ ag loboga Eimayong sirig gamyagne ag se welamloma´ na.
52001010	Di Eildi Me eimasag uboga yanggana´ se dira ulamlom, Al somagdob nimi gan-gan ag uboga gamyag bugibogne, nenege na Yesus, eimig yaneb yoo selele ag uboga blebsululne.
52002001	Na´abo lei odseig a´un nong di babe eel, a´un gan-gan ag nun youyuba´ na gilaboga gom.
52002002	Bog odseig nun arobog a´un eel ublum songe, Filipi asag ab nun oboga meili ubsiegne nenege na, bog nundi Eimayong di arosina´ bisig na nunna bosa´ goma´ Eimayong di Besarob Yubu a´un ag omoladlamsiab iginne lomag bog yoyaboga.
52002003	Nundi a´un ag wenesina´ na mednena´ne di goma meili seinilina´ ab di gom, di sonda´ yubu mimboga lena´ ab di gom.
52002004	Ba samboga na Eimayong di nunna sigdi od unubanmen aboga Besarob Yubu nun ag dodsiog, anese aboga nundi yubu lemab, nimi ngingyang ubgong aboga gom, Eimayong nundi gange isilamsilne ngingyang una´ se.
52002005	Aneso nunna bam di og besaroba´ lemab gom – yubu nenege na nun eel uboga – a´undinge loboga dolamsugob aboga geleleng arob seinilina´ di gom, Eimayong na lag lenne –
52002006	Babe nunna nimi di meibsina´ yubu se elamab gom, od a´undi babe yog nimi di babe na, nunna Kristus di lerabana´ nang na aneso ubnemen bog.
52002007	Bog nunna a´un gan-gan ag namena´ ulamub, gel dogne di eildi me se besa memboga welamla songe.
52002008	Nun babe aneso ulamab, di a´un ag wana´ nonggela´ ulamsiab, Eimayong di Besarob Yubu a´un ag bogsina´ se og gom, bog nundi gamyag babe a´unse ulamab, anese nunna a´unse wana´ ulamsiab di.
52002009	Anese na´abo lei, a´unna od seinilimloma´, nundi ingmun gweseboga oga´ wei dolamabne nenege na. Nunna sob sob sinag gwelegnag welamab, ba a´un gan-gan ag nimi dogne iginne danggulul gom aboga, di nunna Eimayong di Besarob Yubu a´un ag omoladlamsiab.
52002010	A´unna lag len nimi, Eimayong babe na neigne, a´un odseig seinilina´ nimi gan-gan ag besarob gange nimi ab, sunum urubub nimi ab sodnerob gom nimi ab ulamab.
52002011	A’unna eel, nundi a´un ag aleyong di almamne ag ulameldo songe ulamaba´ na, nimi eleb-eleb a´un ag wemboga a´undi gange migib ulimsiab.
52002012	Anda yaga´ molbesiab, a´unna Eimayong di yonge ag sumboga gamyag ulamlulum aboga, a´unna Eildi bebnagne ab Borobne damag una´ ab ag gigib biabsiog.
52002013	Anda anese aboga nunna gareloubnang gom-gom al Eimayong ag na´e alamab, anese nunna Eimayong di yubu ombadsuyub ba a´unna gigib doblum, nimi di lerob yubu songe gom, bog odseig Eimayong di yubu aga na ane songe, anda a´un odseig seinilina´ nimi lomag welamlange.
52002014	Anese na´abo a´unna, Eimayong di jemaat Yudea nimi ag sununa´ nimi danggulum, Yesus Kristus lomag jemaat, anese a´un babe a´undi asag nimi di igin-iginne ulamsiang, Yahudi nimi di sigag iginne ura ulimsiyig songe.
52002015	Anda Ayong Weigne Yesus ab nabi nang nisin ab na Yahudi nimi di obsieg, di nun babe olamsiyig. Signa Eimayong di yonge ag na gegeng goma´ so uboga nimi nisin ag malborob ulameg,
52002016	anese signa nundi yog ad nimi blebsina´ se weig yubu omoladsina´ na lilib-lilib eilimsildong. Signa ane songe una´ di meilinge dina´ ma´alamla´ anda isiboga weiga´ danggale wenena sigag Eimayong di gorogna´ na weiga ubnubulamsil.
52002017	Bog na´abo, nunna a´un ag uboga eleb-eleb uldogub sum nenege na, ising di gemena´ na mog, bog gange di na mog gom, yaga´ weiga´ sirig yo ulamsil, ba a´un gemelyusugob aboga yoyablamab.
52002018	Anese nunna a´un ag yugob sembirub, nana Paulus od li dognogne ab dogne ab yasene, bog nunna Iblis di garelamsil.
52002019	Anese edne aga nundi nebom arobne ab, nundi ngingyangne ab nundi mahkota Ayong Weigne Yesus a´osing ag bebnag deildana´ ab na Al yanggale sum nenege na, a´un gom de?
52002020	Odseig a´un aga na nundi bebnagne ab nundi ngingyangne ab ulamlom.
52003001	Nunna lignibonggibnemen gom ulamsil ba, nundi gigib gareboga nun og Atena ulamnom aboga.
52003002	Di nungga Timotius Kristus di Besarob Yubu omoladsina´ne Eimayong se nun ab welamabne bogdebelyayab, a´undi gange migib danggia a´undi odseig seinilina´ se wenelamsulul aboga,
52003003	ba ingmun-ingmunne nene di a´undi odseig seinilina´ warerem ablag aboga. A´unna eel, nunna anese gedneboga websiog.
52003004	Anese nunna a´un ab nason ulamub sum nenege na, iginne dobgoba´ aboga nunna gigib a´un ag lemub. Anda ununa´ nenege na, gigib danggayo ba a´un eel ublom songe.
52003005	Aneso se nana on lignibonggibnemen gom, ba al gigib bogdebelyan, ba a´undi odseig seinilina´ se yubu eel ubnun aboga, anese nana gadgeira´ ulamnel uragsinne di uraglamsili ba nundi yoyablamabne na gilaboga danggalag aboga.
52003006	Bog wene Timotius na a´un ag uboga, nun ag a´undi odseig seinilina´ ab se ngingyang gange yubu beyayo, di a´unna nun senge besarobne ulamlom di nun ab ebbisidaseb aboga ulamlom, nun babe a´un ab ebbisidaseb aboga ulamab songe,
52003007	na´abo lei, wera nun babe yog-yog ingmunne ab igin-iginne ab lomag ulamab bog a´un ab a´undi odseig seinilina´ ab di iga´ diblamsilom.
52003008	A’un aga na Ayong Weigne lomag gad seglamlulum wenena, wene on nunna gamyag ulamab.
52003009	Anese a´unse aga nundi ngingyangne nisin Eimayong a´osing ag dobubne na, sa´so gibna´ aga nundi Eimayong ag deibnemen do?
52003010	Sinag gwelegnag nunna sirig doa yubu og lera ulamab, di nunna a´osing ebbisidanggugob aboga, a´undi odseig seinilina´ moga´ne ma´ana ´ se.
52003011	Al nundi Ayong Eimayong ab, nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus ab di, nunse bisig a´un ag yanggana´ se memburugong aboga.
52003012	Anda Ayong Weigne di yog nimi ab wana´ uldana´ se, a´un ag dognab dognab ma´abonggia doladlamsulul, nundi a´unse wana´ ulamsiab songe, a´un babe yog nimi ab wana´ uldalamlulum.
52003013	Eildi a´undi gange migib ulimsil, a´unna Ayong Eimayong a´osing ag sodnerob goma´ geis legdob ulamgong aboga, Eildi geis legdob nimi nisin ab nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus yanggale sum nenege na.
52004001	Na´abo lei, goggobdagna´ na, Ayong Weigne Yesus ag ab molboga wembesiab: a´unna nun ag uboga gigib gegbulum Eimayong ngingyang ublul arob una´ na. Ununa´ nene na odseig a´unna unulamlom, bog on dognab besa sirig unulamlulum.
52004002	Nundi a´un ag gigib Ayong Weigne Yesus si ag aneso ulamlulum aboga ombaddobne na a´un eel.
52004003	Anese Eimayong di yonge na ane: a´unna geid legdob ulamlulum, nenege na yolsagaldana´ ununa´ nisin na loboglulum,
52004004	a´un nengabo na a´undi gelabo eleb-eleb geid legdob una´ ab gibdub una´ ab ulamlulum,
52004005	Eimayong wangan nimi di una´ songe, gange busu di yonge ag lebda gom,
52004006	Anda aneso ununa´ nene na nimi dognog di babe alga ag mednena´ ab sonda´ ab ubsugong gom aboga. Anese Ayong Weigne na ununa´ nene nisin se degna´ degsinne, nundi a´un ag damen ab gigib gad lebub songe.
52004007	Eimayong di nun biabsioga´na sodnerob ununa´ unulamgong aboga se gom, bog geid legdobne una´ se.
52004008	Anese nimi na yubu nene loldoglamang wenena, nimi ag loldoglamang gom, bog Eimayong Eildi Gange geidne a´un ag dodsiogne ag loldoglamang.
52004009	A´unggabo ag wana´ usina´ nenege se na nunna a´un ag mome dobgob gom, anese Eimayong ag uboga wana´ nenege na a´undama´ di gigib dorob.
52004010	Ununa´ nenege na a´unggabo Makedonia nimi nisin ag odseig unulamlom. Bog na´abo lei, nunna a´un ag wembesiyeb ba, on besa dogne ab unulamlulum aboga.
52004011	A´unna besa so arob una´ di gibdub ulamgob seinilin gange di, a´undinge na a´undama´ see di memelamlulum, nundi a´un ag ura lemub songe,
52004012	Anese a´unna beiag nimi ising ag besarob ulamlulum, sig yog nimi di unibsugong aboga unggom.
52004013	Na´abo lei, a´unna sig gigib somagdob nimi se ununa´ na wou ulamlulum aboga yo ulamab gom, sig nebom ana´ gom nimi di una´ songe a´undi gange ag ongei arobne unggom aboga.
52004014	Anese nunna Yesus na gigib somagdobog di on gamyag bugogog aboga odseig seinilimab wenena, sig Yesus lomag somagdob nimi babe Eimayong di Al ab nason neiga´ ag longgibsulula´ aboga odseig seinilimab.
52004015	Nene na Ayong Weigne di yubu aga a´un ag lebgob: nun gamyag ulamab nimi na, ulameb bog Ayong Weigne yanggale wenena, somagdob nimi anam bog nun damen winggugob goma´.
52004016	Anese gednebne doladsile sum nenege na, eimnang di weigne di yubu leldogle ba Eimayong di buana´ yubu leldogle wenena, Ayong Weigne alnong eim asag uboga yonggale ba sig Kristus lomag uboga somagdob nimi damen gamyag bugoggonga´;
52004017	gigib wenena, nun gamyag nimi wene ulamab nimi ab nason doboga sig ab deb gan-gan ag Ayong Weigne di dolyusulula´. Aneso ura nunna unum-unum se Ayong Weigne ab ulamgoba´.
52004018	Aneso se a´unna yubu nene di leboga gange iga´ dibildalamlulum.
52005001	Bog na´abo lei, sum ab li ab se yubu na, a´un ag mome dobnemen gom,
52005002	anese a´unna eel sirig, Ayong Weigne yanggana´ na asoga´ don nimi songe einimnag yulula´.
52005003	Sigdi lemig di na: Besa isiboga soaroba´ – ulamab ara ulamig sabseibi signa oloboga obsulula´, me borob gel dogne di me deiya´ leglameldo songe, ba signa blebdanggugong goma´.
52005004	Bog na´abo a´unna gunu ag ulamlom goma´ se, sum nenege na asoga´ don nimi songe oloboga a´un ag yulula´,
52005005	anese a´un nisin na diman di mabo ab ugag di mabo ab anda. Nunna einimnag nimi gom goma gunu ag nimi gom.
52005006	Anese nunna yog nimi di malamang songe ulamgob gom, bog weldalameb di besa eel ulamgob.
52005007	Anese sig malamang nimi na einimnag malamang, di sig serem song mag den nimi na einimnag serem ulamang.
52005008	Bog nunna ugag nimi anda, anese nunna besa eel uboga, odseig seinilina´ ab wana´ gange ab seng onggoga, blebsina´ ab nebom arobne ab na ousa´ goluna´ onggululum.
52005009	Anese Eimayong di nun websioga´ na yoo selele deibsunun aboga gom, bog nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di blebsina´ dobneba´ se,
52005010	nunse gigib somagdobog, ba nunna webdanggoga, mana´ ag goma gamyag una´ ag gom Al ab nason ulamgob aboga.
52005011	Anese a´un moumun weneldalamlulum di migib neneldalamlulum odseig a´undi ulamlom songe.
52005012	Na´abo lei, nunna a´un ag molbesiab, ba a´unna sig a´un gan-gan ag wee migiba´ welamang di Ayong Weigne ag bobalamsiang di wenelamsiang nimi ag giblamsululum;
52005013	anda a´unna wana´ gange di sigdi wee se bebnag deilimsululum. Di sob-sob yog nimi ab isiboga ulamlulum.
52005014	Na´abo lei, nundi babe a´un ag wembesiab di na, sig besarob ulamang gom nimi ag na delagoga wembousululum, gange malyunggindub nimi ag na gange iga´ diblamsululum, sig mesang nimi ag na milbusululum, nimi nisin ag lignibonggia ulamlulum.
52005015	Besa eel ublulum di, nimi na meilinge degna´ se on meilinge degna´ degnang gom, bog sob-sob besarobne aga yoyablamlulum, a´un moumun nimi ag babe nimi nisin ag babe.
52005016	Sob-sob ngingyang ulamlulum.
52005017	Doa yubu sob sob lemlulum.
52005018	Yog-yog ununa´ nisin se, na´e alamlulum, anese Kristus Yesus lomag ab Eimayong di a´unse yonge na ane.
52005019	Geid Gange sabnang gom mem,
52005020	di eimig ubnebne se yubu na sogo ag neneng gom.
52005021	Yogne-yogne nisin sumbululum di besarobne na gad salbamlulum.
52005022	A´un ag yog-yog meilinge nisin na loboglulum.
52005023	Eimayong di isiboga mon angarob gange di a´un nisin geid leglamsulula´, gange babe, gange gamyaga´ babe a´undi nong babe sunum urubub welamsulula´, nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus yanggana´ sum nenege se meilinge gom-gom ulamgong aboga.
52005024	Al a´un biabsiogne na besa yengne, Eildi babe urubub sunum ublula´.
52005025	Na´abo lei, nunse doa yubu lemsululum.
52005026	Nundi nos aboga gibsina´ geidne na nunggabo nisin ag gibsululum.
52005027	Ayong Weigne si ag uboga nana a´un ag yaga molbesin, ba mome nene na a´unggabo nisin ag eildibululum aboga.
52005028	Nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di glagia doladsina´ na a´un ag ulamsulula´!
53001001	Paulus ab, Silwanus ab Timotius ab di. Tesalonika asag di jemaat na nundi Ayong Eimayong ab Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab lomag ulamlom nimi ag.
53001002	Nundi Ayong Eimayong ab Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab di glagia doladsina´ ab isiboga mon angarob una´ ab na a´un ag ulamsulula´.
53001003	Na´abo lei, nunna a´unse dagloubnang gom-gom Eimayong ag na´e alamab. Anda odseig al unub ulamab, anese a´undi odseig seinilina´ ab a´undi yog nimi ag wana´ usina´ ab na a´un gan-gan ag migib nolamla´ se,
53001004	ba Eimayong di jemaat nisin ag na a´unse nunna bebnag ulamab, anese a´undi lignibonggia una´ ab odseig seinilina´ ab di olamsiangne nisin ab ingmunne ab dolamloma´ se:
53001005	Eimayong di sumbusululne ag sunum urubub gednebne, di a´unna Eimayong damag una´ ag na sunum a´unda´ aboga lag dangalamla, wene a´unna borobne damag una´ ag anege igin-iginne dolamlom.
53001006	Anese sig a´un ag igin-iginne deilimsiang nimi ag na Eimayong di degna´ sunum urububne degsulula´
53001007	di a´un igin-iginne ulimsiang nimi ag na gyagnilina´ dodsulula´, nun ag babe na, Ayong Weigne Yesus eim asag uboga Alnong lag dangaldogle sum na Eildi eimnang ab Eildi migib lomag na ugbog gedman,
53001008	anda sig Eimayong wangan ulamang nimi ab nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus di Besarob Yubu ag dagom ana´ gom nimi ab se iginne degsineb.
53001009	Sig ane na unum-unum se derong arobgong aboga igin-iginne deibsulula´, Ayong Weigne ab Eildi migib bebnagne ab beram uboga mog dorebsulula´,
53001010	Al yanggale sum nenege na Eildi geis legdob nimi di bebnag deibgonga´, ba odseig seinilina´ nimi nisin di na Al dognog alamgonga´, anese lag lena´ a´un ag beyuyubne nenege na a´unna odseig sembiblum.
53001011	Anese aboga nunna a´unse doa yubu sob-sob lemab, ba a´un ag Eimayong di biabsiogne nenege sunum urubub danggulula´ aboga, ba Eildi migib na a´undi yonge sunum danggale ba besarob ununa´ ulamlulum ba a´undi odseig seinilina´ di wee nisin na sunum urubub ulamlula´,
53001012	ba nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus di si na a´un bisig uboga bebnag ulamlul ba a´unna Al lomag bebnag ulamlul, nundi Eimayong ab Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab di glagia doladsina´ ag dirigoga.
53002001	Nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus yanggana´ se yubu ab nun Al ab neiga´ ag longona´ ab se na´abo lei nunna molbesiab,
53002002	ba a´unna berera gange gadgeira´ ab ingmun ab ublulumag aboga, gange di omoladsina´ ab ombaddobne goma mome dorobne gom nundi lena´ so lemang di na, Ayong Weigne di sum na gigib yayo alamang.
53002003	Nimi di sa´a songe mednena´ ubgong aboga uldogigne ag babe na doladdalbang gom! Anese sum nenege yanggana´ aro bog na dagomana´ gomne damen yulula, meili una´ nimi gom urubnebne aga lag danggulula´,
53002004	nenege na byabnange aga aldama´ di yog-yog sirub Eimayong si ab yog giblamangne ab songe ag uboga bebnag neneldalamla. Di alna Eimayong di Ee ag bulamla di aldama´ di Eimayong aldalamla.
53002005	Nana a´un ab nason ulamub wenege ab ununa´ nene na sob-sob a´un ag lemsa´ anege na a´unna seinilina´ gom de?
53002006	Anda wene a´unna eel alna sa´a di lignilonglamla´, ba alse gedneboga deirub sum nenege aga gigib lag dangalamla.
53002007	Anese dagomana´ gomne na gigib gelelenga welamla, bog wene na lignilonglamanga´ di. Al lignilonglamla´ anege gigib lobonggible wenena,
53002008	sum nenege aga na dagomana´ gom nimi nenege lag danggulula´, bog Ayong Weigne Yesus di bam yubu busu di oblula´, di Eildi lag dangalyanggana´ di oboga gom ublula´.
53002009	Dagomana´ gom nimi yanggala´ anege na Iblis di wee, anda budnna´ ubnemen gom ununa´ ab, gedneb-gednebne ab sonda´ budna´ ningginge ab di degneboga ulamlula´.
53002010	Alna meili yog-yog sonda´ lena´ di derong arobgong arob nimi ag meili ulimsulula´, anese signa sirigne sig blebsinebne ag wana´ sembia dona´ gom se.
53002011	Anese aboga Eimayong na sig ag mednena´ne doldogolyulula´, signa sonda´ yubu ag odseig sembibgong aboga,
53002012	ba sirigne ag odseig seinilina´ gom-gom meili ununa´ ag yo ulamang nimi na iginne deibsulula´.
53002013	Aneso bogna na´abo Ayong Weigne di wana´ seinirub nimi, a´unse nunna Eimayong ag sob-sob na´e alamab, anese oumunggun eilnina´ ag danegab Eimayong di a´un websiog Gange lomag blebsine di geid danggibsunun aboga, anda sirigne ag a´undi odseig seinilimlomne nenege di.
53002014	Anese aga nundi a´un ag Besarob Yubu ombadsuyub bisig uboga Eildi a´un biabsiog, ba a´unna nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di bebnagne doblulum aboga.
53002015	Anese na´abo lei, nundi mome ag dorobne goma yubu di lerob ba a´undi doblumne nenege na, besa salbamlulum di gad seglamlulum.
53002016	Anda Alna nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ab nundi Ayong Eimayong ab Eildi glagia doladsina´ ab di nun ag wana´ sembibsiog, di iga´ dibna´ unumne ab nebom arobne ab dodsiog,
53002017	ba besarob wee ab Besarob Yubu ab di a´undi gange migib danggia iga´ diblamsil.
53003001	Na´abo lei, beilagsig na nunse doa yubu lemsululum, ba Ayong Weigne di yubu besa weglamle di bebnag ulamlul aboga, a´un gan-gan ag gigib danggayog songe,
53003002	ba nunna gwildi-gwildi ana´ nimi ab yoo nimi ab ag na lobdob ulamgob aboga, anese nimi nisin na odseig seinilina´ dorob gom.
53003003	Bog Ayong Weigne na yengne. Alna a´undi gange migib danggia yoo nimi beram na welamsulula´.
53003004	Nunna Ayong Weigne lomag uboga a´unse sirig seinilimsiab, sa´a songe nundi a´un ag lebabne na, a´unna od unubululuma´, di on yogsum babe unulamluluma´.
53003005	Wera Ayong Weigne di a´undi gange na Eimayong di wana´ ab Kristus di lignibonggia una´ ab ag bo mengelimsulula´.
53003006	Bog na´abo lei, nunna Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus si ag uboga a´un ag lebgob, a´unna nunggabo nundi lerob yubu nenege ag dagoma welamang gom nimi ab nundi ombaddob ba a´undi doblum yubu ag dirigoga unulamang gom nimi ab ag na loboglulum.
53003007	Anese a´un nong di babe eel a´unna sa´a songe nundi sununa´ ag doboga unulamlulum, anese nundi wee a´un gan-gan ag welamabne na dolbalag eisa so gom,
53003008	anda nunna nimi di gwaneng roti na seila´ yog deblobub gom, bog nunna sinag gwelegnag yoyaboga oga´ wei dolamub, ba a´un gan-gan ag ab nimi dogne igin danggalag aboga.
53003009	Nunna nenege na nunda´ gom se gom, bog anese nunna a´unse sununa´ danggayeb ba, a´unna dirigoga unulamlulum aboga.
53003010	Anese nun babe a´un gan-gan ag ulamub sum nenege na wenena´ yubu ombadsuyub: Wee wena´ yo gom nimi na gwaneng dulul gom aboga.
53003011	Nundi lebabne na nunna gegbayob ba, nimi dara na seila´ bisimbesem ana´ ulamang di wee welamang gom, bog nong obbil arob gom wee se og degdeg ulamang.
53003012	Aneso unulamang nimi ag eel danggibsiab di Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus lomag uboga wembesiab, ba signa wee besa welamig di, sig dinge nong aga doboga delamgong aboga.
53003013	Anda na´abo lei, a´unna besarob ununa´ na unuboga mesang-mesanga´ unggom.
53003014	Wera nimi na nundi lera dobab mome nene gegena´ yo gom wenena, alag gedneba´ ublulum di al ab oron buldanggom, ba alna eili danggulul aboga,
53003015	bog alna malborobne so ulinggom, bog alna nungga aboga wembululum.
53003016	Anda Alna Ayong Weigne isiboga mon angarobne, Eildi isiboga mon angarobne na a´un ag yogne yogne nisin lomag uboga sob-sob doladlamsulul. Anda Ayong Weigne na a´un nisin ag bo ulamsulula´.
53003017	Nana Paulus di gibsin, di gibsina´ ane na neri see nong di mome dobna. Neri dolamna mome nisin se gednebne na ane: neri na aneso dolamna.
53003018	Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di glagia doladsina´ na a´un ag ulamsulula´!
54001001	Nana Paulus Kristus Yesus di doldogna´ne, anda Eimayong di lerob yubu ag lebda´ nun Blebsinne Kristus Yesus ag nundi nebom alamabne nenege na diga´.
54001002	An Timotius na odseig seinilina´ bisig neri me sirig ulamlam, anda glagia doladsina´ ab, isiboga mon angarob una´ ab, weradona´ ab nundi Ayong Eimayong ab, Ayong Weigne Kristus Yesus ab na an ag ulamgulula´.
54001003	Neri yonge na anna Efesus asag ulamlom aboga, nana Makedonia asag bisi sum nenege anag lebsi di, Efesus asag ulamlem di sonda´ yubu omoladsina´nang ag wenelamsulom, ba signa yog yubu omoladlamsugong gom aboga,
54001004	goma negna´ yubu ab mangaroba´ deiya´ lelena´ yubu dagloubnang gom gom lemangne nenege sob-sob sembibgong gom aboga sigag leblom, nene nisin na byabaldana´se nolameldo anda odseig seinilina´ bisig uboga Eimayong di blebsina´ dodsiogne nenege urubub una´ na gom.
54001005	Wenena´ yubu nenege nong na ane wana´ gange na geis legdob gange wabna´, gange sirig besarobne ag uboga, odseig seinilina´ doumdigum wesne ag uboga.
54001006	Nimi dara na anesonge dogne ulamang gom di, obbil arob gom yubu ab medneboga balamang.
54001007	Sigdibna, Damen Wenena´ Yubu omoladsina´ nimi danggugob yo ulamang bog; sigdi lerob yubu goma yogne-yogne besarobne aboga lemangne na, besa eel una´ gomdog.
54001008	Nunna eel, Damen Wenena´ Yubu nenege sunum ubseng wenena, od besarob.
54001009	Damen Wenena´ Yubu nenege nun eela´ anda besarob nimi se gom; bog mednerob nimi ab, yoo gange nimi ab sodnerob nimi ab, meili una´ nimi ab, yubu dona´ gom nimi ab, sogo ag nimi ab alayong goma eilin gom osin nimi ab, nimi nisin osin nimi ab,
54001010	Yolsagna´ nimi ab, nengabo gelabo moumun doldana´ nimi ab, sonda´ nimi ab, sirig gom yubu lag len nimi ab, yogne-yogne besarob lerob yubu ag byablamangne ab,
54001011	Besarob Yubu ag diga´ dirigoga Eimayong di bebnagne ab yaga´ ngingyangne ab, nayag unubulul sembibneog songe.
54001012	Alag arona´ se aboga nayag Eildi migib dodneyoga´, anda nana nundi Ayong Weigne Kristus Yesus ag na´e alamna. Eildi sembia nana besa unne aboga wee nene dodneog.
54001013	Damen nana Alag oboga dereboga meili ulamsi bog Eildi weradona´ dodneog; anese nana odseig seinilina´ aro di nenege nisin unulamsi.
54001014	Nundi Ayong Weigne di glagia doladsina´ na nayag ma´abaneog, odseig seinilina´ ab, Kristus Yesus lomag wana´ una´ ab di.
54001015	Od sirig lerob yubu nene na odseig sembia nisin dona´ se, Kristus Yesus na meili nimi blebsunun aboga sogo ag yayog anda sig gan-gan ag nayog na meili sirigne.
54001016	Bog anese aboga nana weradona´ dobsi, di Yesus Kristus eildi lamarob gange nisin na, na meili sirigne ag ombadnun aboga; eimig Alag odseig sembibgong nimi nisin unum gamyagne dobneba´ se, nana sununa´ danggan.
54001017	Eimayong unum-unum wilman nisin se Borobne, ubmururubne, eiling gomne, Eimayong dognogne, gibdub ab bebnag ab ulamla! Amin.
54001018	Neri me Timotius wee nenena anag dodgen, ba eimig an se ubnebne se yubu ag sumboga, mal oldana´ se sununa´ yaga´ yoyablamlom,
54001019	odseig seinilina´ ab besarob doumdigum gange ab di. Nimi edbare na besarob doumdigum gange na lobogang, anda anese odseig seinilina´ gwaregna´ di.
54001020	Sig gan-gan ag anege Himeneus ab, Aleksander ab na Eimayong ag lena´ eel danggoga lobogdugong aboga Iblis ag dodsisi.
54002001	Oumunggun neri a´un ag molbesinne na, isirub doa yubu ab, molona´ doa yubu ab, na´e ana´ doa yubu ab nimi nisin se lemlulum.
54002002	Borob nimi ab bo mengesin nimi nisin ab, di nunna soarob ab angarob ab besarob gange una´ ab gibdub una´ ab ulamgob.
54002003	Nene aga na Eimayong nun Blebsinne a´osing ag yonge ab besarobne ab,
54002004	nimi nisin blebsiso ba sirigne eel dangana´ dobseng aboga yo ulamla.
54002005	Anese Eimayong dognog og ulamla, anda Al dognogne aga nimi gan Eimayong gan unne ulamla, nenege na Kristus Yesus,
54002006	nimi nisin lubsunun aboga Eildi nong doaddanggayog: nenege na gednerob sum nenege ab lag danggayog.
54002007	Lag danggayogne nenege se nana lera bana´ne ab omoladsina´ne ab deirub, neri lebnange nene na sirig, sonda´ gom – anda sirigne ab odseig seinilina´ ab di Yahudi gom nimi ag omoladsina´ne ulamna.
54002008	Aneso neri yo ulamnange na, asadigum nengabo doa yubu lebgong wenena, sigdi see geisa´ dobwanenggia leldana´ ab delegeldana´ ab gom-gom.
54002009	Neigne gelabo babe na sigdi ongona´ na sunum besarobne ab sunum urububne ab sob una´ne ab, osong na winggom, emas goma warembo goma bagsum degna´ nonggela´ne gom babe ongong gom,
54002010	bog alna eildi besarob una´ di aga ongolamlul, weig yubu don gelabo di sunum una´ songe aga.
54002011	Gelabo na yubu goma´ ulamle di lerob yubu dona´ na dagom arob gange dobso.
54002012	Nana nengabo ag gelabo di ombara bo ulamsugong aboga seleb abna gom; bog alna yubu goma´ ulamso.
54002013	Anese Adam damen ubog di, gigib ba Hawa ubog.
54002014	On babe na Adam aga na sagna´ yubu gegbayog gom, bog gelabo anegaga sagna´ yubu gegbayog di meilinge lomag malyunggiog.
54002015	Bog gelabo na me mangana´ di aga blebsulula´, anda signa odseig seinilina´ ab wana´ una´ ab geis una´ ab sunum una´ nisin ab di ulamig wenena.
54003001	Yubu nene na sirig yubu: “Nimi na jemaat bo usin wee dona´ yo wenena gemerob nong wee yo ulamla.”
54003002	Anese nimi dogne jemaat bo usinne danggulul wenena, meili una´ gomne, gel dognogne, lignibonggia unne, geremne, besarob sunumne, nimi dosina´ ngingyangne, besarob omoladsina´ne,
54003003	serem song mag denggomne, lesing gomne bog namenne, isirub unne, wase di ouragna´ unggomne,
54003004	eildi eelom nimi besa bo mengesinne, eildi mabo di babe alag giboga log ulamangne.
54003005	Alna eildi eelom nimi besa bo mengesina´ gom wenena, Eimayong di jemaat na sa´ura bo menggesinmen do?
54003006	Alna noroldana´ di wenog danggal nimi gom, ba alna dengdang ana´ danggale di Iblis di dobog iginne songe doblag aboga.
54003007	Alna eildi jemaat gom nimi di besarob alamangne, nimi di babe sunung gomne ba Iblis di weroba´ ag malyunggulul gomne.
54003008	Neigne babe na diaken nimi wenena gibdub ab, silamu gwaga´ besene gom ab, serem song mag delnonog nang gomne, nisin neringe og danggaso seiniling gomne,
54003009	bog odseig seinilina´ geleleng arobne besarob gange geid di welamla nimi.
54003010	Sig ag babe damen isibusululum, ba signa meilinge odgom wenena, diaken wee deibsululum.
54003011	Neig songe na gelabo babe, nimi di gibdub ab, deresina´ gom ab, lignibonggia una´ ab yog ununa´ nisin lomag ab na sirig seinilimsiang gelabo.
54003012	Diaken na gel dognog nang eildi mabo ab eildi eelom nimi ab besa usinne.
54003013	Anese sig besa welamang nimi na sig uboga besarobne alameldongne na Kristus Yesus ag odseig seinilina´ di signa lag lena´ urubub dorob.
54003014	Nene nisin na an ag mome dobna, nana an ag gemelyunun aboga nebom alamna.
54003015	Nana mandebane wenena, anna Eimayong di eelom nimi na sa´a so ulamgob aboga eel ublom, nenege na Eimayong gamyagne di jemaat, anda eyagomna´ dibna´ na sirig yubu di diga´ deirub.
54003016	Nundi yubu dona´ geleleng arobne nenege na bebnag ulamla: “Alna nimi a´osing songe gigib lag danggayog, Gange di sirigne ubog, ba Alna eimnang ag omoldalbiog, di Yahudi gom nimi ag ombadsiog; di Alna sogo ag ab odseig sembibeg ba bebnagne ag boradeibog.”
54004001	Bog Gange di yoyaboga lebog di yogsum dogne yanggale wenena, nimi dara na odseig seinilina´ ebyagig di mednena´ omoladsina´ gange nisin ag ab meili gange nang di omoladsina´ yubu ag dobda balamgonga´,
54004002	sigdi sonda´ yubu lena´ di sigdi gange seinilina´ na bosi di ug gwalaga´ lengerob songe ulamang.
54004003	Signa nengabo gelabo doldana´ mem aboga, nimi na dena´ se Eimayong di ubogne na odseig seinilina´ nimi di na´e aboga dena´ ab sirigne besa eel una´ ab na mem alamang.
54004004	Yogne-yogne nisin Eimayong di ubogne na besarob, mem arobne dogne odgom, na´e aboga dona´ di wenena,
54004005	anese nenege nisin na Eimayong yubu ab doa yubu ab di geid legdob.
54004006	Anggabo a´un nason odseig seinilin nimi ag omoladlamsulom wenena anna Kristus Yesus di wee besarob wenne, wene na nundi odseig seinilina´ diga´ ombaddobne di besarob omoladsina´ yubu ag lebda ulamlam.
54004007	Bog mimboga nebna´ yubu ab noubu nimi di negna´ yubu ab ag na geblom. Bog samboga na weig yubu donne ag aga gemelongol dalamlom.
54004008	Nongse gemelongoldanne obne na moga´, bog weig yubu dona´ se gemelongoldanne na yogne-yogne nisin se obne, anese leiblourubne nenege na wene ulamaba´ ag se babe eimig ulamgoba´ agsig se babe.
54004009	Lerob yubu nene na sirigne anda nisin urubub dolamneba´.
54004010	Anese aboga nundi ingmun gweseboga yoyablamabne na, anese nundi nebom ana´ na Eimayong gamyagne deilimab, nimi nisin Blebsinne, oumunggun na odseig seinilina´ nimi damen.
54004011	Nene nisin leboga omoladlamsulom.
54004012	Anna goubininge aboga nimi dognog di babe sogo ag nembagulul gom, bog odseig seinilina´ nimi nisin se sununa´ ulamlom, eindi yubu lena´ ab, eindi ununa´ ab, eindi wana´ usina´ ab, eindi yeng una´ ab, eindi geis una´ ab di.
54004013	Unura weig yubu nenege nimi ag eildiboga wenelamsilem di omoladlamsilem bog na yunun.
54004014	Doladsina´ an ag odne nenege na deilloling gom, eimig ubnebne an ag doaddobne ab domba dira gemera un nimi see mag deirubne nenegab na.
54004015	Nene nisin yoyaboga unulamlom, eindi besarob unura bana´ nimi nisin ag lag danggulul aboga.
54004016	An babe, eindi omoladsina´ ag babe weldalamlom, di nene nisin ag gad segoga, anese, aneso unulamlem wenena anna andama´ blebdanggalem di eindi yubu gegelamang nimi nisin babe blebsuloma´.
54005001	Anna noubu nang ag gad yubu lesing gom, bog alag na anayong songe wembulom. Di goubini nimi ag na angga songe wembusulom,
54005002	noubu gelabo na einin yabo songe, goubini gelabo na einibsabo songe, besa geis ununa´ di unulamlom.
54005003	Sig sirig geiriya´ ulamang gelabo ag na giblamsulom.
54005004	Bog geiriya´ gel dogne eildi me goma eildi me di me gom od wenena, sig damen eel ubig di sigdi eelom nimi besa arolamsugong di sig eilisang yabo ab noubu nimi ab di besarob ulisina´ nenege lunusina´ se, anese nene aga na Eimayong na ngingyang ulamla.
54005005	Al geiriya´ sirig ulamla gel na, al nong og deiblourub gel, anda Eimayong ag nebom ana´ deirub di molona´ doa yubu sinag gwelegnag dagloubnang gom gom lemlul.
54005006	Bog geiriya´ gel dogne alna med-medgomob ulamla wenena, alna gamyag bog somagdob ulamla.
54005007	Ununa´ nene na sigag wembusulom, ba signa meili una´ goma´ ulamgong aboga.
54005008	Bog nimi dogne algabo besa welamsil gom di, eildi eelom nimi babe wesina´ gom wenena, nimi nenege na odseig seinilina´ ag elyaglamla, ba odseig seinilina´ gom nimi so gom alna yaga´ meili sirig.
54005009	Geiriya´ gelabo si mome doblom wenena, sigdi mangana´ salag eseng yala´ na deng besene di ebna na´ab bare ag uboga einigisig gelabo, nenge na li dognog dorob gelabo,
54005010	besarob wee unulamla ba gedneb gel, sununa´ na eildi me wena´ ab, nimi eildi ee ag giboga dosina´ ab, algabo odseig seinilina´ nimi yan mag legsina´ ab, ingmunne lomag ulamna ba arosina´ ab – buruma´ na garen sum nisin besarob ununa´ og ura un gelabo aga.
54005011	Goubini geiriya´ gelabo na sigdi si doblom gom, anese sigdi yo seinilina´ migib danggale wenena, signa Kristus ag loboga nenge dona´ yo ubgonga´ anda,
54005012	anda Alag damen ab yeng dagom ana´ deiblobig, ba sigdam nimi di iginne dora deibdanggugonga´.
54005013	On babe na sig wee wena´ gom gange di nimi di ee ag wa´inna langgina langgina ulamang, signa wee wena´ erigal se og gom, bog signa yog nimi ag nebelminina´ ab yog nimi di ununa´ ab isiboga lebnemen gom yubu lemang.
54005014	Anese aboga on goubini geiriya´ gelabo na nenge dobgong aboga seinilimna, me yag danggayig di sigdi eelom nimi welamsugong, di nun ag dolbalag nenesinne di meili ubsulul aboga garen doladnang gom.
54005015	Anese edbare geiriya´ gelabo na gigib medneboga Iblis bisig bieg.
54005016	Wera odseig seinilina´ gelabo na geiriya´ gelabo dogne od wenena, eildi alag arobulul, ba jemaat di arobugong aboga loublul gom. Aneso uboga yaga´ geiriya´ gelabo sirig aga na jemaat di arobugong.
54005017	Domba dira gemera un nang besarob bomengesin nang ag na li salag besene so gibsinmen, oumunggun na sig ingmun eisa´ weig yubu leboga omoladlamsiang nang ag.
54005018	Weig yubu ag mome aneso dorob: “Sapi na gandum do lablamla bog na si aroboga nobnang gom,” di on “Wee wen nimi wenena degna´ urubub dobnemen.”
54005019	Domba dira gemera unnang se yubu mednena´ unulamla dore arob yubu na seila´ leng gom bog nimi besene goma weneli di lag lebgong wenena.
54005020	Sig meili ubgong nimi na nimi dina´ a´osing ag delagoga wembusulom ba yog nimi babe log ubgong aboga.
54005021	Eimayong ab Kristus Yesus ab Eildi webdob eimnang ab a´osing ag ab molbagen: lebna yubu nene na unulamlom aboga anda yogne-yogne lomag mibda lena´ ab nimi a´osing ag mibsina´ ab ung gom.
54005022	Anna seila´ berera nimi see mag deibsulom gom, yog nimi di meilinge lomag domong gom. Di anna webdanggoga geid legdob ulamlom.
54005023	Mag og dulom gom, bog anggur mag moga´ ma´abonggia, eindi aso besarob una´ se anda eindi nong neigna´ bin-bin ulamlama´ se.
54005024	Dara nimi di meilinge na sunusina´ arobog gigib gedneb lag ulamla, bog dara nimi di meilinge na gigib bog lag dangalamla.
54005025	Aneso babe na besarob ununa´ nisin na gedneb lag ulamla, gomne babe na dognorob ulamnemen gom.
54006001	Ouragna´ dangdob nimi nisin na sig salesin nimi ag bebnag sembia giblamsugong, ba Eimayong di si ab nundi omoladsina´ yubu ag meili lebigag aboga.
54006002	Ouragna´ nimi di salesinne na odseig sembirubne wenena, sig salesin nimi na sogo ag nembugong gom, signa Kristus ab dirigdub aboga, bog alna sig ag on besa arolamsulul, anese sig salesinne di besa arolamsilne nenege na nason odseig seinilina´ nimi anda wana´ ulamsilne. Nene nisin na eindi wemboga omoladlamsulom.
54006003	Nimi dogne yog omoladsina´ omoladlamsile ba besarob lerob yubu ag dirigoga una´ gom wenena, nenege na nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di lerob yubu ab, nundi dolamab weig yubu ag dirigogange gom,
54006004	alna wangan bog eelne nenedanggoga ulamla. Eildi neigna´ na yubu ena´ ab yubu samosina´ ab ulamla, anedi dengdang abgong arob usina´ ab, meili lesina´ ab, deresina´ ab, mibda-mibda lena´ ab,
54006005	nimi na delegel dana´ di besarob seinilina´ na odgom di sirigne na wanenggirub, ba sigdi sembia weig yubu dona´ na mubduba´ deiya´ seinilimang.
54006006	Odseig weig yubu dona´ na od urubub seinilina´ gange ab di wenena, mubdubne weiga´ doladlamsil.
54006007	Anese nunna sogo ag ane yogne-yogne ab beyuyub goma´ anda nunna on yogne-yogne ab babe bobugob goma´.
54006008	Wera bagsum ab dena´ ab od wenena, od gigib urubub.
54006009	Bog sig damnang dina´ danggaseb yo ulamang nimi na uragsina´ lomag malyunggindub, di orangsina´ lomag orangdob, gange busu di yonge nisin garen dibabne lomag ab di meili ulimsil, di nimi douluboga bosina´ ab gom urubnebne ab lomag dolonglamsil.
54006010	Anese wase ag wana´ nonogoga seinilina´ na yog-yog meilinge yareng deiya´. Anese edbare nimi na wase se ena´ bisig na odseig seinilina´ beiblobeg di ongei arobne dina´ sigdama´ di oldalamang.
54006011	Bog an Eimayong di nimi lei, nene nisin na geblom, di sirigne ab, weig yubu dona´ ab, odseig seinilina´ ab, wana´ gange ab, lamarob gange ab besa mesang gange ab aga doblamlom.
54006012	Odseig seinilina´ sirigne ag di mal oldana´ se sununa´ yoyaboga sunulamlom, di unum gamyag una´ doblom. Anna anese aboga gigib biabgeog di anna nimi dina´ a´osing ag lag unuma´ leboga sirig unuma´ lebog.
54006013	Eimayong yogne-yogne gamyaga´ dodsiogne a´osing ag ab Yesus Kristus a´osing ag ab, unuma´ sirigne gigib Pilatus Pontius a´osing ag babe unuma´ lebna di, nana an ag lebnun:
54006014	Lerob yubu nene dagom alamlom, meili uboga suguruba´ gom-gom, ulamlem murub uboga nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus Al lag dangaldogle sum nenege ulbulul,
54006015	nenege na Ad Borobne dognogne di gedneboga deirub sum nenege, anda yaga´ ngingyang ob wenege, borob nimi nisin di Borobne di ayong weigne nisin di Ayong Weigne.
54006016	Al dognog na somagna´ne damag una´ gomne, nimi beram yanmengom diman ag ulamlange. Nimi dognog babe Al eirub gom anda odseig nimi na Al eibnemen gom. Alse aga gibdub ab unum gamyag migib ab ulamlul! Amin.
54006017	Sig sogo ag ane seyag nimi ag wembusulom sigdi gange bebnag ulamgong gom, di sunum unubanmen gomne damnang songe ag nebom ana´ ab na mem, bog Eimayong ag Eildi seyagne nun ag yogne-yogne ngingyang se dolamgong aboga dodsiogne ag aga.
54006018	Signa besarobne unulamgong aboga wembusulom, besarob una´ se seyag nimi ulamgong aboga, nimi ag doladsina´ yo nimi di bogoldalamgong,
54006019	anda aneso ulamig di sigdi damnang diga´ songe besarob sigdama´se deilimgong, yog sum dangalyanggale sum nenege sirig una´ne dangalbulul aboga.
54006020	Timotius lei, anag gigib dodgeyogne nenege na besa welamlom. Garen dibab len yubu ab geid gomne ab, di byabaldana´ yubu deiya´ na eel dangana´ arobne ab ag na geblom,
54006021	Anese ed bare nimi di omoladlamsiang, ba anesonge uboga odseig seinilina ag na loboga mednelamang. Glagia doladsina´ na a´un ag ulamsulula´.
55001001	Nana Paulus Eimayong di yonge ag uboga Kristus Yesus di doldogna´ne, anda Kristus Yesus lomag gamyag una´ se leiblourubne nenege omoladsina´ se.
55001002	Neri me Timotius yaga´ wana´ ulamnange ag na, glagia doladsina ab, weradona´ ab, nundi Ayong Weigne Kristus Yesus ab Ayong Eimayong ab, di isiboga mon angarob una´ na, an ag ulamgulula´.
55001003	Nana Eimayong ag na´e alamna, damen na´neisang yabo di ulameg songe neri besarob gange geid legdob di Al se welamna. Di nana doa yubu einimnag ugag lemna wenena, di an se babe seinilimgen.
55001004	Eindi engelamlam di engesuma´ langgalamla´ seinilimna di, nana an on eibgesene yo ulamnel, ba neri ngingyangne sunum danggulul aboga.
55001005	Anese eindi sirig urubub odseig sembibluma´ anege na nana seinilimna, nenege na ounu Lois ab einin Eunike ab di odseig sembibdeg songe an babe odseig sembibluma´, eel ulamna.
55001006	Anese aboga neri an ag wenelamgena´ na, Eimayong di glagia doladsina´ an ag odne nenege migib danggiblom aboga se, neri see mag deiligisi sum nenege uboga.
55001007	Anese Eimayong di nun ag na log gange dodsiog gom, bog migib ab, wana´ ab, besa urubub una´ gange ab dodsiog.
55001008	Anese nundi Ayong Weigne se yubu lag lena´ ab, Al se dolongna´ ag dobonggibneyegne ab na, eili ung gom. Bog anna Eimayong di migib di Besarob Yubu se iginne nason dolamnom.
55001009	Eildi nun blebsiog di geis biana´ di biabsiog, nundi ununa´ ag diga´ dirigoga gom, bog Eildi glagia doladsina´ ab sembirubne ag ab dirigoga, anda Kristus Yesus lomag dodsiogne na wilman eilnina´ anam bog danege ab.
55001010	Anda, wene Yesus Kristus nun Blebsinne yanggana´ bisig uboga lag dangalamla, ba Besarob Yubu di na somagna´ne goglamla di unum gamyagne derong arobneb gomne lag dangalamla.
55001011	Besarob Yubu nene se lena´ne ab, lera bana´ne ab, omoladsina´ne ab deibneog.
55001012	Anese aboga nana nene nisin se igin-iginne dolamna, bog nana eili gom: anese, na na eel edne ag odseig sembibsi di; Alag deibsinge nenege na odseig seinilimna, Eildi migib di welamnela´ murub Ayong Weigne yanggana´ sum.
55001013	Yogne-yogne nisin nayag uboga eindi gegbulumne nenege na salbamlom, besarob omoladsina´ na sununa´ songe, anda Kristus Yesus lomag wana´ una´ ab odseig seinilina´ ab di unulamlom.
55001014	Nun ag Eildi gemerobne dodsiogne na besa welamlom, Geid Gange nun lomag ulamlange nenege ab di
55001015	Mog Asia sogo nimi nisin na nayag loboga bildibega´ anege na anna eel, Figelus ab Hermogenes ab babe.
55001016	Ayong Weigne di weradona´ doladsina´ na Onesiforus di eelom nimi sob-sob neri gange soo arob ulimneang nimi ag doladlamsulul, Alna nayab dolongsina´ lomag elbisildana´ na eili ulamla gom.
55001017	Roma asag biog sum nenege na, alna nase era yabalamneyoga´, anda gigib nayab ebbisidunum.
55001018	Wera Ayong Weigne di weradona´ na alag Ayong Weigne di uboga Eildi sum ab doladlamla. Efesus asag ab eildi arolamneogne nisin anna eel.
55002001	Anese neri me lei, Kristus Yesus di glagia doladsina´ lomag uboga migib ulamlom.
55002002	Lag lenne dina´ a´osing ag nayag uboga eindi gigib gegbulumne nenege na, doboga odseig sembibgong nimi ag dodsulom, yog nimi ag besa ombadsugong arob nimi ag babe.
55002003	Anna Kristus Yesus di mal oldana´ se besarobne songe, anda igin-iginne ulamgele bog besa unulamlom.
55002004	Nimi dogne yin bon wee ag og yoyablamla di, nimi di sob ununa´ ag ununa´ gom, ba eildi ousa´ne al dorobne di alag ngingyang ublul aboga.
55002005	Bola on nimi dogne alna bebnag danggan di mahkota dolamla´ na, bola ona´ se garerobne ag sunum dirigoga unulamla´ di.
55002006	Wee wen nimi dogne na, wee migiba´ welameldo wenena, do oumunggunne na, al damneng daglameldo.
55002007	Neri lebnange nene na, besa sembiblom: Ayong Weigne di an ag yogne-yogne nisin eel una´ se dodgulula´.
