59003006	Silamu babe na ug; alna sogo ag meili ulamla di nundi nong ag dara-dara dolamla, nundi nong nisin ag sugurubne ulisina´ se, di nun gamyag ulamaba´ ag dinilamla, aldama´ babe na ugdan asag ug nenege di gigib dinirub.
59003007	Yogne-yogne bei ag yoonge nisin ab, winang ab, gologa yabanne ab, weig mag laut ag ulamangne ab na yeng dangilimsildong, anda nimi di una´ songe gigib yeng dangilimsildong,
59003008	bog nimi dognog di babe silamu na yeng danggibnemen gom; alna yaga yoo logne weldana´ gomne, di somagna´ yoonge degnerob ulamla.
59003009	Nundi silamu di nundi Ayong, Ayong Weigne meiblamab; di neig silamu di Eimayong di a´osing ubsiog nimi nenege ag wiblamsiab.
59003010	Dognog bam ag uboga besilisina´ ab, wibsina´ ab langgalamla. Na´abo lei, aneso ununa´ na unubaselom gom.
59003011	Neig mag lu di soo mag ab, sig mag ab langgalameldo de?
59003012	Na´abo lei, gal ara di zaitun do mubnemen goma gal anggur di ara do mubnemen de? Neig songe babe na sig mag lu ag uboga soo mag langginmen gom.
59003013	Edne aga a´un gan-gan ag eel gerem ab eel dangana´ ab ulamla do? Od seleb, alna wisirub gange di lambonggia eildi una´ besarobne lag deilimlul.
59003014	A´un na ongei arobne ab, weig neneldana´ gange ab od wenena, a´unna bebnag deildang gom, di sonda´ne di sirigne ag dolbalag neneng gom.
59003015	Wisirub gange nene na, einigi uboga yalamla gom, bog alna sogo ag ab nimi di gange busu di yonge ab Iblis ab ag uboga.
59003016	Anese ongei arob gange ab, weig neneldana´ ab od wenena, anegag uboga doluboga gwildi-gwildi ana´ ab, yog-yog meili una´ ab ulamla.
59003017	Bog einigi uboga wisirub gange na, oumunggunne na geidne, beilag signe na isirub una´ ab, yeng una´ ab, dagomana´ ab, wana´ degnerob una´ ab, do besarob una´ ab, delegoga mibsing gom una´ ab, meini una´ gom ab.
59003018	Anda sirigne di do nenege na sig isirub ulamang nimi di isirub una´ se dogdob.
59004001	A´un gan-gan ag barala´ oldana´ ab leldana´ ab na asa uboga yalamla do? A´undi nong lomag gange busu di yonge di yoyablamsilne nenege di yalamla gom de?
59004002	A´un na yogne-yogne yo seinilimlom bog a´un na dolamlom gom, di a´un na nimi olamsilom, di ongei arob gange ulamlom, di unubugob arobne ag na unulamlom gom, di a´unna leldana´ ab barala´ oldana´ ab ulamlom. A´unna molona´ gom se yogne-yogne doblulum gom.
59004003	A´un na mololamlom bog yogne-yogne dolamlom goma´ na, a´un na medneboga mololamlom, di a´undi gange busu di yonge og mololamloma´ se.
59004004	A´un yolsagna´ nimi lei! Sogo agne ab oron buldana´ na Eimayong ag mal borob una´ anege na a´unna wangan de? Wera nimi dogne sogo agne ag oron bulamla wenena, alna Eimayong ag mal borobne dangaldalamla.
59004005	Weig Yubu agne na, nong ogoga lerob gom seinilimlom di goma? “Eimayong di gange nun ag deibsiogne na, Eildi gange ongei arob yo ulamla.”
59004006	Bog Eildi glagia doladsina´ nun ag dodsiogne na on yaga´ weiga´ sirig. Anese Eildi lebog di na: “Dengdang ana´ nimi na Eimayong di olamsildo, bog lamarob gange nimi ag na glagia doladsina´ doladlamsildo.”
59004007	Eimayong damag dagomana´ ulamlulum, di Iblis dolbalag nembululum ba, alna a´un ag uboga berera bulula´.
59004008	Eimayong beram yululum, ba Alna a´un beram yulul. A´un meili una´ nimi lei, a´undi see leglulum! A´un gange besene nimi lei, a´undi gange geid leglulum.
59004009	A´undi gange ag oldana´ di ongei arobne ab di engelamlulum: a´undi og sorob una´ na engena´ lumbululum, di ngingyang una´ na ongei arobne ublulum.
59004010	A´un na Ayong Weigne damag lamarob ulamlulum, ba Eildi a´un bebnag deibsulul.
59004011	Na´abo lei, a´un moumun dereboga meili leldang gom! Nimi dogne na alga ag derelamla goma sununlamla wenena, alna Damen Wenena´ Yubu ag dereboga sunulamla; anda anna Damen Wenena´ Yubu ag sunulamlam wenena, anna Damen Wenena´ Yubu dagomana´ne gom, bog alag sununne ulamlam.
59004012	Damen Wenena´ Yubu Doladsinne ab, Sunusinne ab na dognog, nenege na blebsina´ ab, osina´ ab Eildi og salerob; ba anna edne di, anggabo ag sunulamsilam do?
59004013	Wera wene a´undi lemlom di na: “Sum nene goma ambusum gom weig asag bugob, di anegag na eseng yala´ dogne ulameb di degna´ obda weiga´ ma´aboga dolamgob.”
59004014	Ambusum ublulne nenege a´un na eel umlom gom dog. A´undi gamyag una´ na sa´a do? Busu songe al wenege eibna bog gom ulamla songe ulamlom.
59004015	Sirigne na a´un na ane so lebnemen, “Ayong Weigne di yo sembibso wenena, nunna gamyag ulameb di ane ab nene ab unulamgob.”
59004016	Bog wene a´un na dengdang ana´ di weig neneldalamlom; anda weig neneldana´ nene nisin na mednena´.
59004017	Wera nimi dogne na besarob una´ eel bog alna unulamla gom wenena, meilinge ulamla.
59005001	Wera wene a´un damnang yag nimi lei, eimig a´un ag ogne bulyusulula´ se enggoga salag leglamlulum.
59005002	A´un di damnang na blorob, a´undi bagsum na sab di gigib derob.
59005003	A´undi emas ab perak ab na gigib aran silbila´ wararob, aran silbila´ nenege di, a´undi a´osing ag lag neblamla, anda a´undi sob na ug songe delamsulula´. A´undi damnang na goggobdagna´ sum se gigib deilimlom.
59005004	Gedsu, a´undi wee ag welamang nimi ag degna´ doladsina´ gom ba, yubu weiga lemla; di do daggoga deilimang nimi di biana´ na, yogne yogne nisin Ayong Weigne di oo ag gigib yayog.
59005005	A´undi besarob med-med gomob una´ na gigib sogo agne ag ngingyang ura ulamlom, di a´undi gange ag na obneb sum songe weinildalamlom.
59005006	A´un na sirig nimi ag iginne ouya olamsilom, bog alna a´un ag dolbalag nenelamsil gom.
59005007	Anese na´abo lei, lignibonggia ulamlulum murub Ayong Weigne yulul. Odseig wee wenne di una´ gedlulum, alna lignibonggia ulameldo ba, sogo ag eildinge besarobne doladlameldo, alna golona´ se yanggan mog ab, eisa´ mubneb yanggan mog ab se lignibonggia dira ulameldo.
59005008	A´un babe lignibonggia gange gad ulamlulum, anese Ayong Weigne yanggana´ sum na gigib beram ulamla.
59005009	Na´abo lei, erigal leboga mednena´ yubu leldang gom, ba a´un ag iginne deibag aboga. Odseig Sunusinne na gigib isigin ag seglamla.
59005010	Na´abo lei, sig nabi nang nisin di Ayong Weigne si ag lemeg di iginne ab lignibonggia una´ ab ulameg sununa´ ag ab doblulum.
59005011	Odseig sig lignibonggia gad ulamang nimi se nundi na ngingyang abnemen. A´unna Ayub di lignibonggia ulamog yubu na gigib gegbulum, di al se Ayong Weigne di gedneboga deibogne babe eel ublum, anese Ayong Weigne na besarob gangenge di yaga´ wana´ usinne.
59005012	Bog oumunggun nongne na, eim si ag babe sogo si ag babe goma, yogne yogne si ag gom babe, leleng gom. “Yo” ana´ yo sembia wenena, “Yo” ablulum, “Gom” abgob sembia wenena, “Gom” ablulum, ba a´un na iginne doblulum gom aboga.
59005013	A´un gan-gan ag nimi dogne iginne ulamle wenena, alna doa yubu lemlul! Nimi dogne ngingyang ulamle wenena, alna gibna´ mos seblamlul.
59005014	A´un gan-gan ag nimi dogne neigna´ od wenena, alna domba gemera dira un nang biabsulul, ba sig na alag doa yubu leboga minyak mag di liggong, Ayong Weigne si ag uboga.
59005015	Odseig seinilina´ di lebgong doa yubu wenena, neigna´ nimi nenege bleble ba alna Ayong Weigne di bugiblulua´; anda alna meilinge urub wenena, eildi meilinge na lubiblula´.
59005016	Anese, a´un moumun a´undi meilinge lag leboga doa yubu leldalamlulum, ba a´un na egdanggululuma´. Sirig nimi di len doa yubu na migib na yaga weiga´, anda nong babe od.
59005017	Elia na nimi sirig nun songe neigne, anda alna yaga´ mog yalag aboga doa yubu lemog, ba sogo ag mog yanggana´ gom salag na eseng yala´ weneli di wal na´ab bare umog.
59005018	Gigib ba, on alna doa yubu lebog, ba eim ag uboga mog yunggiog, di sogo agne babe do mubog.
59005019	Na´abo lei, a´un gan-gan ag nimi dogne sirigne ag loboga balamla, bog nimi dogne di samboga beyulul aboga ulamla,
59005020	eel ublulum: edne di meili una´ nimi dogne ag mednena´ bisig ag samboga beyalamla wenena, alna nimi nenege di gange gamyaga somagna´ne ag uboga blebla, di eildi meilinge dina´ babe segilimla.
60001001	Petrus na, Yesus Kristus di lera bana´ne, segelyanggan nimi aga Pontus asag ab, Galatia asag ab, Kapadokia asag ab, Asia mog sogo ab, Bitinia asag ab ag bindub nimi,
60001002	nenege na nundi Ayong Eimayong di bogdobne ag dirigoga webdob nimi, anda Gange di geis legsio, ba Yesus Kristus ag dagom ana´ ab Eildi eneng di legsina´ ab dobgong aboga. Glagia doladsina´ ab isiboga mon angarob una´ ab a´un ag ma´ia ulamsulula´.
60001003	Wera, nun na nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus, Aleyong Eimayong meiboga gibgob. Anese Alna, nun ag yaga´ wana´ sembibsiogne nenege na, Yesus Kristus al nong somagdoba´ deiruba´ ag uboga, gamyag bugogoga yayog ununa´ nenege di, gamyag deiya´ wenogne dodsioga´ anda, nun wene gadsegdaboga nebom alamab,
60001004	gom ubneb gom meisa´ ab, sugubaneb gomne ab nala´aneb gomne ab a´unse eim asag deiruba´ dobneba´ se.
60001005	Nenege na a´undi odseig seinilina´ se, Eimayong di migib lomag welamsil, anda goggobdagna´ sum nenege blebsina´ gigib gednerobne lag dangganeba´ se.
60001006	Wera yubu nene se ngingyang ulamlulum, a´un na wene umlom salag na yog-yog ouragsina´ di ongei arobne ulamsile bog.
60001007	Nene nong na a´undi odseig seinilina´ nenege sirigne lag gedneb una´ se, nenege na do yaga bebnagne Emas sesenge ab sunum gomne, sirigne na ug ag daboga sumboga, ba nenege na gibdub ab bebnag ab gibsina´ ab dorob Yesus Kristus Al lag dangaldogle sum na.
60001008	A´un na eildi nong eilina´ gom bog, alag wana´ ulamlom, anda wene babe, Al nong eilina´ gom bog Alag odseig seinilimlom. A´undi gange ngingyang log anda, yaga´ weig bebnagne yubu sirig di lebnemen gom so.
60001009	Anese a´undi odseig seinilina´ nenege nong ag na gigib dangalbio, nenege na a´undi gange blebsina´ ag.
60001010	Blebsina´ anese nabi nang na a´un se glagia doladsina´ eimig ubnebne se, lemegne nenege na besa delegoga eilameg.
60001011	Anda ed sum ab Kristus di Gange sigdi nong ag odne nenegab na sa´a songe danggulula´ do? aboga besa gemelameg, nenege na aro bog Gange di ane so ublula´ aboga ombaramsiogne na Kristus boboga igin iginne dobneba´ ab gigib ba bebnagne nisin dangganeba´ ab se.
60001012	Sig ag lag danggayogne nenege na sig dama´ aroldana´ se gom, bog a´un se, anda yogne-yogne nisin wene a´un ag omoladsina´ na, Geid Gange aga eim asag uboga bogdebelyesiog, ba nimi bisig uboga Besarob Yubu a´un ag omoladsina´ se, nenege na eim nang ag babe eel ulisina´ yo urub yubu.
60001013	Anese a´undi gange seinilina´ gedneboga weldalamlulum, di Yesus Kristus lag dangaldogle sum nenege ab glagia doladsina´ a´un ag dodsineba´ se a´un na sumboga nebom alamlulum.
60001014	Dagom ana´ mabo songe ulamlulum, di a´un na wangan wenege ab gange busu di yonge ag lebda ulamlum songe ung gom.
60001015	Bog, a´undi una´ nisin na geis legdob ulamlulum a´un Biabsiogne Al geis legdob ulamla songe.
60001016	Anese mome dorob di na: “Na geis legdob ulamna´ se, a´un babe geis legdob ulamlulum.”
60001017	Anda a´un na Ayong aboga Al siblulum wenena, Alna nimi nisin sigdi ununa´ ab sunuldogsin wenena nimi a´osing mibsing gomne, ba a´un na sogo ag ane umlom wenena log sembia ulamlulum.
60001018	Anese a´un na eel, a´undi gilaboga una´ ag uboga lubibsiogne nenege na a´un eisang yabo ag uboga doaddangdobne nenege emas goma perak gom urubnebne di gom;
60001019	Bog na degna´ nonggela eneng di, nenege na Kristus di eneng suguboga meili urub gom domba me di eneng songe di.
60001020	Alna sogo ulina´ aro bog webamog, bog a´un ag se na Alna sogo goggobdagna´ ab lag danggalamla.
60001021	Al bisig uboga a´un na Eim Ayong ag odseig seinilimlom, Alna somagdob nimi gan-gan ag uboga gamyag bugibog, di Alna gigib bebnag deibog, ba a´undi odseig seinilina´ ab nebom arobne ab Eimayong ag deilimlom.
60001022	Anese a´un na sirigne ag dagom ana´ di a´un dama´ di gigib legdangdob ulamlom, ba a´un na a´unggabo ag doumdigum wed gange di wana´ uldana´ besa eel ulamlom, anda a´un na a´undi gange nisin di sirig wana´ seinildalamlulum.
60001023	Anese on manggesioga´ na gom urubneb yena´ di gom, bog Eimayong di yubu unum gamyag ulamneb yena´ di.
60001024	Anese: “Sogo nimi nisin na mal meila´ songe, sigdi bebnagne nisin na mal meila´ eisa´ songe. Mal meila´ na, elem danggalamla eisa´ na goloboga malyonggalamla,
60001025	bog, Eimayong di yubu na unum sob sob ulamlula.” Ane na Besarob Yubu a´un ag ombaddob yubu nenege.
60002001	Anese meilinge nisin ab sonda´ yubu lena´ nisin ab, meini ununa´ nisin ab, ongei arob gange ab, meili deresina´ nisin ab na boreblulum.
60002002	Wera, a´un na wenog mangarob me di moum yo ulamla songe, a´un babe neigne gange senge besarob moum sob yo ulamlulum, ba eildi a´un ag noboga blebsina´ doblulum aboga.
60002003	Wera a´un na gigib yamorob ba, Ayong Weigne na besarob.
60002004	Anda Alna gamyag girig nenegag yalamlulum, odseig nimi di na borebeg, bog Eimayong a´osing ag na webdob di a´osing agne.
60002005	Anda a´un babe na gange se ee dogne soblul aboga wenena, gamyag girig nenege eilib solamla, a´un na geid legdob wee wen nimi danggoga, gange di gibna´ senge deilina´ na Yesus Kristus ag uboga na Eimayong ag ngingyang ulamlulne.
60002006	Anese Weig Yubu lomag mome dorob di na: “Odseig, nana Sion unang ag webdob girig dogne deibnuna´, gad girig diga´ nenege na a´osing agne, anda edne na Alag odseig seinilimle wenena, alna eili ublul goma´.”
60002007	Anese a´un odseig seinilina´ nimi ag na alna a´osing agne, bog sig odseig seinilina´ gom nimi ag na: “Ee son nimi di gigib bobogdob girig nenege na, diga´ nong yangaranggayog, di babe na oulug digsina´ ab, gwaregna´ girig ab dangayog.”
60002008	Anese sig na Eimayong di yubu ag dagomana´ gom di signa gwareglamgonga´; anda anese sig se babe gigib gedneboga deirub.
60002009	Bog a´un na, webdob mog sogo nimi, borobne se wee wen nimi, geid legdob mog sogo nimi, Eimayong nong di nimi, ba a´un na Eildi weig ununa´ nisin omoladlamsululum aboga, a´un gunu lomag uboga biabsiog di, Eildi diman ubnemen gomne ag bolangisiog:
60002010	Damen a´un na Eildi nimi gom, bog wene a´un na Eimayong di nimi ulamlom, damen a´un na weradona´ domlum gom, bog wene a´un na weradona´ gigib dorob.
60002011	Na´abo neri wana´ nimi lei, nana a´un ag wenbusunun, ba segelyanggan nimi ab dongolgirigna´ so nimi ab ag, gange ag nong di yonge di yoyaboga dolbalag nenelamsilne ag na lobda mog ublulum aboga.
60002012	Yahudi gom nimi gan-gan ag ab a´undi ununa´ na besarobne aga unubululum, ba sigdi a´un ag meili nimi danggibsugong wenena, signa a´undi ununa´ besarobne eibig di, Alna sigag yanggale sum na Eimayong bebnag deibgong aboga.
60002013	A´un na Eimayong se aboga, sogo nimi di garerobne wee nisin ag dagomalamlulum, borob nimi aga weig bebnag wee salerob nimi ag,
60002014	goma gubernur meili ununa´ nimi ag iginne deiya besarob unun nimi ag na gibsina´ ab se bogdobne ag babe.
60002015	Anese Eimayong di yonge na ane, nenege na a´undi besarob ununa´ di, wangan so yubu lemang nimi ag gelegibsululum.
60002016	Wera, a´un na lobdob nimi songe ulamlulum, di a´undi lobdobne nenege di sigdi meili ununa´ ag na lilising gom, bog Eimayong di ouragna´ nimi ulamlulum.
60002017	Nimi nisin ag giblamsululum di, a´unggabo ag wana´ ulamsululum, di Eimayong ag log ulamlulum, di borobne ag babe giblamlulum.
60002018	A´un ouragna´nimi lei, a´undi salisin nimi ag log gange di dagumalamlulum, sig besa gemelongsin nimi ag og gom, bog gange gad nimi ag babe.
60002019	Anese nimi dogne Eimayong se igin-iginne lignibonggia dolamla wenena, eildi dobnemen gomne ag dolamla, ba gibdub.
60002020	Anese a´un na meilinge degna´ se obsising ba lignibonggia dolamlam wenena, gibdub abnemen de? Bog a´unna besarob ununa´ unulamlulum bog iginne lignibonggia doblom wenena, nene na Eimayong a´osing ag gibdub una´.
60002021	A´un na anese biabsiog, anese Kristus babe a´un se igin-iginne dobog di, a´un se sununa´ babe deibog, ba a´un na Eildi yan ouling ag dobda balamlulum aboga.
60002022	Alna meilinge ung gomne, sonda´ yubu Eildi bam ag na od gomne.
60002023	Alag derena´ yubu lemeg wenegena, Alna degna´ derebesiog gom; Alna iginne domog wenegena, degna´ obsiog gom, bog Alna Al dama´ sunum urubub Sunisinne ag deibdayog.
60002024	Al dama´ di nundi meilinge na Eildi nong lomag doboga glabna gal ag glabog, ba nun meilinge ag uboga somagdob nimi na sirigne di gamyag ulamgong aboga; Eildi boga garebayega´ di a´unna gigib wesibsiog.
60002025	Damen a´un na domba derong arob songe ulamlum, bog wene a´un na gigib losomboga a´undi gange se Welamsilne Gembala damag yalamlom.
60003001	Neig songe babe na a´un nengag gelabo lei, a´un neig nang yabo ag dagomalamlulum, ba sig dara Weig Yubu dagomana´ gom nimi sig ag babe yubu lena´ ab di gom-gom, nengag gelabo di ununa´ di danggugong aboga.
60003002	Signa eibsugong wenena, a´undi sa´a songe besarob una´ ab log gange una´ ab di.
60003003	A´undi nong ag gweiga´ lagne se og gom, nenege na osong wanana´ ab emas di memerob gweiga´ ab, besarob bagsum ongona´ ab na,
60003004	Bog samboga, gange lomag dognorobne aga, gom urublulne gomne nenege na lambonggia so arob gange una´, Eimayong di gemena´ na a´osing ag ulamla.
60003005	Anese damen geid legdob di Eimayong ag nebom alameg gelabo di gweiga´ na aneso ura ulameg, di sigdi nengabo ag dagomalameg.
60003006	Sara babe neig so Abraham ag dagom aboga, alna neri ayong weigne alamog. Anda a´un babe besarob ulamlulum di, log nenena´ se log gom wenena, a´un babe eildi gelmabo ulamlom.
60003007	Neig songe babe na a´un gelabo yag nang lei, eindi gel ab besa sunum urubub ulamdurum, di gelabo di nong na mesanga´ anda, sig ag gibsululum glagia doladsina´ gamyagne nason doroba´ se, ba a´undi doa yubu lilibalag aboga.
60003008	Goggobdagna´ na a´un nisin na dognog isiboga, dognog yubu, dognog seinilina´, a´unggabo ag wana´ gange ab, wana´ usina´ ab, lamarob gange ab,
60003009	Meili ununa´ ag on meili ununa´ degnang gom, deresina´ yubu ag on degna´ deresing gom, bog samboga na a´undi beisibsululum, a´un na anese aboga biabsiog, nenege na beisilisina´ dona´ se.
60003010	Anese: “Nimi dogne eildi gamyag una´ yo nimi, besarob sum nisin eilina´ yo wenena, eildi silamu meilinge ag na besa weldalamlul, di eildi bam ag sonda´ yubu lena´ ab na.
60003011	Alna meilinge ag na geboga besarobne aga unulamlul; alna isiboga una´ dobnun aboga yoyaboga elamlul.
60003012	Anese, Ayong Weigne di ising na sig sirig nimi nisin ag gemelonglamsil, di Eildi oo na sig arobusulom alamang nimi ag deilimla, bog Ayong Weigne di a´osing meili ununa´ nimi nisin ag na dogomalamsil.”
60003013	Anna besarob ununa´ nisin bobo gwirid aboga unulamlam wenena, edne di meili ununa´ an ag deibgenmen do?
60003014	Bog a´un na sirigne unulamluluma´ anda babe iginne na dolamluluma´, ba a´un na ngingyang ulamluluma´. Anese a´un na sigdi log nenesina´ ag na log uboga bed-bed anggom.
60003015	Bog a´undi gange lomag Ayong Weigne Kristus geid legdoba´ ublulum! Anda sob-sob sum a´undi nebom arobne yubu degna´ lena se isibusugong nimi ag a´undi yubu degna´ lebnebne gednelamlulum, bog besa mesang uboga gibdub una´ di,
60003016	anda besa doumdigum gange di, ba a´un na Kristus di nong lomag besarob gange ulamloma´ se sig a´un ag lemsiang nimi na sigdi meili lena´ di eili ubsulula´.
60003017	Anese besarob ununa´ se iginne dona´ wenena seleb, ununa´ nenege na Eimayong di sembirubne wenena, meili una´ se iginne dona´ anda baba´.
60003018	Anese Kristus babe nundi meilinge se ig dognog somagdobog, Sirigne di sirig gom nimi nisin se, Eildi nun na Eimayong ag bobusunun aboga; Al Eildi una´ na nimi ag una´ ura obeg, bog Gange senge na gamyag bugibog.
60003019	Anda Gange lomag anege uboga babe na, Alna Besarob Yubu dolongsina´ lomag ulameg gange nisin ag omoladbilamsiog.
60003020	Nenege na sig damen Nuh wilnib ulameg nimi aga Eimayong ag dagom alameg gom gange nisin, Nuh na mag ee gedneboga solamog wenege na, Eimayong na lignibonggia dira ulamog, anda nimi moga´ og, nenege na lin bare nimi og mag ag anege uboga blebsiog.
60003021	Wene a´un blebsioga´ babe na sununa´ ag uboga, nenege na dolongsina´, nong na nong sugurubne legsina´ se gom, bog Eimayong ag gange besarobne molona´ se, Yesus Kristus gamyag bugilina´ bisig uboga,
60003022	Di Alna gigib eim asag winggiog di Eimayong see sirig ag bulamla, eim nang ab, bosina´ ab, migib ab na Al damag deibog.
60004001	Wera, anese Kristus na nong di igin-iginne dobog, ba a´un babe aneso seinilina´ dora onggolulum, anese nimi dogne nong di iginne dolamlul wenena, alna meili ununa´ ag na gigib garelorob.
60004002	Ba li salag moga´ abene na nimi di yonge ag dirigoga unung gom, bog Eimayong di yonge aga.
60004003	Anese a´un na li weiga´ na Eimayong eel gom nimi nisin di yonge ag se unulamlom. Di a´un na yog-yog a´osingne gange busu di yonge ab, yonge-yonge ab, serem so una´ ab, seni saram dena´ ab, serem mag dena´ ab, sunuruba´ gibna´ mem arobne ag gibna´ ab ulamlum.
60004004	Anese sig na irei alamang, ba a´un na sigdi ununa´ sunum gomne leso dona´ag nason unulamlom goma´ se, sig na a´un ag derelamsiang.
60004005	Bog sig na, Alag yubu degna´ lag lebgonga´, gamyag nimi ab, somagdob nimi ab sunusina´ na gigib gednegogorob.
60004006	Anese aboga, Besarob Yubu nenenge na somagdob nimi nisin ag babe ombadsiog, ba sig babe nimi nisin songe neigne nong bisig na sumbusulula´, bog gange na Eimayong di yonge ag lebda ulamgonga´.
60004007	Yogne-yogne nisin gigib goggobdagna´ beram, anese a´unna gasaboga besa umlulum di weldalamlulum, doa yubu lemgob aboga.
60004008	Bog oumunggun nong na: A´un moumun yaga´ wana´ seinildalamlulum, anese wana´ seinildana´ di na meilinge dina´ lililina´.
60004009	A´un moumun aroldalamlulum wenena, yubu geira´ gom-gom.
60004010	A´un moumun aroldalamlulum wenena, doladsina´ ura dorobne ag lebda, Eimayong di glagia doladsina´ ag dirigoga wee besa wen nimi ulamlulum.
60004011	Yubu omoladsin nimi wenena, od seleb alna Eimayong di yubu sirig og omoladlamsulul. Arosin nimi wenena, Eimayong di migib alag doaddobne nenege di unulamlul, yogne-yogne nisin lomag Yesus Kristus ag uboga Eimayong bebnag ulamlul. Al aga bebnag ab salerob ab unum-unum se ulamlula. Amin.
60004012	Na´abo neri wana´ nimi lei, a´un ag iginne ugbog isisina´ se yangala´ ag na irei ang gom, yaga´ a´un ag yogne dogne omom songe dangaldogsila´ ag na:
60004013	Bog samboga ngingyang ulamlulum, anese Kristus di dobog iginne ag sumboga a´un babe dolamlom, ba a´un na Al Eildi bebnagne lag dangaldogle sum nenege na ngingyang se eii dolamlulum aboga.
60004014	A´un na Kristus di si se aboga meili lemsugong wenena, ngingyang ulamlulum, anese bebnag Gange nenege na Eimayong di Gange na a´un ag ulamla.
60004015	A´un gan-gan ag ab nimi dogne na nimi ona´ goma asoga´ dona´ goma, meili una´ goma, gweldi-gweldi ana´ di iginne doblul gom.
60004016	Bog alna odseig seinilina´ nimi di iginne dolamlul wenena, alna eili ulamlul gom, bog Kristus di si ag uboga Eimayong bebnag deilimlul.
60004017	Anese wene sumbesineb sum na gigib eilnibal, anda oumunggun na Eimayong di ee ag damen sumbulula´, di sunusile wenena nun ag eilniboga, anda sig Eimayong di Besarob Yubu ag odseig seinilina´ gom, bog goggob daglul nimi ag na, sa´a songe danggulula´ do?
60004018	Anda, “Sirig nimi blebsina´ gad wenena, meili una´ nimi ab, gegeng gom nimi ag na, sa´a songe danggulula´ do?”
60004019	Anese aboga signa Eimayong di yonge ag iginne dona´ na od seleb, Ubsiogne ag eildi gange doaddanggoga sob-sob besarob ununa´ ulamso.
60005001	Nana a´un domba dira gemera un nimi ag wembousunun, na babe domba dira gemera unne, Kristus di igin-iginne doboga´ se lag lenne, eimig bebnagne lag dangaldogla´ babe dobnunne di.
60005002	Eimayong di domba a´un ag odne dira gemera ulamlulum, bebegna´ na mem, bog Eimayong di yonge ag dirigoga yog wana´ se, anda degna´ loboga dobgob arob una´ se gom, bog ngingyang gange di.
60005003	A´un na sig a´un ag deirub nimi ag migiba´ unubululum arob una´ usinggom, bog a´un na domba se sununa´ ulamlulum.
60005004	Wera a´undi Weig Gembala yanggale wenena, a´un na bebnag meleg ousa´ ongona´ nala´ulul gomne dobluluma´.
60005005	Neig songe babe na a´un goubini nang lei, a´un eyong yabo damag ulamlulum; di a´un nisin na alga damag alga damag ulamlulum, anese bebnag gange nimi na Eimayong di sogag deilimsil, bog lamarob gange nimi ag na glagia doladsina´ doladlamsil.
60005006	Anese Ayong Weigne di see migib damag lambonggiblulum, ba Eildi sum na a´un bebnag deibsulul aboga.
60005007	A´undi gange saramne nisin na Alag dodlulum, Alna a´un welamsila´ se.
60005008	Eel uboga besa weldalamlulum! A´undi mal borobne Iblis na singa´ songe nimi sisabsineb si a´a elgiriglamsil.
60005009	A´undi odseig seinilina´ di gad segdaboga alag byablamlulum, anese a´un na eel, mog sogo nisin a´unggabo babe iginne neigne dolamang.
60005010	Anda Eimayong yogne-yogne glagia doladsina´ deiya´ne, di a´un na Kristus lomag uboga Eildi bebnag unumne ag biabsiog, a´un na ag sunum ulisina´ ab, muboga gad segna´ ab, migib ulisina´ ab, gad ulisina´ ab ulimsil, a´un na iginne dora balamluluma´ goggobag ag na.
60005011	Eildi migib na, unum-unum ulamlula´! Amin.
60005012	Neri mome buruma´ a´un ag dobna´ ane na, nungga Silwanus sirig seinilimna nimi bisig uboga wembesin di sirig sembiblulum aboga, ane na sirig nong Eimayong di glagia doladsina´. Al lomag gad seglamlulum!
60005013	A´ungga Babilon webdob gel ab neri me Markus ab di babe a´un nisin ag gibsidang.
60005014	Geid nos ana´ di alga-alga ag gibildalamlulum. Di Kristus lomag isiboga mon angarobne na a´un ag ulamsulula´. Amin
61001001	Simon Petrus na lera bana´ne Yesus Kristus di ouragna´ne, di sig nun ab nason Yesus nun blebsinne ab Eimayong di sunum urububne ab di nason odseig seinilina´ dobub.
61001002	A´un na Eimayong ab nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus ab eel ubluma´, di glagia doladsina´ ab, isiboga mon angarob una´ ab na a´un ag ma´alamsulula´.
61001003	Anese Eildi migib unumne di nun ag gigib glagia dodsiog, Alag besa eel una´ di besarob nong obne aga besa una´ se, Eildi bebnag migib ab ubnemen gomne ab di nun biabsiog.
61001004	Ane so bisig uboga Eildi nun ag leblourobne degna´ weigne yaga´ nonggela´ne glagia dodsiog, ba a´un na al bisig uboga unum una´ doblulum, di sogo ag ane gange busu di yonge obsinebne ag na blebeldalamlulum.
61001005	Anese aboga a´un na a´undi odseig seinilina´ ma´ana´ se besarob una´ yaga´ yo yablulum; anda besarob una´ eel una´ ag;
61001006	di eel una´ ag na weldana´, weldana´ ag na yeng dagomana´, yeng dagomana´ ag na sirig besarob una´,
61001007	sirig besarob una´ ag na, sig algabo ag wana´; sig algabo ag wana´ na, nimi nisin wana´ usina´.
61001008	Anese nene nisin na a´un ag ma´aboga ulamla wenena, a´un na Nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ag besa eel una´ na on migib ulimsil di nong besarob danggalamla.
61001009	Bog nimi dogne nene nisin dorob gom wenena, alna ising urub ba inib-inib arob di, ane di eildi meilinge na damen ab lubibog bog alna ibildoglamla.
61001010	Anese aboga na´abo lei, a´un ag biasina´ ab websina´ ab gad muboga salbamgob aboga sirig yo yablamlulum. Anese a´un na ane so ulamlulum wenena, a´un na gwareboga malyunggenmen gom.
61001011	Ane songe uboga, a´un ag unum borobne damag wa´na´ se weiga´ dodsulula, nenege na Ayong Weigne ab nun Blebsinne Yesus Kristus di borobne damag una´ ag.
61001012	Anese nana a´un ag nenege nisin sob-sob seinilmubilimsin, a´un na od gigib eel ublum di sirigne a´undi gigib doblumne nenege na gad salbamlom bog.
61001013	Na gamyag ulamna wenena, nana a´un se lerob yubu nenege se seinilmubilimsin, anda nenena neri a´un se unubunun arobne.
61001014	Anese neri ee nong nene berera deiblobnun aboga ulamna´ na nana eel, nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di nayag gigib ombadneog songe.
61001015	Bogna na yoyablamna na bine wenege na nene nisin a´un seinilmublamlulum aboga.
61001016	Anese nun na nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus borobne yangana´ ab migib ab a´un ag omoladsuyub wenegena, nimi di negna´ yubu ag dirigoga gom, bog Eildi weiga´ nundi ising di eibubne aga.
61001017	Alna Ayong Eimayong ag uboga bebnagne ab gibna´ ab doldogog wenegena, Alag Yaga´ Bebnagne di uboga yubu lebog di na: “Ane na Neri Me Neri wana´ sembirubne Nana Alag ngingyang ulamna.”
61001018	Nun na yubu nenege na eim ag uboga yayog ba gegbuyub, wenege nun na al ab nason geid mein ag umub bog.
61001019	Aneso uboga nun na nabi nang nisin di ombaramsiyig yubu di nun na migib danggesiog. Wesa´ diman gunu ag waralamla murub gweleglamla songe yale sig gura´ segelwinggina´ a´undi gange ag dingilamsulul, anda a´un na aneso gemelonglamselom wenena seleb.
61001020	A´undi oumunggun nong eel ublulumne na, eimig ubnebne aga Weig Yubu lomag odne ag na a´undi gange di og anese lerob aboga leleng gom.
61001021	Anese eimig ubnebne aga lerobne na nimi di yonge di leleboga nong na dolameldong gom, bog Geid Gange di nimi ag degneboga Eimayong si ag lemla.
61002001	Damen sonda´ nabi nang na Eimayong mabo gan-gan ag oloboga yayeg songe, neigne babe na sonda´ omoladsina´ nimi a´un gan-gan ag yugonga´. Signa a´un ag mednena´ omoladsina´ di gomubseneb yubu bowa´ugonga´, di signa sig Salerobne meilinge lubsinne ag elyaglamig ba, aneso una´ bisig di derong arobnebne berera dora deibdangugonga´.
61002002	Nimi dina´ na sigdi gange busu di yonge di ununa´ bisig dobda balamgonga´, anda ane di signa Sirig Bisig se meili nenelamgonga´.
61002003	Anda anese sonda´ omoladsina´ nang nenege na nundinge danggaseb arob una´ di yoyaboga a´un ag mubdub sugob arobne di neboga elamsugona´, bog sigdi ununa´ nenege se iginne na daman ab gednerob, anda gom ubsinebne na lobnemen gom.
61002004	Anese Eimayong na meili ubeg eim nang na wana´ ubsiog gom, bog signa ug dan asag nagdebsiog, di ane songe uboga selenga´ lomag gunu ag deibsiog murub uboga sunisin sum dangalbulula´;
61002005	anda damen sogo wenege Eimayong na wana´ sembiamsiso gom wenena, bog sogo ag meili una´ nimi ag Eildi mag weiga´ weneldogolyayog, wenege na sirigne omoladsinne Nuh ab yog nimi segbare ab blebsiog.
61002006	Eimayong di Sodom asag Gomora asag ug dabsiog wenena, aneso ubsioga´ na meili una´ eimig ulamneb nimi se sununa´ eldanggibsiog,
61002007	Bog Alna sirig nimi Lot blebog, garerob yubu eel gom nimi ab sig gange busu di yonge ab di ununa´ ag uboga sob-sob igin ulamogne.
61002008	Anese sirig nimi nene na sig gan-gan ag ulamog di, sigdi meili ununa´ sob-sob sum eiya´ gegboga wenena, sirigne eildi gange na oldalamog.
61002009	Wera laga´ anda Ayong Weigne na sirig besarob nimi ouragsina´ ag uboga blebsina´ na eel, anda meili una´ nimi sunusina´ sum iginne debsineba´ se deilinne babe eel.
61002010	Oumunggun na sig gange busu di yonge unulamang di sigdi nong ag sugurubne debdangoga Eimayong di bo usina´ ag meili ulimang. Signa aneso bosa´ goma´ deng-dang aboga bebnagne ag meili derelamang,
61002011	eim nang na sig songe gom yaga migib ab borob ab ulamang nang, bog Eimayong a´osing ag meili derena´ yubu leleboga babe lemang gom,
61002012	bog signa gange goma´ di una´ songe ulamang, gamyagne di aga al wenege manggibna bog, salboga olamsiang songe neigne. Sigdi derena´ yubu nenege na signa eel di gom, ba sigdi meili ununa´ di gamyagne aga beiyag ulamangne songe obsulula´.
61002013	Anda sigdi meili ununa´ degna´ na meili urubne dobgonga´. Ug digag sigdi med-med gomob ulamangne na sigdi sembia na soonge, ba sig na sugurubne ab sodnerobne ab ulamang, anda signa a´un ab nason bugoga dena´ deldogna´ wenena sigdi gange busu di yonge di serem seblamang.
61002014	Sigdi ising na gange busu di yolsagaldana´ne og gemelamang, di meili ununa´ na deg-deg so babe gom. Signa mesang nimi ag goubilimsiang. Sigdi gange na yogne-yogne nisin neringe og danggaso seinilina´ og ulamang. Sig nimi danege na wemdarob.
61002015	Aneso di signa sirig bisig lobogdob, ba signa mednena´ne ag bindub, di Beor mamne Bileam di bisig balamang, meilinge ununa´ di degna´ dona´ yonge ag.
61002016	Bog Bileam na eildi meili ununa´ se gad wenena´dobog, anese keledai yubu goma´ di nimi yubu lebog, ba nabi di serem ununa´ nenege na garebayog.
61002017	Sonda´ omoladsina´ nang nenege na mag lu sabdob so ulamang, om migib di deb boyabalamla songe ulamang; sig se ouling na yaga´ omom gunu lom nong ag gigib gedneboga deirub.
61002018	Anese signa bebnag deildana´ yubu ab garen dibab yubu ab lemang di gange busu di yonge ag uboga wenog mednena´ne ag gomoluya yan nimi ag gubsina´ una´ ulamang.
61002019	Signa yog nimi ag lobdob ulamgob aboga leilimang, bog signa gom urubnebne di ouragna´ nimi dog, anese nimi yogne di alag mesang ubla wenena alna nimi nenege di ouragna´ ne ulamla.
61002020	Anese signa Ayong Weigne nun Blebsinne Yesus Kristus ag besa eel una´ di wenena, sogo ag sugurubne nisin na gigib gomorob, bog on anege lomag wa´na´ wenena sigdi ununa´ na yaga´ meili nong sirig oumunggun wenege so gom.
61002021	Anese sig se na Sirig Bisig eel una´ gom dog ulamseng wenena seleb, bog eimig sig na samboga geid legdob yubu sigag ombaddobne ag na lobogseng wenena meneng wansog.
61002022	Sig se gesen yubu lerobne nene na sirig: “Gam na losomboga on meneng dugna´ deilbalameldo, ba meiya´ na mag legiamna bog on leso dona´ ag dolbalameldo.”
61003001	Na´abo neri wana´ sembirub nimi lei, ane na neri mome besenenge a´un ag dobna. Neri mome besenenge dobna´ lomag ane na neri yoyaboga a´undi eel una´ besarobne ag wenena´ yubu di bugibsin,
61003002	a´un damen geis legdob nabi nang di lemegne seinilimlulum, di Ayong Weigne Blebsinne di lerob yubu lera bana´ nimi di a´un ag ombaddobne ab ag seinilimlulum aboga.
61003003	Oumunggun a´undi eel ublulumne, na goggobdagna´ sum nenege na, deresin nimi ya´indoga derelamsugonga´, signa gange busu di yonge ag lebda ulamang nimi.
61003004	Sigdi lemeg dina: Al yanggana´ se leblourobne nenege na asa do? Anese nunisang yabo somagdobeg ag uboga, sogo ulioga´ ag uboga yogne yogne nisin na soba´ damen songe neigne ulamla.
61003005	Sigdi semboga eel goma´ uya, Eimayong di yubu di oumunggun danege na eim ulamog, di babe sogo na mag aga mag di ubog.
61003006	Mag nenege di, sogo damenne na mag wemboga oboga gom ubog.
61003007	Bog yubu nenege di babe, eim ab sogo ab wene odne na ug dabsunun aboga welamsila´, anda goggobdagna´ meili nimi oldogsili sum nenege se deirub.
61003008	Bog na´abo lei yubu dognog nene na iboglulum gom. Eimayong di gemena´ na dognog sum na seribu tahun songe ulamla, di seribu tahun na dognog sum songe ulamla.
61003009	Al Ayong Weigne di leblourubne una´ na mandelamla gom. Nimi dibna mandelamla seinilimang bog, Alna a´un se dira ulamsil, Alna nimi dognog babe ona´ yo gom, bog nimi nisin noroldana´ gange di sigdi meilinge ag na losombugong aboga.
61003010	Bog Ayong Weigne di sum na asoga´ don nimi songe yulula´; sum nenege na eim na mil-mil aldogle di gom urublula´. Sogo ag deiya´ ne yogne-yogne babe ug dusulula´, di sogo agne nisin babe na doluboga gom ubsulula´.
61003011	Wera yogne-yogne nisin na ane so uboga soldebusulula´ anda, a´un na sa´a ura ulamlulum, do? A´un na besarob sirig ab geis legdob ab ulamlulum.
61003012	Nenege na a´un na Eimayong di sum berera yaso aboga dira ulamlom. Sum nenege na eim na ug di gom urublula´ anda, sogo agne na ug bobo di suldebusulula´.
61003013	Bog nun na Eildi leblourubne ag lebda eim wenogne ab sogo wenogne ab se dira ulamab, sirigne ulamla ag.
61003014	Anese na´abo lei, nene nisin se dira ulamlulum wenena, a´un na yoyaboga ulamlulum, a´un na Al a´osing ag, sodnerobne ab sugurubne ab gom-gom Al ab isiboga mon angarob ulamgob aboga.
61003015	Sembiblulum nundi Ayong Weigne di dira ulamlange nenege na a´un blebsina´ se. Nungga Paulus nundi wana´ne di gerem deiya´ alag dorogne, di a´un ag mome dobog songe.
61003016	Ununa´ nenege na eildi mome nisin lomag deirub, alna ununa´ nene nisin se lebog. Dobog mome lomag anege yubu na gegboga eel ubnemen gomne od, ba nimi na sembibnemen gom ab sigdi odseig seinilina´ gad ubnemen gom ab, ba sig dama´ di samboga obdangganmen ulamang, neig songe babe na sigdi yog-yog mome ag babe memboga dorob.
61003017	Bog na´abo lei a´un wana´ ulamsin, a´un na yubu nene aro bog eel ublulum di. Anese weldalamlulum, garerob yubu wangan nimi di a´un na mednena´ne ag bobesiyig, ba a´undi gad seglamlomne nenege malyunggiyebag aboga.
61003018	Bog glagia doladsina´ ab nundi Ayong Weigne Blebsinne Yesus Kristus eel una´ di nolamlulum, Alaga´ na bebnag wene uboga unum-unum se ulamla.
62001001	Sa´asonge damen odne aga nunna gigib gegbuyub di nundi ising eibub di lag dayogne na nundi see di salbuyub, nenege na Gamyag Yubu, anda nenegaga nunna a´un ag mome dobab.
62001002	Gamyag deiya´ ne nenege na gigib lag dayog ba, nun ising eibub di wene na unum gamyag una´ yubu nenege a´un ag ombara lag lemab, anda Ayong ab neiga´ ag uboga nun ag gigib lag danggayog.
62001003	Sa´asonge nundi gigib eibubne ab gegbuyubne ab na a´unag babe nundi omoladlamsiab, ba a´un babe na nun ab dognog isirub ulamgob aboga. Anda nun isiboga dognog dirigdub una´ nenege na Ayong ab Eildi Me Yesus Kristus ab isiboga dognog dirigdub una´ nenege se.
62001004	Nundi gange ngingyang sunum urubub ubsulul aboga, nene nisin na a´un ag mome dolamab.
62001005	Anda Alag uboga nundi gegbuyub yubu nenege na ane, anda a´un ag nundi omoladlamsiab: Eimayong na dimanne Al lomag na gunu moga´ babe ulamla gom.
62001006	Nundi lemab di na nunna Eimayong ab isiboga dognog dirigdub alamab dog, nunna gunu lomag ulamab wenena, nunna sirigne na unulamab gom di sonda´ yubu lemab.
62001007	Bog nun babe diman ag ulamgob Al diman ulamla songe wenena, nun babe na on yog nimi ab isiboga dirigdub ulamgob, anda Eildi Me Yesus di eneng di nundi meilinge nisin legilimsulula´.
62001008	Nundi lemab di na, nunna meili una´ gom nimi alamab wenena, nundam nimi di sonda´ nimi neneldalamab ba sirigne na nunag na odgom.
62001009	Wera nunna nundi meilinge lag lemeb wenena, Alna doumdigum yengnea´ anda, nundi yog-yog meilinge nisin na legiya gom ulimsulula´.
62001010	Wera nundi lemab di, nunna meili una´ gom nimi alamab wenena, Alag sonda´ne dangilimab ba Eildi yubu nunag na ulamsil gom.
62002001	Neri mabo lei, a´unna meilinge unulamlulum gom aboga ununa´ nene nisin mome dolamna, bog nimi dogne meilinge unulamle wenena, nunna Ayong ag se nundi gan-gan agne od, nenege na Yesus Kristus Sirigne.
62002002	Anda Alna nundi meilinge nisin se isilisinne, anda nundi meilinge se og gom bog sogo nimi nisin di meilinge se babe.
62002003	Anda nun Eimayong eel ulamab nimi gednebne na ane, Eildi yubu nisin ag dagom ana´ di.
62002004	Nimi dogne di lemla di na: “Nana Al eel ulamna”, bog alna Eildi yubu ag dagom ana´ gom wenena alna sonda´ne di alag sirigne odgom.
62002005	Bog nimi dogne na Eildi yubu ag dagom alamla wenena, Eimayong di wana´ na nimi nenege ag sirig urubub ulamla; ane di aga nunna Al lomag ulamab aboga nun eel ulamab.
62002006	Nimi dogne di alna, Al lomag ulamna alamla wenena, alna Kristus di gigib ulamog songe yaga´ unulamlul.
62002007	Na´abo neri wana´ ulamsin nimi lei, wenog lerob yubu aga nana mome a´unag dobna gom, bog damen lerob yubu aga oumunggun danegab a´un ag ora´ anegaga. Damen lerob yubu nenege na weig yubu a´undi gigib gegerobne.
62002008	Bog on wenog lerob yubu babe a´un ag mome dobna, sirigne Alag gigib lag dangdob di a´unag babe; anese gununge na gom dangalamla di diman sirigne di meleg waralamla.
62002009	Nimi dogne di lemla di na, alna diman ag ulamna alamla, bog alna alga ag erigal ulamla wenena alna wene babe gunu lomag ulamla.
62002010	Nimi dogne alga ag wana´ seinilimla wenena, alna diman ag ulamla di alag na yamnegoga mednena´ne odgom.
62002011	Bog nimi dogne alga ag erigal seinilimle wenena, alna gunu od di, gunu lomag ulamla. Gunu di eildi ising urub ba al asa balamla´ anege na eel ulamla gom.
62002012	Neri mabo lei, nana a´un ag mome dobna´ na, Eildi si se aboga a´undi meilinge na gigib lubibsiog.
62002013	Ayong yabo lei, nana a´un ag mome dobna, anese a´unna Al oumunggun danegab ulameldonge ag eel ulamloma´ se. A´un goubini nimi lei, neri a´un ag mome dobnange na, anese a´unna meilinge ag gigib dolbalag nembaloma´ se.
62002014	Mogmabo lei, nana a´un ag mome dobna´ na a´unna Ayong gigib eel ulamloma´ se. Ayong yabo lei, nana a´un ag mome dobna´ na a´unna Al oumunggun danegab ulameldonge ag eel ulamloma´ se. Goubini nimi lei, neri a´un ag mome dobna´ na a´unna migib uboga Eimayong di yubu a´un lomag ulamla ba a´unna meilinge ag gigib dolbalag nembaloma´se.
62002015	A´unna sogo ag ane ab yogne-yogne nisin lomagne ab se wana´ unggom. Sogo ag ane wana´ ulamang nimi ag na Ayong di wana´ na nimi nenegag na ulamla gom.
62002016	Anese sogo agne nenege nisin na, nong di yonge ab ising di gembara yonge ab dengdang ana´ ab, anda nene nisin na Ayong ag uboga gom bog sogo ag ubogange.
62002017	Anda sogo ag ane ab sogo ag di yonge nisin na derong aroblula´, bog Eimayong di yonge ag unulamang nimi na unum sob-sob gamyag ulamgonga´.
62002018	Neri mabo lei, goggobdagna´ sum na sum nene danggal, anda a´undi gigib gegbulum songe, Kristus ag dolbalag nenenne yulula´, anda wene na Kristus ag dolbalag nenen nimi dina´ dangalamang. Anena odseig goggobdagna´ sum aboga gedneb eel una´se.
62002019	Odseig signa nun gan-gan ag ab nason ulamab nimi bog signa od sirig nunab nimi gom; anese signa nunab nimi wenena, nunab nason ulamseba´. Bog ununa´ nene di lag dangalamla ba sig dara nimi na nunab nimi gom.
62002020	Bog a´unna Yaga´ Geidne nenege di gigib yegelongsina´ doblum, aneso unurubne nenege di a´un nisin na eel ulamlom.
62002021	Neri a´un ag mome dobna´ na, a´unna sirigne wangan ulamloma´se gom, bog a´unna eel ulamloma´se di on eel ublulum aboga, anda sonda´ yubu ag uboga na sirigne ulameldo gom.
62002022	Sonda´ yubu lenne na edne do? Alna Yesus se Kristus gom aboga elyaglameldo nimi nenege gom de? Alna Kristus ag dolbalag nenenne, anda eildi Ayong babe Me ag babe elyaglamsilne.
62002023	Anese nimi dogne di Me ag elyaglamla wenena, alna Ayong dorob gom. Nimi dogne Me ag sirig seinilimla wenena, alna Ayong babe dorob.
62002024	A´un na, oumunggun gegbulum yubu nenege na gange ag bo ulamlulum. Wera a´undi oumunggun ab gegbulum yubu nenege a´undi gange ag bo ulamlulum wenena, a´unna Ayong ab Me ab lomag unumse ulamlom.
62002025	Anda nene na Al nong di nun ag gigib leibloubsiogne, nenege na unum gamyag una´se.
62002026	Nene nisin na nana a´un ag mome dobna, nenege na nimi di a´un ag mednena´ bisig yamnegoga bobesina´se.
62002027	Anese a´undi nong lomag na, dodsiogne Alag uboga a´undi doblumne nenege ulamsil. Anese a´unna nimi di ombadsinmen gom. Bog dodsiogne nenege di a´un ag yogne-yogne nisin omoladlamsulula´, anda Eildi dodsiogne nenege na sirigne, sonda´ne gom, damen Eildi a´un ag ura ombaramsiog songe, a´unna Eildi nong lomag aneso ura ulamlulum.
62002028	Wera wene neri mabo lei, Kristus di nong lomag ulamlulum, ba Al nong lag dangalyanggale wenege na odseig seinilina´ di bosa´goma´ uboga Al yanggale sum nenege na eili ubsulul gom aboga.
62002029	Wera a´unna Alna sirigne eel ulamlom wenena, sirigne ulamang nimi nisin na Alag uboga mangarob nimi babe a´unna eela´.
62003001	Gedsu, Ayong di nunag na yaga´ wana´ nonggela´ glagia dodsiog ba nunna Eimayong di mabo arob, anda odseig nunna Eimayong di mabo! Anedi sogo di nunag na eel gom, sogo di Al eel gom se.
62003002	Wana´ ulamsin na´abo lei, wene nunna Eimayong di mabo bog eimig ubneb una´ na lag dangdob gom; bog nunna eel ulamlom; Kristus Al lag dangaldogle wenege na nunna Al songe danggugoba´, anese Al nong Eildi ununa´ na sirig urubub eibgoba´.
62003003	Alag nebom ara ulamang nimi nisin na, geis legeldalamlul; Al geis legdob ulamla songe neigne.
62003004	Nimi meili ulamang nimi nisin na Eimayong di garerob yubu ag mednelamang, anese Eimayong di garerob yubu ag mednena´ na meilinge.
62003005	A´unna eel, Al lag danggayoga´ na, nundi meilinge nisin lubibsunun aboga, Al lomag na meilinge gomne.
62003006	Anese Al lomag ulamang nimi nisin na, on meilinge unulamang gom, on meilinge soba´ ulamang nimi nisin na Al eiya eel una´ gom di.
62003007	Neri mabo lei, nimi di mednena´ bisig ag yamnegoga bobsugong aboga dillobnanggom. Nimi na sirigne unulamla wenena alna sirigne, Kristus sirigne ulamla songe neigne.
62003008	Nimi dogne meilinge og sob-sob ulamla wenena, Iblis ag uboga, anese Iblis na oumunggun danegab meili una´ne. Anese aboga Eimayong di Me Al lag danggayog, nenege na Iblis di ununa´ nisin gom ubnun aboga.
62003009	Nimi na Eimayong ag uboga mangarob nimi wenena, on meilinge ulamang gom; anese Eildi yena´ unumne al lomag od ba meilinge sob-sob ubnemen gom, anese alna Eimayong di mangarob se.
62003010	Anena Eimayong di mabo ab Iblis di mabo ab gedneb una´ na ane: nimi nisin na sirigne una´ gom wenena, Eimayong ag uboga gom nimi, neigsonge babe na nimi alga ag wana´ ulamla gom nimi.
62003011	Anese yubu nenena oumunggun a´undi gegbulum yubu nenege, nenege na nun moumun wana´ uldalamgob.
62003012	Kain di una´ songe ulamgob gom, alna yoonge agsig uboga eilibsa obog. Anda sa´ase alna al obog do? Anese eildi ununa´ nisin na yoonge di, ba eilibsa di ununa´ na sirigne se.
62003013	Na´abo lei, sogo di a´un ag goroglamsile wenena, a´unna budna´ anggom.
62003014	Nunna eel, nunna somagna´ne ag uboga gamyagne ag gigib bindub, anda nenege na nunggabo ag wana´ usina´ di. Nimi dogne wana´ gange odgom wenena, alna somagna´ne lomag ulamla.
62003015	Nimi na siggabo ag erigal seinilimsil nimi wenena, alna nimi yaga´ osinne ulamla. Anda a´unna eel, nimi osin nimi wenena alnong ag na unum gamyag una´ dorob gom.
62003016	Kristus di wana´ nenege na aneso ura eel ulamab, nenege na Eildi gange gamyaga´ nunse dodsiog; wera nun babe nundi gange gamyaga´ nunggabo se dodsugob.
62003017	Nimi dogne sogo ag ane eildi damnang od bog algga na damnang moga´ di ingmun ulamlange eiyamla dog algga ag gange isigin seregdob ulamla wenena, Eimayong di wana´ nenege na sa´ura alag ulamnemen do?
62003018	Neri mabo lei, nunna wana´ uldalamgob wenena yubu lena´ ab goma bam ab di og lemgob gom, bog nong ununa´ ab sirigne ab di.
62003019	Nunna aneso ura eel ulamab, nunna deiya´ na sirigne ag uboga. Aneso uboga nunna Eimayong a´osing ag nundi gange soaroba´ ulamgob.
62003020	Anese nundi gange ag nene na mednerobne ubla arobne uble wenena, Eimayong weigne meneng wansog yogne-yogne nisin nundi gange ag eel ulamsil.
62003021	Na´abo neri wana´ ulamsin nimi lei, nundi gange ag nene na mednerobne ubla arobne odgom wenena, nunna bosa´ goma´ odseig seinilina´ di Eimayong beram yalamab,
62003022	anda sa´asonge nundi mololamabne nenege na Alag uboga dolamgoba´, anese nunna Eildi yubu nisin dagoma Eildi yonge ag unulamaba´se.
62003023	Anda Eildi lerob yubu nenege na ane: Eildi Me Yesus Kristus di si ag odseig seinilimgob aboga, anda nunag Kristus di lerob yubu aga ura dodsiog songe nun moumun wana´ uldalamgob aboga.
62003024	Nimi dogne Eildi lerob yubu nisin dagom alamla wenena, alna Eimayong lomag ulamla ba Eimayong na al lomag ulamla. Anda nunna aneso ura eel ulamab, ba Eimayong na nun lomag ulamla, nenege na Geid Gange Eildi nunag dodsioga´ anege.
62004001	Na´abo neri wana´ ulamsin nimi lei, gange nisin ag na odseig seiniling gom, bog gange danege nisin ag sunuyambululum, signa Eimayong ag uboga goma aboga; anese sonda´ mednena´ yubu omoladsin nimi dina´ log langgindoga mogsogo nisin ag yabalamang.
62004002	Aneso uboga nunna Eimayong di Geid Gange eel ubgoba´: gange nisin di na Yesus Kristus na nimi nong gigib yayog alamang ba, alna Eimayong ag uboga.
62004003	Anda Yesus na lag lena´ gom gange nisin na, Eimayong ag uboga gom. Gange nenege na Kristus ag dolbalag nenen gange anda alse yubu a´unna gigib gegerob, ba alna yogsum yulula´ aroba´ anda wene alna gigib sogo ag ya´ina ulamla.
62004004	Neri mabo lei, a´unna Eimayong ag uboga, anda a´unna sonda´ mednena´ omoladsin nimi ag na gigib dolbalag nembesilom; anese a´un ag ulamla Gange na yaga´ weig sirig sogo ag ane gange ab neigdigum gom.
62004005	Signa sogo ag ane uboga di; anese signa sogo ag ununa´ se yubu aga lemang, ba sogo nimi na sigag gegelamang.
62004006	Bog nunna Eimayong ag uboga: nimi na Eimayong eel wenena, alna nun ag gegelamla; nimi na Eimayong ag uboga gom wenena, alna nun ag gegelamla gom. Ane di sirig gange goma mednena´ bisig yamnegoga deilisin gange gedneb ulamla.
62004007	Na´abo neri wana´ ulamsin nimi lei, nun moumun wana´ uldalamgob, anese wana´ nenege na Eimayong ag uboga; anda nimi nisin wana´ gange od nimi wenena Eimayong ag uboga mangarob di Eimayong eel ulamang.
62004008	Nimi dogne wana´ gange odgom wenena, alna Eimayong eel gom, anese Eimayong na wana´ deiya´ne se.
62004009	Yubu nene lomag uboga Eimayong di wana´ nenege na nun gan-gan lag dangalamla, nenege na Eimayong na Eildi Me dognog bog gigib sogo ag boglenggayog, ba nunna Alag uboga gamyag ulamgob aboga.
62004010	Wana´ nenege na ane: Nundi Eimayong ag wana´ sembibub gom, bog Eimayong di aga nunag wana´ sembibsiog di Eildi Me gigib doblenggayog nundi meilinge nisin ag uboga isilisina´se.
62004011	Na´abo neri wana´ ulamsin nimi lei, Eimayong di babe aneso ura nunag wana´ sembibsiog wenena, nun babe nun moumun wana´ uldalamgob.
62004012	Nimi dognog di babe Eimayong eilina´ gom. Wera nunna nun moumun wana´ uldalamgob wenena Eimayong na nundi nong lomag ulamla, anda Eildi wana´ nenege na urubub nunag dangalamla.
62004013	Nunna aneso ura eel ulamab, ba Eimayong na nundi nong lomag ulamla ba nunna Eildi nong lomag ulamab: Eildi Gange nunag glagia dodsioga´ di.
62004014	Anda nunna gigib ising eibub di lag lemab, sogo nimi nisin se aboga Ayong di Eildi Me Blebsinne bogdebelyayog.
62004015	Nimi dogne di odseig Yesus na Eimayong di Me seinilimlul wenena, Eimayong na eildi nong lomag ulamla ba alna Eimayong di nong lomag ulamla.
62004016	Nunag Eimayong di wana´ nenege na besa eel uboga odseig seinilimab. Eimayong na wana´ne, anda nimi dogne wana´ gange lomag ulamla wenena, alna Eimayong di nong lomag ulamla ba Eimayong na eildi nong lomag ulamla.
62004017	Yubu nene di aga Eimayong di wana´ nenege nundi nong ag sunum urubub ulamla, nenege sogo goggobdagna´ isibusulul sum nonogo odseig bosa´ goma´ ulamseb aboga, anese Al songe neigne, nun babe sogo ag ane ulamab.
62004018	Wana´ gange lomag na log gange odgom: wana´ gange sirig urububne di log gange na gom ulimla; anese log gange una´ na iginne doradeildana´ anda nimi dogne log gange od wenena, alna wana´ gange ag sunum urubub ulamla gom.
62004019	Eimayong di damen nunag wana´ ubsioga´se, nun babe wana´ ulamab.
62004020	Nimi dogne di lemla di na: “Nana Eimayong ag wana´ ulamna”, alamla dog alna algga ag erigal seinilimla wenena, alna sonda´ yubu lenne ulamla, anese algga ising eilimla´ anda babe wana´ ulamla gom bog Eimayong na meneng wansog eilina´ goma´ anda wana´ ubnemen gom.
62004021	Anda lerob yubu nenena nunna Alag uboga dobub: Nimi dogne Eimayong ag wana´ ulamlul wenena, al babe eildi algga ag wana´ ulamlul.
62005001	Yesus na odseig Kristus seinilimang nimi nisin na, signa Eimayong di mangarob; anda Alag uboga mangarob nimi di wana´ ulamang nimi nisin na, Alag uboga mangarobne ag babe wana´ ulamang.
62005002	Anda gedneba´ na ane, nunna Eimayong di mabo ag wana´ ulamsiab, nenege na nunna Eimayong ag wana´ una´ ab Eildi lerob yubu nisin ag dagoma ununa´ ab di.
62005003	Anese Eimayong ag wana´ nenege na ane, nenege na nunna Eildi lerob yubu nisin ag dagom ana´. Eildi lerob yubu nisin na igin gom,
62005004	anese Eimayong ag uboga mangarobne nisin di na, sogo agne nisin na dolbalag nenelamang. Anda nene na sogo ag dolbalag nemboga bebnag dangalamangne na: nundi odseig seinilina´.
62005005	Edne di aga sogo ag ane dolbalag nembulul do? Yesus na Eimayong di Me odseig seinilimla nimi nenege di og.
62005006	Anena Al mag ab eneng ab di gigib yayog, nenege na Yesus Kristus, mag sirig di og gom bog, mag ab eneng ab di. Anda Gange di aga lag omoladlamsil, anese Gange anege na sirigne.
62005007	Anese weneli di lag lemang [eim asag ab: Ayong ab, Yubu ab Geid Gange ab di; anda sig weneli na nong dognog.
62005008	Anda sogo ag ane babe weneli di lag lemang]: Gange ab mag ab eneng ab di anda sig weneli na nong dognog.
62005009	Nunna nimi di lag lena´ dolamab, bog Eimayong di lag lena´ na yaga´ migib nong. Anese Eimayong di Eildi Me se yubu aneso ura lag doladlamsil.
62005010	Nimi dogne Eimayong di Me odseig seinilimle wenena, Eimayong di lag len yubu alag ulamla; nimi dogne Eimayong ag odseig seinilimla gom wenena, eildi Alna sonda´ne dangilimla, anese alna Eimayong di Eildi Me se lag len yubu doladlamsilne ag odseig seinilina´ gom se.
62005011	Anda lag len yubu nenege na ane: Eimayong di nun ag unum gamyag una´ dodsiog anda gamyag una´ nenege na Eildi Me lomag od ulamla.
62005012	Nimi dogne Me dorob wenena, alna gamyag una´ dorob; nimi dogne Me dorob gom wenena, alna gamyag una´ dorob gom.
62005013	Nisin na nana mome a´un ag dobna, Eimayong di Me di si ag odseig seinilimlom nimi na, a´unna unum gamyag una´ gigib dorob eel ublulum aboga.
62005014	Anda nundi bosa´ goma´ Alag odseig seinilina´ na ane, nenege na Alna nundi lemab doa yubu gegelamla, nunna Alag Eildi yonge ag dirigoga molbugob wenege na.
62005015	Anda nunna eel ubab di wenege na, sa´asonge nundi molbayabne nenege nisin Alna gegelamla, ba nun babe eel ulamab, nundi yogne-yogne nisin Alag mololamabne nenege na gigib dolamab aboga.
62005016	Nimi dogne alga meilinge unulamle ba eible di, meilinge nenege na somagna´ meilinge gom wenena, alna Eimayong ag doa yubu leblul ba Alna alag gamyag una´ dodlul, nenege na sig meili ulamang nimi di somagna´ne yanmen gom meilinge nenege se. Somagna´ne yaneb meilinge babe od: neri doa yubu leblulum abnange na nenese lebna gom.
62005017	Meili ununa´ nisin na meilinge, bog meilinge dogne na somagna´ne yanmen gom meilinge babe od.
62005018	Nunna eel, nimi na Eimayong ag uboga mangarob nimi wenena meilinge ulamla gom; bog Al Eimayong ag uboga mangarobne di al welamla, ba yoonge di alag bebognemen gom.
62005019	Nunna eel, nunna Eimayong ag uboga anda sogo nisin na yoonge di see ag salbamsil.
62005020	Aneso bogna nunna eel, Eimayong di Me gigib yayog di nunag eel deiya´ dodsiog, ba nunna Sirigne eel ulamgob aboga, anda nunna Sirigne di nong lomag ulamab, Eildi Me Yesus Kristus di nong lomag. Alna Eimayong sirigne ab unum gamyagne ab.
62005021	Neri mabo lei, a´unna sunuruba´ gibna´ ag na besa weldalamlulum.
63001001	Nana domba gemera dira unne di an webdob gel ab eindi mabo ab se sirigne lomag wana´ ulamsin. Neri og wana´ ulamsin gom, bog sirigne eel ulamang nimi nisin di babe,
63001002	sirigne nenege na nun lomag ulamla di unum-unum nun ab nason ulamlula´.
63001003	Glagia doladsina´ ab, weradona´ ab, isiboga mon angarob una´ ab na Ayong Eimayong ag, ab Ayong di Me Yesus Kristus ag ab uboga nunag wana´ ab sirigne ab ulamsulula´.
63001004	Neri gange ngingyang ulamnel, nenege na eindi mabo dara na Ayong di lerob yubu aga nundi dorobne ag dirigoga sirigne ag ulamang ba eibsin di.
63001005	Anda wene nana in anag molbougunun, wenog lerob yubu aga neri an ag mome dolongso ubna gom, bog damen danegab nun ag lerob yubu nenegaga, ba nun moumun wana´ uldalamgob aboga.
63001006	Anda wana´ nenege na ane, nunna Eildi lerob yubu ag dirigoga ulamgob. Anda lerob yubu nenege na ane, a´unna wana´ nenege lomag ulamlulum, oumunggun a´undi ura gigib gegbulum songe.
63001007	Anese mednena´ bisig yamnegoga bosin nimi dina´ langgindoga mogsogo nisin ag balamang, Yesus na nimi sirig songe gigib yayog aboga odseig seinilimang gom nimi. Nene na mednena´ bisig yamnegoga bosin nimi ab Kristus ag dolbalag nenenne ab.
63001008	Weldalamlulum, a´un ag nundi welamabne nenege wanenggiblulumag aboga, bog a´unna a´undi degna´ urubub doblulum aboga.
63001009	Nimi nisin na Kristus di omoladsina´ ag ulamang gom, bog anegag lobda langgalamang nimi na Eimayong dorob gom. Nimi dogne omoladsina´ nenege lomag ulamla wenena, alna Ayong ab Me ab dorob.
63001010	Nimi dogne a´un ag yale di alna omoladsina´ yubu nene beyale gom wenena, a´unna a´undi ee ag al doblulum gom di alag babe gibnang gom.
63001011	Anese nimi dogne di alag giblul wenena, alna eildi meili ununa´ nenege lomag dobla.
63001012	Odseig nana a´unse mome dina´ dona´ na, buku ba´ ab magbensol ab di mome dona´ na yo gom, bog neri nebom arobne na nanong yane di a´un a´osing ag yubu lebnun, ba nundi ngingyang nenege sunum urubub danggulul aboga.
63001013	Anggagal webdob gel di mabo di an ag gibgeyang.
64001001	Nana domba gemera dira unne di Gayus ag wana´ ulamgen, neri wana´ sirigne lomag ab.
64001002	Na´e neri wana´ ulamgenne, nana doa yubu lemgen, anna yogne-yogne nisin urubub besa neigna´ goma´ ulamlom aboga, eindi gange besarob og ulamlam songe.
64001003	Anese nana yaga´ ngingyang ulamnel, eindi sirigne ag una´ na nunggabo edbare nimi ya´ina lag lebong ba, anese anna odseig sirigne lomag ulamlam.
64001004	Neri gange ngingyang una´se weigne dogne odgom bog neri mabo aga sirigne lomag ulamang arobne gegelamna di aga neri gange ngingyang ulamnel.
64001005	Na´e neri wana´ne, anna odseig seinilina´ne di unub ulamla, yogne-yogne nisin eindi nunggabo se unulamlam, signa segelyanggan nimi ag bog.
64001006	Signa eindi wana´ usina´ nenege gigib jemaat a´osing ag lag lebong. Seleb eindi ununa´ na sirigne, anna sig bisig bana´se arobusunun aboga uldoglem wenege na Eimayong di ngingyang ublul arob bisig una´ ublom.
64001007	Anese Eildi si se signa gigib balameg wenena Eimayong wangan nimi nisin ag uboga na signa yogne dogne dobeg gom.
64001008	Nunna aneso nimi dobsugob, nun babe sigdi wee lomag sirigne dobgob aboga.
64001009	Nana jemaat ag mome moga´ gigib dobna, bog Diotrefes sig gan-gan ag ab si sinne danggunun arobne di aga nun ag sirig seinilimsil gom.
64001010	Anese aboga, na yangasene wenena, eildi unulamlange nisin na gobsene, anese alna nun ag meili yubu delagoga lemsila´se, anda nenege urubub seinilimla gom di, eildi og babe nunggabo yanggan nimi dosina´ gom dog, bog sig dobsineb un nimi ag babe garelamsil di jemaat nimi a´osing ag uboga babe dollanalamsil.
64001011	Na´e neri wana´ne, meilinge ag dilinggom, bog besarobne aga. Nimi dogne besarobne ulamla wenena, alna Eimayong ag uboga, bog nimi dogne meilinge ulamla wenena, alna Eimayong eirub gom di.
64001012	Demetrius se yubu na nimi nisin di besarob lag lemang, ba sirigne di aneso ura lag dangalamla. Anda nundi babe alse yubu besarob lag lemab, anda anna eel, nundi lag lemabne na sirigne.
64001013	Yubu dina´ a´un ag mome dobsene, bog nana a´un ag mome pensol mag ab di dona´ na yo gom.
64001014	Neri nebom abnange na nana berera an ab ebbisidangganem di yubu an a´osing ag lebnun.
64001015	Isiboga mon angarob una´ na an ag ulamgulula´! Anggabo di babe giblamgeyang. Neri gibsina´ babe nunggabo sigdi si ag eleb-eleb ag gibsulom.
65001001	Nana Yudas di, Yesus Kristus di ouragna´ne, Yakobus alga. Sig Eimayong di wana´ uboga biarob nimi, Yesus Kristus di welamsil nimi ag.
65001002	Weradona´ ab, isiboga mon angarob una´ ab, wana´ ab na a´un ag weiga´ ma´alamlul.
65001003	Na´abo, neri wana´ ulamsin nimi lei, wene nana yaga´ yoyaboga nun blebeldana´ se mome ane a´un ag dobna, anda a´un ag mome dobnun sembibnange ab a´un ag wembusunun aboga ubnange ab di, ba a´un na geis legdob nimi ag odseig seinilina´ gigib ombadsiyigne nenege na, besa gas salbamlulum aboga.
65001004	Anese a´un gan-gan ag nimi dara na iginne ubsugob aboga gelelenga wa´ilamang, nenege na damen ab iginne deibsineb gednerob nimi. Sig na gegeng gom nimi, sigdi gange busu di yonge di Eimayong di glagia doladsina´ nenege medneboga unulamang nimi, di nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus dognog salerobne ag elyaglamang nimi.
65001005	Bogna nisin a´un na gigib eel di a´un na on gadgeira gom bog na nana a´un ag ombadsunun, odseig Ayong Weigne na Eildi nimi na Mesir sogo ag uboga blebsiog, bog on sig odseig seinilina´ gom nimi na oboga gom ubsiog.
65001006	Anda Alna sigdi bo umgong arobne seila´-seila´ un eimnang na garelimsil, ba sigdi un ouling ag louya yoga´ ag bieg, ba gas bosi soubu di gouboga gunu sogo ag deirub murub sunusina´ se weig sum dangalbulula´.
65001007	Sodom Gomora nimi ab sig as beram-beram nimi ab di ulameg songe, neig ununa´ yolsagaldana´ ab sunum gomne aga sigdi gange ag aa arobne ab ag dobda balameg, ba nimi nisin eldanganase iginne ug unumne aga dobeg.
65001008	Bog lenda malong so ulamang nimi na sigdi nong se meili uldalamang, Eimayong di bosina´ ag meili nenelamang, di eim asag bebnagne nisin ag babe sodnerob yubu lemang.
65001009	Bog eimnang di weigne Mikhael ab Iblis ab Musa di somagdoba´ boga se gilildalamdega´ lomag anege ab na, Iblis ag sununa´ se bosa´ goma´ delagdob yubu dogne lebog gom, bog lebog di na: “Ayong Weigne di an ag lebgulula´.”
65001010	Bog signa yogne yogne nisin sig wanganne ag sodnerob yubu lemang, signa gange di og eel uboga gam ab meiya´ ab di una´ songe ulameg, aneso ununa´ bisig di sig babe derong arobgonga´.
65001011	Signa ongei arob! Anese signa Kain di yan suru ag dirigoga ingilamang, di signa Bileam di ubog songe ag unulamangne di degna´ dobneba´, anda sig na Korah meili una´ di derong arobgonga´.
65001012	A´undi wana´ se seni yoboga bogoldalamloma´ ag ane na sigdi sodnelimsiang, signa eili goma´ danggiya delamsiang di bebnag deildalamang: signa deb aga om gwi aboga walalamla ba mog yalamla gom songe ulamang: signa muru wal ag gal do moulameldo gom songe, li besene somaglamla anda eilda´ yareng ab wemboga.
65001013	Signa weig mag laut aga mag lo samo samo yangan di omom ulamla di mag silong bobuglamla songe sigdi eilinge na sig dama ab wareglamsil, signa gura´ di dongolgiriglamla songe gunu sogo ag unum unum se gigib gednerob.
65001014	Sig se yubu na Henokh babe, Adam di mangadangden salag na segbarenge, anda damen ab gigib leiblouyamog di na: “Odseig Ayong Weigne na Eildi geis legdob nimi deng-deng ab isiboga yalamang,
65001015	nimi nisin ag sumbusunun aboga, di gegeng gom nimi di gegeng gom so ununa´ ulamang nimi ag iginne degna´ degsineb, sigdi unulamangne ab meili ununa´ nimi di gegeng gom so ulamangne ab Ayong Weigne ag meili yubu lena´ nisin ab se.”
65001016	Sig nimi danege na sigdi una´ se, sob sob igilina´ dagoga erigal yubu lemang, di gange busu di yonge ag og dirigoga ulamang, bog sigdi bam ag na obbil arob gom yubu dollanalamang, di sig dinge loboga dorobsugob aboga saroga lemsugonga´.
65001017	Bog na´abo a´un neri wana´ seinirub nimi lei, damen Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus ag dirigoga lerabana´ nang di a´un ag gigib lebeg yubu nenege besa sembiblulum.
65001018	Anese signa gigib a´un ag damen lebeg di na: “Sogo goggobdagna´ sum beram danggale wenena gange doulisina´ yubu len nimi yugonga´, anda signa gegeng gom so uboga gange busu di yonge ag og dirigoga ulamgonga´.”
65001019	Signa delegoga bosin nimi, anda sig na sogo ag ane ab yonge di bo ulamsil, ba Geid Gange di bo ulamsil gom.
65001020	Bogna na´abo neri wana´ ulamsin nimi lei, a´undi odseig seinilina´ ag geid legdobne di diga´ dirigoga sobong-sobong wenggalamlulum, di Geid Gange lomag uboga doa yubu lemlulum.
65001021	A´un na Eimayong di wana´ lomag unura weldalamlulum, di nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus di weradona´ se nang nangablamlulum, unum-unum gamyagne una´ se.
65001022	Sig gange gadgeira´ ulamang nimi ag na, a´undi wana´ usina´ ubsululum.
65001023	Signa ug lomag uboga dengera doboga blebsululum. Bog wana´ usina´ na yog nimi ag babe log seinilina´ di, ba sigdi bagsum meili ununa´ yonge di meili uruba´ ag na erigal ublulum.
65001024	Al se aga, a´un boboga welamsil gwaregna´ ag malyunggiyigag aboga, di sugurubne goma´ ngingyang eisa´ a´unna Eildi bebnagne a´osing ag boa deilbalamsil.
65001025	Al aga, Eimayong dognogne nun Blebsinne nundi Ayong Weigne Yesus Kristus bisig uboga, Al aga bebnag ab, weig ab, migib ab, bo usina´ ab na damen wilman nisin uboga wene ab eimig unum unum se. Amin.
66001001	Anena Yesus Kristus di eimig unubaneb yubu aga Eimayong di Alag dorogne, ba Eildi wee wen nimi ag lag berera dangganebne nenege deiblul aboga. Anda Eildi besarob eimnang dogne Eildi bogdebelyayogne, Eildi aga Eildi ouragna´ne Yohanes ag lag danggibog.
66001002	Yohanes babe na Eimayong di yubu se gigib lag lebog nenege na Yesus Kristus di lag lena´ dorogne, nenege nisin na eildi gigib eibogne nenege.
66001003	Eimigsig ubneb yubu nene aga eildilamlul nimi na besarob ngingyang ulamlul, di sig yubu gegelamig nimi babe, di sa´asonge lomag mome doroba´ ag dirigoga ulamlul nimi babe, anese sum na gigib beram ulamla.
66001004	Nana Yohanes di a´un mogsogo Asia sogo ag segbare jemaat umlom nimi ag: Eildi uboga yog doladsina´ ab isiboga mon angarob gange una´ ab na a´un ab nason ulamluluma´, wene odne babe gigib odne babe yogsum yululne babe, anda segbare gange abenege ab uboga na Eildi weig buna´ a´osing ag odne di.
66001005	Anda Yesus Kristus ag uboga, anda lag lena´ se dagom Ana´ne ab di, Al aga na oumunggun nong somagdoba´ ag uboga gamyag bugogog di sogo as borob nang nisin se borobne weigne ulamla. Alse aboga, nunag wana´ sembibsiog di Eildi eneng di na nundi meilinge ag uboga lobibsiog,
66001006	di nunna weig bebnag una´ damag asag nimi danggibsiog, Al Ayong, Eimayong se gibna´ deiya´ nimi ulamgong aboga, Alse aga bebnag ab migib deiya´ ab unum-unum se ulamla. Amin.
66001007	Gedlom! Alna deb ag yalamla! Nimi nisin di ising na Alag gemelamgonga´, sig Alag lumboga obeg nimi babe. Al se aboga yog sogo-yog sogo nimi nisin babe na engelamgonga´. Yo, amin.
66001008	Ayong Weigne Eimayong di yubu na: “Nana Alfa ab Omega ab, wene babe odne, damen ab odne, eimig babe yalamlange, Yaga´ Migibne.”
66001009	Nana Yohanes, a´ungga a´undi nimi ingmunne lomag nason ulamab, di weig bo una´ damag una´ lomag uboga, yeng gange di Yesus se nang-nangabda ulamab, di mag dom-domag ab mogsogo sina Patmos ulamna, Eimayong di yubu ab, lag lena´ ab Yesus di dodneyogne se.
66001010	Ayong Weigne di sum na, Eimayong di Gange na nong ag geseganeog di, yubu dogne gegeldogsi ba weilagsig uboga yubu migiba´ leldogog buana´ yubu songe.
66001011	Anda eildi leldogog di na: “Sa´asonge Eindi ising eiblam ne nisin na mome buku ag doblem di, sig segbare gereja ag ane doreblom: Efesus ab Smirna ab Pergamus ab Tiatira ab Sardis ab Filadelfia ab Laodikia ab ag.”
66001012	Wera nana nayag lemog yubu nenege se samboga gednun aboga gemelamsi wenena, wesa´ dimboga deilina´ ouling yan segbarea´ aga emas di memeroba´ aga a´osing ag danggayog.
66001013	Wesa´ dimboga deilina´ ouling yan gan-gan ag anege na Sogo Nimi di Me songe dogne seglamog, Alna weya´ dolengna´ bagsum onggamog ba bagsum weya´ di yan sang ag bebo alamog, di eilda´ gora ag na emas di memboga wirub saba´ wegena´ aga onggamog.
66001014	Eilda´ ousa´ ab osong ab na geis youmba´ songe ab domba osong songe ab byabdob, ba Eildi ising na ugbog milang-milang alongso ulamog;
66001015	eildi yan na tembaga aga ug ag damnaba ugloblameldo songe ulamog; ba Eildi yubu busu na, weig mag wemba yalamna, di oo alameldo songe lemog.
66001016	Anda Eildi sirig se ag signa gura´ segbare salbamog, di Eildi bam ag ab na mal losoroba´ si gwaga´ besena´ langgalamog, di Eildi a´osing ag na eseng dingilgasalamla songe ulamog.
66001017	Nana Alag eilisi wenege na, Al yan eiba´ ag somagdob nimi songe legluluba malyunggisi; bog Eildi sirig see di aga na eilib deiya, na ag lebog di na: “Log unggom mem! Nana Oumunggunne ab Goggobdagna´ne ab ulamna.
66001018	Nana Gamyag Ulamnange! Nana gigib somagdobsi, bog gedlom, Nana unum-unum se Gamyag Ulamnange, anda Neri aga somagna´ne ab somagna´ne damag una´ ag ab se, kunci na Neri salbamna.
66001019	Anese aboga, eindi ising eiblam ununa´ nene nisin na mome doblom, nenege na wene unulamlange babe on nene gigib unuboga eimigsig danggululne babe.
66001020	Anda gura´ segbare ab wesa´ deilina´ yan ouling segbare aga emas di memeroba´ aga Neri sirig se ag salbamna, ba eindi eiblama´ anege nong gelelenga gunuruba´ nong anege na ane: Gura´ segbara´ abenege na segbare gereja se eimnang abenege, bog wesa´ deilina´ yan ouling segbara´ aga emas di memeroba´ abenege na gereja nong segbara´ abenege.”
66002001	“Jemaat Efesus se eimnang ag mome ane doblom: Anena Eildi uboga leibla yubu, Al gura´ segbare Eildi sirig se agsig bomla di wesa´ deilina´ yan segbare aga emas di memeroba´ gan-gan ag yabalamlange di lebla.
66002002	A´undi sa´asonge ulamlomne nisin na Nana eel. A´unna wee oga´ obdanggoga migiba´ welamlom di lamabonggia ulamloma´ na. A´unna yalbabna´ gange nimi ag lignibonggia ulamlom goma´ babe nana eel. Nimi di lemang di nunna lerabana´ nang aldalamang, bog signong na lerabana´ nang gom, bog lemang nimi ag na, a´unna gigib sunulamlom di, a´undi signa sonda´ nang aboga eilimsilom.
66002003	Anda anna Neri si se aboga igin-iginne lignibonggia dolamlam di, mesang arob seinilina´ babe ulamlam gom.
66002004	Bog anse Neri gange igin ulamnelne na ane: eindi damen Na ag wana´ una´ nenege na gigib beiblouboma´ se.
66002005	Anese aboga, anna mog nong ag malyonggalamlama´ anege besa sembiblom! Meilinge ag uboga engena´ gange di losomboga yalem di, eindi damen ulamlum songe nenege aga unulamlom. Aneso unulamlom gom wenena, Na ya´indoga einda´ wesa´ deilina´ yan bulina´ dobnuna´.
66002006	Bog nene aga anag ulamlul, nenege na anna yogne-yogne nisin Nikolaus ag dirigoga balamang nimi di ulamangne ag erigal sembiblom, nene na Neri babe erigal seinilimnange.
66002007	Nimi na oo od wenena alna Gange di jemaat ag lemlange nisin yaga´ besa gegbulul; Edne aga bebnag danggale nimi na Neri gamyag gal do Eimayong di Firdaus agne aga dodneba delamlula´.”
66002008	“Jemaat Smirna nimi se eimnang ag mome ane doblom: Anena Oumunggunne ab Goggobdagna´ne ab gigib somagoga´ gamyag bugogogne di yubu.
66002009	Nana eel anna igin-iginne ab segomne ab ulamlama´ anege na, bog anna seyagne ulamlam di sigdi meili lemanga´ anege na, signa Yahudi nimi aldalamang bog sirigne na Yahudi nimi gom, anda samboga sig aga na Iblis di nimi ulamang.
66002010	An ag igin-iginne uldoggela´se log unggom! Odseig Iblis na edbareso nimi a´un gan-gan ag nagdebelyulula´ a´un gan-gan ag nimi aga dolongsina´ lomag ab, a´unna li sa´obare ouragsina´ lomag ab igin-iginne a´undi doblulum aboga. Anda anna dagom alamlem murub somagdoblom, ba yogsum an ag Neri mahkota gamyagne dodgununa´.
66002011	Nimi na oo od wenena alna Gange di jemaat ag lemlange nisin yaga´ besa gegbulul; Edne aga bebnag danggale nimi na alna igin-iginne doblul goma´, somagna´ne li salag besenenge ag ab na.”
66002012	“Jemaat Pergamus nimi se eimnang ag mome ane doblom: Anena Eildi yubu, mal lobdoba´ yonge aga gwaga´ besena´ salbamlange di yubu.
66002013	An ulamlama´ ag anege na Nana eel, Iblis di ona´ buna´ ouling damag anege na. Anda Nase yeng dagoma lag lenne Antipas wilman ab Iblis una´ ag ab a´un a´osing ag obega´ anege na anna Neri si ag na besa gas salboga bolamlam, di Na ag eindi odseig seinilina´ di Neri si elyaglamnelam gom.
66002014	Na ngingyang gomne aga a´undi unulamlomne edbare so od anda: A´un gan-gan ag ab nimi dara na Bileam di omoladlamsil yubu ag dirigoga dolamang. Bileam di Israel nimi meilinge ag malyunggugong aboga Balak ag wemboga ombaddobne nenegaga na, sunuruba´ gibna´ se deirubne deroga gelabo seila´ yobdangden balamang.
66002015	Neig songe babe na a´un gan-gan ag ab nimi dara na Nikolaus di omoladsina´ yubu ag dirigoga bana´ nimi ulamang.
66002016	A´unna engena´ gange di meilinge ag loboglulum! Ununa´ gom wenena, Nana a´un ag berera ya´indoga Neri bam ag mal yoo di bobo seglebusununa´.
66002017	Nimi na oo od wenena alna Gange di jemaat ag lemlange nisin yaga´ besa gegbulul; edne aga bebnag danggale nimi, alna Neri gelelenga dognorob gwaneng manna dodnuna´, di on geis girig babe, eilibagsig na wenog si mome doroba´ aga, nimi di babe eel urubgoma´ alna aldoblulne di og eel ublulne aga.”
66002018	“Jemaat Tiatira nimi se eim nang ag mome doblom: Anena Eimayong di Me di yubu, Eildi ising na ugbog milang-milang along so ulamla di, Eildi yan na tembaga songe dararang alamla.
66002019	A´undi welamlomne nisin na Nana eel, a´undi wana´ gange babe a´undi odseig seinilina´ babe, a´undi aroldalamlomne babe dagoma yeng ulamlomne babe, Nana eela´, anda a´undi goggobdagna´ ab welamlomne na weiga´, oumunggun ab welamlumne so gom.
66002020	Bog nene na Neri a´unse igin ulamnelne na ane: A´unna gel Izebel ag ising diloblamloma´ aga, alna nabi gel abdanggoga, Neri ouragna´ nimi ag yolsagaldana´ ubgong arob ununa´ ombara gegna´ bisig bobalamsil di sunuruba´ gibna´ se deirubne nisin delamgong aboga ulamsil.
66002021	Nana gigib li gareboga alna eildi meilinge ag uboga engena´ gange di loboglul aboga dodsi bog, alna eildi yolsagna´ne ag uboga engena´ gange di losomboga yanggana´ yo gom ulamla.
66002022	Gedlulum! Nana al neigna´ mana´ ouling ag ab al golabanedi, sig al yolsaglamang nimi ab isiboga yaga´ ingmunne lomag doranagsununa´, anda signa meilinge nenege ag uboga engena´ gange di losomba yanggana´ gom wenena.
66002023	Anda eildi mabo Neri obsini, ba somagdobgong, ba jemaat nisin babe eel ubgonga´, anda Nana nimi di seinilina´ ag ab gange ag ab isilamsinne, a´un babe a´undi ununa´ ag sumboga degna´ degsununa´.
66002024	Bog a´un yog Tiatira nimi na yog seila´ so omoladlamsiangne ag dolamlom gom di, Iblis di nisina´ mesina´ si silamangne ag dolamlom gom. Ba a´un ag na Neri lebne di na, Nana a´un ag yog iginne dogne ab ma´aboga deibsunun arobne na od gom.
66002025	Bog a´un ag odne na, salemumlulum murub umlulum bog Na yunun.
66002026	Nimi na bebnag danggoga Neri wee welamle murub goggobdagna´ sum dangalbile wenena, alag yog sogo-yog sogo nimi nisin se as salerobne ulamlul aboga dodnuna´.
66002027	Anda signa eildi besi dungun di bo ulamsulula´, signa sogo di wimboga memerob ma´i songe gwelabusulula´. Na´neyong ag uboga Neri dobsi migib songe di.
66002028	Anda alag na yalesig gura´ Neri alag dodnuna´.
66002029	Nimi na oo od wenena, Gange di Jemaat nisin ag lemlange yaga´ besa gegbugong.”
66003001	“Jemaat Sardis nimi se eimnang ag mome ane doblom: Eimayong gange segbare ab gura´ segbare ab od´ne Eildi yubu: Nana eel a´undi unulamlomne nisin na; Anda anna gamyag ulamla alamang bog somagdoba´ ulamlam.
66003002	Bugoglom! Di somagdobnemena´ a´oli ulamangne na migib danggibsulom, anese a´undi wee nisin na Eimayong di a´osing ag sunum sirigne dogne od gom.
66003003	Anese damen ab eindi gigib gegboga doblumne nenege na besa sembiblom; nenegag dirigoga unulamlem di engena´ gange di meilinge ag uboga losomba yulom! Anese anna weldana´ gom, bog Nana asoga´ nang songe yununa´, anna sum nene aga yulula´ aboga eel urubgom sum aga oloboga yununa´.
66003004	Bog Sardis nimi darasig nimi na sigdi bagsum na sugulimang gom, anda signa geis bagsum onggoga Nayab nason yabalamgoba´, anese sig nimi nenena ununa´ nenese sunum unubanmen nimia´ anda.
66003005	Yogsum sig bebnag danggugong nimi na geis bagsum unuboga onggugonga´, sigdi si Gamyag Buku ag mome doroba´ anege Nana lubnun goma´. Bog Na´neyong eiba´ag ab Eildi besarob eimnang ab a´osing ag sigdi si Neri lag lebnuna´.
66003006	Nimi na oo od wenena, Eimayong gange di Jemaat nisin ag lemlange besa gegbugong.”
66003007	“Jemaat Filadelfia nimi se eimnang ag mome ane doblom: Anena Al unum Geisne Sirigne di yubu, Daud di Kunci borobne anda Eildi isigin guble bogna nimi di sereganmen gom, goma Eildi isigin seregale bogna nimi di gubnemen gom.
66003008	A´undi welamlom wee nisin na Nana eel. Gedsu, a´unse Neri isigin gubsine bog na, yog nimi di seregugong goma´. Nana eel a´undi migib na weig gom sirig, bog anna Neri yubu ag dagom aboga Neri si se elyaglamnelam gom.
66003009	Gedlom! Edbare nimi na Iblis di nimi ulamang, sig na sonda´ se nunna Yahudi nimi aldalamang, sig na Yahudi nimi sirig gom bog, anda Neri sig na a´un yan damag lambonggia gibsugong arob una´ ubsununa´, ba Neri a´un ag wana´ ulamsinne nenege eldangugong aboga.
66003010	Anese anna Neri yubu ag dagom alamlam di Nase yeng dagoma dira ulamnelama´ se, Neri babe anse welamgununa´ yog sogo-yog sogo nimi nisin isibousulul sum nenege na. Ununa´ nene na sogo nimi nisin isinibesineba´ se.
66003011	Nana berera yalamna! A´un ag odne na besa salbamlulum, a´unda´ mahkota yog nimi di dorobigag aboga.
66003012	Bebnag danggulul nimi na Neri Eimayong di geis legdob ee ag eyagomna´ danggibnuna´, anda alna unum-unum se ulamlula´ langgulul goma´, anda alag na Neri Eimayong di si ab Neri Eimayong di as si ab mome dobnuna´, anda anege na Yerusalem wenogne aga eim asag uboga yunggulula´ Neri Eimayong ag uboga, di Neri si wenogne babe mome alag dobnuna´.
66003013	Nimi na oo od wenena, Eimayong gange di Jemaat nisin ag lemlange besa gegbugong.”
66003014	“Jemaat Laodikia nimi se eimnang ag mome ane doblom: Yubu anena Amin di yubu, Yeng Dagoma Lag Lenne ab Sirigne di, Eimayong di yogne-yogne ulioga´ ag ab Oumunggunne.
66003015	Eindi welamlam wee nisin na Nana eel: Anna saregen ulamlam gom, di bobo babe ulamlam gom. Neri yonge na anna saregen wenena seleb, bobo wenena seleb.
66003016	Wera anese anna saregen dara bobo dara ulamlam, di saregen babe gom bobo babe gom ba, anna Neri bam ag uboga dugdebgununa´!
66003017	Anese eindi lemlam di na, ‘Nana seyagne di yogne-yogne nisin seyagne ulamna ba moga´ gomne dogne odgom alamlam, anda anna eel gom dog’, igilina´ daglamlama´ ab, yaga ongei arobne ulamlama´ ab, seyag gomne ulamlama´ ab, ising uruba´ ulamlama´ ab, nong banenga´ ulamlama´ ab anege na.
66003018	Ba Nana an ag wembougunun, anna Neri emas ug di besa wenog nong danggiruba´ aga Nayag degnelem di, seyagne danggulom, geis bagsum babe deglom, an ongona´ se, di nongbanenga´ anege eili ubgulul gom aboga, ising ag ligildan mag babe deglom, ba anna ising eibnun aboga.
66003019	Edne aga Neri wana´ ulamna nimi na alag Neri wemboga lemnedi legemna´ deibsununa. Anese eindi gange na od unubunun arob gange ublem, di engena´ gange di meilinge ag uboga losomba yulom.
66003020	Gedsu! Nana isigin ag seglamna di isigin goungum goungum alamna; nimi na Neri yubu gegboga isigin gubgong wenena, Nana alag wa´iniba alab Nayab nason gwaneng deroga nason ulamnoma´.
66003021	Edne na bebnag danggulul nimi, alna Neri buna´ ag bugia Nayab nason bugnom abnuna´, neigsonge Nana gigib bebnag danggesi di, Na´neyong ab Eildi buna´ ag nason bulamnam songe.
66003022	Nimi na oo od wenena, Eimayong gange di Jemaat nisin ag lemlange besa gegbugong.”
66004001	Gigib wenena nana gemeldogsi ba, eimasag ab isigin dogne gubamog ba eibsi, di on damen ab gegbamsi, ba nayag lemog yubu nenege di buana´ yubu lelongso leldogog di na: “Ane ag yalem, ba Neri an ag ombadgunun nene gigib ba eimigsig danggululne.”
66004002	Wenege sabseibi berera Geid Gange di na nong ag migib gesebongganeog, di nana gemesi wenena eimasag weig buna´ ag nimi dogne bugamog ba eibsi.
66004003	Nimi nenege di a´osing ag na meleg na Yaspis ising do songe ab Sardis ising do songe meleg aga waralamog, di weig buna´ ag anege na meno eimange songe aga lelde-lelda´ wiriglamla, di a´osing magmane na zamrud songe ledleseng alamog.
66004004	Weig buna´ bugamoga´ abomag anege na dua puluh empat buna´ bugganegameg. Anda buna´ danegag na dua puluh empat weig nang geis bagsum onggoga bulameg, di sigdi ousa´ ag na mahkota emas di memeroba´ onggameg.
66004005	Weig buna´ nenegag uboga beba´ dingibom aboga limang yubu gurud alamog, ba wesa´ segbare weig buna´ eiba´ ag anege wesa´ ublamog, anda nenena Eimayong di Gange segbara´ anege.
66004006	Weig buna´ eiba´ ag anege na kristal songe aga dogne na weig mag laut ising gemena´ songe od; di weig buna´ gan-gan ag babe abomag babe na gamyagne dombare ising do dina´ loga´ od, eiba´ agsig babe weilagsig babe.
66004007	Gamyagne aga oumunggun nongne na singa songe, ba besenenge na sapi me songe, bog wenelinge na nimi di a´osing songe aga od, ba domne na winang dunganne eimag la´ayabalamna´ songe ulamog.
66004008	Gamyaga´ dombara´ abenege na gol eleb-eleb na´ab bara´ od, anda abomag sig uboga lomagsig na ising do dina´ log, anda signa dagloubnang gom-gom sob-sob sinag gwelegnag lemig di na: “Geis Legdob, Geis Legdob, Ayong Weigne Eimayong na Geis Legdobne, Yaga´ Migibne, gigib od ulamogne, wene babe od ulamlange, eimig babe yululne.”
66004009	Anda sob-sob gamyaga´ dombara´ abenege di na gibna´ mos seboga Alag na´e aboga giblamang, al weig buna´ ag bulamogne ag unum sob-sob ulamlulne aboga,
66004010	Wera dua puluh weig nang abenege na weig buna´ ag bulamogne benege eiba´ ag malya´indoga Al na unum sob-sob ulamlange aboga giblamang. Di signa mahkota anege weig buna´ damag borabelya´indoga lemig di na:
66004011	“Yo Ayong Weigne, nundi Eimayong, Eindi og sunum bebnagne ab, gibgena´ ab, migib ab dolamlamne; Anese Eindi og yogne-yogne nisin ublum di, anda Eindi yonge di og yogne-yogne nisin sunum ulamla di gigib ublum.”
